atk-s0404a0:4_2: passato upadhikkhayanti mettāpadaṭṭhānāya vipassanāya anukkamena upadhikkhayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ pattassa dasa saṃyojanā pahīyantīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:4_3: Atha vā tanū saṃyojanā hontīti paṭighañceva paṭighasampayuttasaṃyojanā ca tanukā honti.
atk-s0404a0:4_4: Passato upadhikkhayanti tesaṃyeva kilesūpadhīnaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ mettaṃ adhigamavasena passantassa.
atk-s0404a0:4_5: Kusalī tena hotīti tena mettāyanena kusalo hoti.
atk-s0404a0:5_9: Daliddamanussānaṃ hatthato lekhaṃ gahetvā tīṇi vassāni vinā vaḍḍhiyā sahassadvisahassamattadhanānuppadānaṃ sammāpāsaṃ nāma.
atk-s0404a0:5_10: Tañhi sammā manusse pāseti hadaye bandhitvā viya ṭhapeti,
atk-s0404a0:5_12: mātulā”tiādinā nayena pana saṇhavācābhaṇanaṃ vācāpeyyaṃ nāma,
atk-s0404a0:5_14: Evaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgahitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ iddhañceva hoti, phītañca,
atk-s0404a0:5_17: Manussā mudā modamānā ure putte naccentā apārutagharā viharanti.
atk-s0404a0:5_18: Idaṃ gharadvāresu aggaḷānaṃ abhāvato niraggaḷanti vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:6_0: Aparabhāge pana okkākarājakāle brāhmaṇā imāni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni imañca raṭṭhasampattiṃ parivattetvā
atk-s0404a0:6_1: uddhaṃmūlakaṃ katvā assamedhaṃ purisamedhantiādike pañca yaññe nāma akaṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:6_3: Dvīhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa ekavīsatiyūpassa ekasmiṃ pacchimadivaseyeva sattanavutipañcapasusataghātabhiṃsanassa
atk-s0404a0:6_4: ṭhapetvā bhūmiñca purise ca avasesasabbavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:6_6: Catūhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:6_8: Divase divase yugacchiggaḷe pavesanadaṇḍakasaṅkhātaṃ sammaṃ khipitvā tassa patitokāse vediṃ katvā saṃhārimehi
atk-s0404a0:6_9: yūpādīhi sarassatīnadiyā nimuggokāsato pabhuti paṭilomaṃ gacchantena yajitabbassa satrayāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:6_11: Ekena pariyaññena sattarasahi pasūhi yajitabbassa beluvayūpassa sattarasakadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:6_13: Navahi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā ca purisehi ca assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa sabbamedhapariyāyanāmassa
atk-s0404a0:7_0: Kalampi te nānubhavanti soḷasinti te sabbepi mahāyāgā ekassa mettācittassa vipākamahantatāya soḷasiṃ kalaṃ na agghanti,
atk-s0404a0:7_2: Na jinātīti na attanā parassa jāniṃ karoti.
atk-s0404a0:7_3: Na jāpayeti na parena parassa jāniṃ kāreti.
atk-s0404a0:7_6: Veraṃ tassa na kenacīti tassa kenaci saddhiṃ akusalaveraṃ vā puggalaveraṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0404a0:9_11: Ariyaṃ vā tuṇhībhāvanti ariyatuṇhībhāvo nāma catutthajjhānaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:11_3: Catutthe anavaññattikāmoti “aho vata maṃ aññena avajāneyyu”nti anavajānanakāmo.
atk-s0404a0:13_7: Loko ca aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattatīti ayañca loko ete anubandhati na pajahati,
atk-s0404a0:14_0: Lābho alābhoti lābhe āgate alābho āgatoyevāti veditabbo.
atk-s0404a0:14_5: Sammappajānāti bhavassa pāragūti bhavassa pāraṃ gato nipphattiṃ matthakaṃ patto,
atk-s0404a0:14_6: nibbānapadaṃ ñatvāva taṃ pāraṃ gatabhāvaṃ sammappajānātīti.
atk-s0404a0:18_1: Sattame acirapakkanteti saṅghaṃ bhinditvā na cirapakkante.
atk-s0404a0:20_2: So kira vaṭavane niviṭṭhattā vaṭajālikāti saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0404a0:20_3: Pāturahosīti imamatthaṃ devarañño ārocessāmīti gantvā pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0404a0:22_7: ayaṃ nando indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyamanuyutto satisampajaññena samannāgato,
atk-s0404a0:22_8: yehi nando sakkoti paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ.
atk-s0404a0:24_1: Dasame aññenāññaṃ paṭicaratīti aññena kāraṇena vacanena vā aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vacanaṃ vā paṭicchādeti.
atk-s0404a0:24_2: Bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmetīti bāhirato aññaṃ āgantukakathaṃ otāreti.
atk-s0404a0:24_5: Samaṇapalāpoti vīhīsu vīhipalāpo viya nissāratāya samaṇesu samaṇapalāpo.
atk-s0404a0:24_9: Phuṇamānassāti ucce ṭhāne ṭhatvā mahāvāte opuniyamānassa.
atk-s0404a0:24_10: Apasammajjantīti sāradhaññānaṃ ekato dubbaladhaññānaṃ ekato karaṇatthaṃ punappunaṃ apasammajjanti,
atk-s0404a0:24_11: apasammajjanisaṅkhātena vātaggāhinā suppena vā vatthena vā nīharanti.
atk-s0404a0:25_4: Raho karoti karaṇanti karaṇaṃ vuccati pāpakammaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:25_8: Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathetvā gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti.
atk-s0404a0:27_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame abhivādetīti evamādīni na samaṇo gotamoti ettha vuttanakārena yojetvā evamettha attho veditabbo “na vandati nāsanā vuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0404a0:27_2: nāpi ‘idha bhonto nisīdantū’ti evaṃ āsanena vā nimantetī”ti.
atk-s0404a0:27_4: saddo vibhāvane nāma atthe “rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0404a0:27_5: Evaṃ vatvā atha attano abhivādanādīni akarontaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā āha – tayidaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:27_10: taṃ savanañca me dassanañca saṃsandati sameti,
atk-s0404a0:27_14: Evaṃ attanā sutaṃ diṭṭhena nigametvā nindanto āha – tayidaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:27_16: na sampannamevāti taṃ abhivādanādīnaṃ akaraṇaṃ ayuttamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:28_0: Athassa bhagavā attukkaṃsanaparavambhanadosaṃ anupagamma karuṇāsītalena hadayena taṃ aññāṇaṃ vidhamitvā
atk-s0404a0:28_3: appaṭihatena sabbaññutaññāṇacakkhunā olokentopi taṃ puggalaṃ etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede loke na passāmi,
atk-s0404a0:28_4: yamahaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ vā paccuṭṭheyyaṃ vā āsanena vā nimanteyyaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:28_6: svāhaṃ ajja sabbaññutaṃ patto evarūpaṃ nipaccākārārahaṃ puggalaṃ na passāmi.
atk-s0404a0:28_7: Apica kho yadāpāhaṃ sampatijātova uttarena mukho sattapadavītihārena gantvā sakalaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokesiṃ,
atk-s0404a0:28_8: tadāpi etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede loke taṃ puggalaṃ na passāmi,
atk-s0404a0:28_10: Atha kho maṃ soḷasakappasahassāyuko khīṇāsavamahābrahmāpi añjaliṃ paggahetvā “tvaṃ loke mahāpuriso,
atk-s0404a0:28_11: tvaṃ sadevakassa lokassa aggo ca jeṭṭho ca seṭṭho ca,
atk-s0404a0:28_13: Tadāpi cāhaṃ attanā uttaritaraṃ apassanto āsabhiṃ vācaṃ nicchāresiṃ –
atk-s0404a0:28_17: Evaṃ sampatijātassāpi mayhaṃ abhivādanādiraho puggalo natthi,
atk-s0404a0:28_18: svāhaṃ idāni sabbaññutaṃ patto kaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:28_20: mā tathāgatā evarūpaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ patthayi. Yañhi, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0404a0:28_23: muddhāpi tassa puggalassa rattipariyosāne paripākasithilabandhanaṃ vaṇṭā muttatālaphalaṃ viya gīvato chijjitvā sahasāva bhūmiyaṃ nipateyya.
atk-s0404a0:29_0: Evaṃ vuttepi brāhmaṇo duppaññatāya tathāgatassa lokajeṭṭhabhāvaṃ asallakkhento kevalaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ asahamāno āha –
atk-s0404a0:29_7: Athassa bhagavā cittamudubhāvajananatthaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvaṃ pariharanto aññathā tassa vacanassa atthaṃ attani sandassento atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0404a0:30_0: Tattha atthi khvesāti atthi kho esa.
atk-s0404a0:30_5: yena kāraṇena maṃ “arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo”ti vadamāno puggalo sammā vadeyya,
atk-s0404a0:30_7: Katamo pana soti? Ye te, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0404a0:30_12: Ye te jātivasena vā upapattivasena vā seṭṭhasammatānampi puthujjanānaṃ rūpārammaṇādīni assādentānaṃ abhinandantānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:30_17: ye imaṃ lokaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā viya āviñchanti,
atk-s0404a0:30_20: “Mayhaṃ pahīnā”ti vattabbepi mamākārena attānaṃ anukkhipanto dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0404a0:31_3: Ariyamaggasatthena ucchinnaṃ taṇhāvijjāmayaṃ mūlaṃ etesanti ucchinnamūlā.
atk-s0404a0:31_4: Tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti tālāvatthukatā.
atk-s0404a0:31_5: Yathā hi tālarukkhaṃ samūlaṃ uddharitvā tassa vatthumatte tasmiṃ padese kate na puna tassa tālassa uppatti paññāyati,
atk-s0404a0:31_6: evaṃ ariyamaggasatthena samūle rūpādirase uddharitvā tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena vatthumatte cittasantāne
atk-s0404a0:31_8: Aviruḷhidhammattā vā matthakacchinnatālo viya katāti tālāvatthukatā.
atk-s0404a0:31_9: Yasmā pana evaṃ tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā honti,
atk-s0404a0:32_0: No ca kho yaṃ tvaṃ sandhāya vadesīti yañca kho tvaṃ sandhāya vadesi,
atk-s0404a0:32_2: Nanu ca evaṃ vutte yo brāhmaṇena vutto sāmaggiraso,
atk-s0404a0:32_3: tassa attani vijjamānatā anuññātā hotīti? Na hoti.
atk-s0404a0:32_4: Yo hi naṃ sāmaggirasaṃ kātuṃ bhabbo hutvā na karoti,
atk-s0404a0:32_8: “no ca kho yaṃ tvaṃ sandhāya vadesī”ti.
atk-s0404a0:32_9: Yaṃ pariyāyaṃ sandhāya tvaṃ maṃ “arasarūpo”ti vadesi,
atk-s0404a0:33_0: Evaṃ brāhmaṇo attanā adhippetaṃ arasarūpataṃ āropetuṃ asakkonto athāparaṃ nibbhogo bhavantiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:33_1: Sabbapariyāyesu cettha vuttanayeneva yojanākkamaṃ viditvā sandhāyabhāsitamatthaṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-s0404a0:33_2: brāhmaṇo tadeva vayovuddhānaṃ abhivādanādikammaṃ loke “sāmaggiparibhogo”ti maññamāno tadabhāvena ca bhagavantaṃ “nibbhogo”tiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:33_3: Bhagavā ca yvāyaṃ rūpādīsu sattānaṃ chandarāgaparibhogo,
atk-s0404a0:34_0: Puna brāhmaṇo yaṃ loke vayovuddhānaṃ abhivādanādikulasamudācārakammaṃ lokiyā karonti,
atk-s0404a0:34_1: tassa akiriyaṃ sampassamāno bhagavantaṃ akiriyavādoti āha.
atk-s0404a0:34_2: Bhagavā pana yasmā kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ akiriyaṃ vadati,
atk-s0404a0:34_3: tasmā taṃ akiriyavāditaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.
atk-s0404a0:34_4: Tattha ṭhapetvā kāyaduccaritādīni avasesā akusalā dhammā anekavihitā pāpakā akusalā dhammāti veditabbā.
atk-s0404a0:35_0: Puna brāhmaṇo tadeva abhivādanādikammaṃ bhagavati apassanto “imaṃ āgamma ayaṃ lokatanti lokapaveṇī ucchijjatī”ti
atk-s0404a0:35_2: Bhagavā pana yasmā pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassa ceva akusalacittadvayasampayuttassa ca dosassa anāgāmimaggena ucchedaṃ vadati,
atk-s0404a0:35_3: sabbākusalasambhavassa pana mohassa arahattamaggena ucchedaṃ vadati,
atk-s0404a0:35_4: ṭhapetvā te tayo avasesānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ yathānurūpaṃ catūhi maggehi ucchedaṃ vadati,
atk-s0404a0:35_5: tasmā taṃ ucchedavādaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.
atk-s0404a0:36_0: Puna brāhmaṇo “jigucchati maññe samaṇo gotamo idaṃ vayovuddhānaṃ abhivādanādikulasamudācārakammaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:36_1: tena taṃ na karotī”ti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ jegucchīti āha.
atk-s0404a0:36_3: yāni kāyavacīmanoduccaritāni ceva yāva ca akusalānaṃ lāmakadhammānaṃ samāpatti samāpajjanā samaṅgibhāvo,
atk-s0404a0:36_4: taṃ sabbampi gūthaṃ viya maṇḍanakajātiko puriso jigucchati hirīyati,
atk-s0404a0:36_5: tasmā taṃ jegucchitaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.
atk-s0404a0:37_0: Puna brāhmaṇo tadeva abhivādanādikammaṃ bhagavati apassanto “ayaṃ idaṃ lokajeṭṭhakakammaṃ vineti vināseti,
atk-s0404a0:37_1: atha vā yasmā etaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0404a0:37_2: tasmā ayaṃ vinetabbo niggaṇhitabbo”ti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ venayikoti āha.
atk-s0404a0:37_9: Bhagavā pana yasmā rāgādīnaṃ vinayāya vūpasamāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0404a0:37_14: Svāyaṃ taṃ venayikabhāvaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.
atk-s0404a0:38_0: Puna brāhmaṇo yasmā abhivādanādīni sāmīcikammāni karontā vayovuddhe tosenti hāsenti,
atk-s0404a0:38_1: akarontā pana tāpenti vihesenti domanassaṃ nesaṃ uppādenti,
atk-s0404a0:38_3: tasmā “ayaṃ vayovuddhe tapatī”ti maññamāno sappurisācāravirahitattā vā “kapaṇapuriso aya”nti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ tapassīti āha.
atk-s0404a0:38_9: Dutiye atthavikappe byañjanāni avicāretvā loke kapaṇapuriso tapassīti vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:38_10: Bhagavā pana ye akusalā dhammā lokaṃ tapanato tapanīyāni vuccanti,
atk-s0404a0:38_11: tesaṃ pahīnattā yasmā tapassīti saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0404a0:38_12: Tasmā taṃ tapassitaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.
atk-s0404a0:38_16: Te tape assi nirassi pahāsi viddhaṃsīti tapassī.
atk-s0404a0:39_0: Puna brāhmaṇo taṃ abhivādanādikammaṃ devalokagabbhasampattiyā devalokapaṭisandhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattatīti
atk-s0404a0:39_1: maññamāno bhagavati cassa abhāvaṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ apagabbhoti āha.
atk-s0404a0:39_2: Kodhavasena vā bhagavato mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassentopi evamāha.
atk-s0404a0:39_8: Hīno vāssa mātukucchismiṃ gabbhavāso ahosīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0404a0:39_9: Bhagavato pana yasmā āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā apagatā,
atk-s0404a0:39_10: tasmā so taṃ apagabbhataṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.
atk-s0404a0:39_12: āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbatti pahīnāti etesaṃ padānaṃ evamattho daṭṭhabbo –
atk-s0404a0:39_14: yassa puggalassa anāgate gabbhaseyyā punabbhave ca abhinibbatti anuttarena maggena vihatakāraṇattā pahīnā.
atk-s0404a0:40_1: Punabbhavo eva abhinibbatti punabbhavābhinibbattīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0404a0:40_2: Yathā ca viññāṇaṭṭhitīti vuttepi na viññāṇato aññā ṭhiti atthi,
atk-s0404a0:40_3: evamidhāpi na gabbhato aññā seyyā veditabbā.
atk-s0404a0:40_4: Abhinibbatti ca nāma yasmā punabbhavabhūtāpi apunabbhavabhūtāpi atthi,
atk-s0404a0:41_0: Evaṃ āgatakālato paṭṭhāya arasarūpatādīhi aṭṭhahi akkosavatthūhi akkosantampi brāhmaṇaṃ bhagavā dhammissaro
atk-s0404a0:41_1: dhammarājā dhammasāmī tathāgato anukampāya sītaleneva cakkhunā brāhmaṇaṃ olekento yaṃ dhammadhātuṃ paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0404a0:41_3: tassā dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā vigatavalāhake nabhe puṇṇacando viya ca saradakāle sūriyo viya ca
atk-s0404a0:41_4: brāhmaṇassa hadayandhakāraṃ vidhamento tāniyeva akkosavatthūni tena tena pariyāyena aññathā dassetvā
atk-s0404a0:41_5: punapi attano karuṇāvipphāraṃ aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi akampiyabhāvena paṭiladdhatādiguṇalakkhaṇaṃ pathavisamacittataṃ
atk-s0404a0:41_6: akuppadhammatañca pakāsento “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo kevalaṃ palitasirakhaṇḍadantavalittacatādīhi attano vuddhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0404a0:41_8: no ca kho jānāti attānaṃ jātiyā anugataṃ jarāya anusaṭaṃ byādhino adhibhūtaṃ maraṇena abbhāhataṃ ajja
atk-s0404a0:41_10: Mahantena kho pana ussāhena mama santikaṃ āgato,
atk-s0404a0:41_11: tadassa āgamanaṃ sātthakaṃ hotū”ti cintetvā imasmiṃ loke attano appaṭisamaṃ purejātabhāvaṃ dassento seyyathāpi,
atk-s0404a0:42_0: Tattha seyyathāpītiādīnaṃ heṭṭhā vutanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0404a0:42_2: heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva hi te kukkuṭapotakā pakkhe vidhunantā taṃkhaṇānurūpaṃ viravantā nikkhamanti.
atk-s0404a0:42_3: Evaṃ nikkhamantānañca tesaṃ yo paṭhamataraṃ nikkhamati,
atk-s0404a0:42_5: Tasmā bhagavā tāya upamāya attano jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ sādhetukāmo brāhmaṇaṃ pucchati –
atk-s0404a0:42_9: Kinti svāssa vacanīyoti so kinti vacanīyo assa,
atk-s0404a0:42_10: kiṃ vattabbo bhaveyya jeṭṭho vā kaniṭṭho vāti.
atk-s0404a0:43_8: Athassa bhagavā opammaṃ sampaṭipādento evameva khoti āha,
atk-s0404a0:43_14: avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhesu sattesūpi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:43_16: Yathā hi aṇḍe nibbattā ekacce sattā aṇḍabhūtāti vuccanti,
atk-s0404a0:43_17: evamayaṃ sabbāpi pajā avijjaṇḍakose nibbattattā aṇḍabhūtāti vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:43_18: Pariyonaddhāyāti tena avijjaṇḍakosena samantato onaddhāya baddhāya veṭhitāya.
atk-s0404a0:43_19: Avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvāti taṃ avijjāmayaṃ aṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā.
atk-s0404a0:43_20: Ekova loketi sakalepi lokasannivāse ahameva eko adutiyo.
atk-s0404a0:43_21: Anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti uttararahitaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ sammā sāmañca bodhiṃ,
atk-s0404a0:43_35: buddhānaṃ pana sabbaguṇasampattiṃ deti abhiseko viya rañño sabbalokissarabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:43_36: Tasmā aññassa kassacipi anuttarā bodhi na hotīti.
atk-s0404a0:44_0: Idāni yadetaṃ bhagavatā “evameva kho”tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ opammasampaṭipādanaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:44_2: yathā hi tassā kukkuṭiyā attano aṇḍesu adhisayanāditividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:44_3: evaṃ bodhipallaṅke nisinnassa bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato attano santāne aniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:44_5: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyāsampādanena aṇḍānaṃ apūtibhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena vipassanāñāṇassa aparihāni.
atk-s0404a0:44_6: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍānaṃ allasinehapariyādānaṃ viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena
atk-s0404a0:44_8: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍakapālānaṃ tanubhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo,
atk-s0404a0:44_9: kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭapotakassa pādanakhatuṇḍakānaṃ thaddhakharabhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa
atk-s0404a0:44_11: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭapotakassa pariṇāmakālo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena
atk-s0404a0:44_13: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭapotakassa pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā
atk-s0404a0:44_14: pakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā abhinibbhidākālo viya bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena vipassanāñāṇagabbhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:44_15: gaṇhāpetvā anupubbādhigatena arahattamaggena avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhiññāpakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā
atk-s0404a0:45_2: yathā tesaṃ kukkuṭapotakānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhinibbatto kukkuṭapotako jeṭṭho hoti,
atk-s0404a0:45_3: evaṃ avijjāgatāya pajāya taṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā paṭhamataraṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātattā ahañhi jeṭṭho vuddhatamoti saṅkhaṃ gato,
atk-s0404a0:46_0: Evaṃ bhagavā attano anuttaraṃ jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ brāhmaṇassa pakāsetvā idāni yāya paṭipadāya taṃ adhigato,
atk-s0404a0:46_1: taṃ paṭipadaṃ pubbabhāgato pabhuti dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ kho pana me,
atk-s0404a0:46_3: Tattha āraddhaṃ kho pana me, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0404a0:46_5: na mayā ayaṃ anuttaro jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvo kusītena muṭṭhassatinā sāraddhakāyena vikkhittacitena adhigato,
atk-s0404a0:46_6: apica kho tadadhigamāya āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0404a0:46_7: Bodhimaṇḍe nisinnena mayā catusammappadhānabhedaṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0404a0:46_9: Āraddhattāyeva ca me taṃ asallīnaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0404a0:46_13: Passaddho kāyo asāraddhoti kāyacittappassaddhivasena kāyopi me passaddho ahosi.
atk-s0404a0:46_14: Tattha yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hoti,
atk-s0404a0:46_16: Asāraddhoti so ca kho passaddhattāyeva asāraddho,
atk-s0404a0:46_18: Samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekagganti cittampi me sammā āhitaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ appitaṃ viya ahosi,
atk-s0404a0:46_19: samāhitattā eva ca ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandananti.
atk-s0404a0:47_0: Idāni imāya paṭipadāya adhigataṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā vijjāttayapariyosānaṃ visesaṃ dassento so kho ahantiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:47_1: Tattha yaṃ yāva vinicchayanayena vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0404a0:48_5: Tamoti sveva moho tappaṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamo nāma.
atk-s0404a0:48_6: Ālokoti sā eva vijjā obhāsakaraṇaṭṭhena ālokoti.
atk-s0404a0:48_16: Satiyā avippavāsena appamattassa vīriyātāpena ātāpino kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhātāya pahitattassa pesitattassāti attho.
atk-s0404a0:48_18: yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā vihaññeyya,
atk-s0404a0:48_25: Etassa me padhānānuyogassa anurūpameva phalaṃ laddhanti.
atk-s0404a0:49_1: paṭhamā abhinibbhidā ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhāti ayaṃ kho mama, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0404a0:49_2: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇamukhatuṇḍakena pubbe nivutthakhandhappaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā paṭhamā
atk-s0404a0:49_3: abhinibbhidā paṭhamā nikkhanti paṭhamā ariyājāti ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva mukhatuṇḍakena vā pādanakhasikhāya
atk-s0404a0:49_4: vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tamhā aṇḍakosamhā abhinibbhidā nikkhanti kukkuṭanikāye paccājātīti.
atk-s0404a0:50_2: Yathā pana pubbenivāsakathāyaṃ “pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇamukhatuṇḍakena pubbe nivutthakkhandhappaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:51_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahitaṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇādhigamaṃ brāhmaṇassa dassento ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0404a0:51_5: tatiyā abhinibbhidā ahosīti ettha ayaṃ kho mama, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0404a0:51_6: āsavānaṃ khayañāṇamukhatuṇḍakena catusaccapaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tatiyā abhinibbhidā
atk-s0404a0:51_7: tatiyā nikkhanti tatiyā ariyajāti ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva mukhatuṇḍakena vā pādanakhasikhāya vā aṇḍakosaṃ
atk-s0404a0:51_8: padāletvā tamhā aṇḍakosamhā abhinibbhidā nikkhanti kukkuṭanikāye paccājātīti.
atk-s0404a0:52_0: Ettāvatā kiṃ dassesīti? So hi, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0404a0:52_1: kukkuṭacchāpako aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tato nikkhamanto sakimeva jāyati,
atk-s0404a0:52_2: ahaṃ pana pubbenivutthakkhandhappaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā paṭhamaṃ tāva pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇavijjāya jāto.
atk-s0404a0:52_3: Tato sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhippaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā dutiyaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇavijjāya jāto,
atk-s0404a0:52_4: puna catusaccappaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tatiyaṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇavijjāya jāto.
atk-s0404a0:52_6: Sā ca me jāti ariyā suparisuddhāti idaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0404a0:52_9: āsavakkhayena sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇanti evaṃ tīhi vijjāhi sabbepi sabbaññuguṇe pakāsetvā attano ariyāya
atk-s0404a0:53_0: Evaṃ vutte verañjo brāhmaṇoti evaṃ bhagavatā lokānukampakena brāhmaṇaṃ anukampamānena niguhitabbepi attano
atk-s0404a0:53_1: ariyāya jātiyā jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāve vijjāttayapakāsikāya dhammadesanāya vutte pītivipphāraparipuṇṇagattacitto
atk-s0404a0:53_2: verañjo brāhmaṇo taṃ bhagavato ariyāya jātiyā jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ viditvā “īdisaṃ nāmāhaṃ sabbalokajeṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:53_3: sabbaguṇasamannāgataṃ sabbaññuṃ ‘aññesaṃ abhivādanādikammaṃ na karotī’ti avacaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:53_5: aññāṇa”nti attānaṃ garahitvā “ayaṃ dāni loke ariyāya jātiyā purejātaṭṭhena jeṭṭho,
atk-s0404a0:53_6: sabbaguṇehi appaṭisamaṭṭhena seṭṭho”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0404a0:53_7: jeṭṭho bhavaṃ gotamo seṭṭho bhavaṃ gotamoti.
atk-s0404a0:53_8: Evañca pana vatvā puna taṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ abbhanumodamāno abhikkantaṃ bho gotamātiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:55_5: catūhi disāhi āgatamanussā paṭhamaṃ tattha vissamitvā pacchā attano attano phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0404a0:55_7: Tattha hi nisīditvā licchavirājāno rajjakiccaṃ santharanti karonti vicārenti.
atk-s0404a0:55_8: Sannisinnāti tesaṃ nisīdanatthaññeva paññattesu mahārahavarapaccattharaṇesu samussitasetacchattesu āsanesu sannisinnā.
atk-s0404a0:55_9: Anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantīti rājakule kiccañceva lokatthacariyañca vicāretvā anekehi kāraṇehi
atk-s0404a0:55_11: Paṇḍitā hi te rājāno saddhā pasannā sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi ariyasāvakā,
atk-s0404a0:55_12: te sabbepi lokiyajaṭaṃ chinditvā buddhādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
atk-s0404a0:55_17: “dukkaraṃ vata kataṃ sammāsambuddhena kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkheyyāni dasa pāramiyo,
atk-s0404a0:55_22: buddhacariyaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajantenā”ti aḍḍhacchakkehi jātakasatehi buddhavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:56_0: Dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā pana “tena bhagavatā dhammo desito,
atk-s0404a0:57_0: Saṅghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā “paṭiladdhasaddhā kulaputtā bhogakkhandhañceva ñātiparivaṭṭañca
atk-s0404a0:57_1: pahāya setacchattaṃ oparajjaṃ senāpatiseṭṭhibhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhānantarādīni agaṇetvā nikkhamma satthu varasāsane
atk-s0404a0:57_3: Setacchattaṃ pahāya pabbajitānaṃ bhaddiyarājamahākappinapukkusātiādīnaṃ rājapabbajitānaṃyeva buddhakāle asītisahassāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0404a0:57_4: Anekakoṭisataṃ dhanaṃ pahāya pabbajitānaṃ pana yasakulaputtasoṇaseṭṭhiputtaraṭṭhapālakulaputtādīnaṃ paricchedo natthi.
atk-s0404a0:57_5: Evarūpā ca evarūpā ca kulaputtā satthu sāsane pabbajantī”ti pabbajjāsaṅkhepavasena saṅghaguṇe kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:58_1: Vesāliyañhi satta sahassāni satta satāni satta ca rājāno.
atk-s0404a0:58_2: Te sabbepi sannipatitvā sabbesaṃ manaṃ gahetvā “raṭṭhaṃ vicāretuṃ samatthaṃ ekaṃ vicinathā”ti vicinantā
atk-s0404a0:58_3: sīhaṃ rājakumāraṃ disvā “ayaṃ sakkhissatī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā tassa rattamaṇivaṇṇaṃ kambalapariyonaddhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:58_13: Nisinno hotīti sesarājūnaṃ parisāya antarantare āsanāni paññāpayiṃsu,
atk-s0404a0:58_14: sīhassa pana majjhe ṭhāneti tasmiṃ paññatte mahārahe rājāsane nisinno hoti.
atk-s0404a0:58_16: na hete yassa vā tassa vā appesakkhassa evaṃ anekasatehi kāraṇehi vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
atk-s0404a0:59_0: Yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto tenupasaṅkamīti nigaṇṭho kira nāṭaputto “sacāyaṃ sīho kassacideva samaṇassa gotamassa
atk-s0404a0:59_1: vaṇṇaṃ kathentassa sutvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamissati,
atk-s0404a0:59_2: mayhaṃ parihāni bhavissatī”ti cintetvā paṭhamataraṃyeva sīhaṃ senāpatiṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0404a0:59_3: “senāpati imasmiṃ loke ‘ahaṃ buddho ahaṃ buddho’ti bahū vicaranti.
atk-s0404a0:59_4: Sace tvaṃ kassaci dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo ahosi,
atk-s0404a0:59_8: So taṃ kathaṃ anussaritvā “sace maṃ pesessati,
atk-s0404a0:59_10: na gamissāmī”ti cintetvā yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto,
atk-s0404a0:60_0: Athassa vacanaṃ sutvā nigaṇṭho mahāpabbatena viya balavasokena otthaṭo “yattha dānissāhaṃ gamanaṃ na icchāmi,
atk-s0404a0:60_2: hatohamasmī”ti anattamano hutvā “paṭibāhanupāyamassa karissāmī”ti cintetvā kiṃ pana tvantiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:60_3: Evaṃ vadanto vicarantaṃ goṇaṃ daṇḍena paharanto viya jalamānaṃ padīpaṃ nibbāpento viya bhattabharitaṃ
atk-s0404a0:60_4: pattaṃ nikkujjanto viya ca sīhassa uppannapītiṃ vināsesi.
atk-s0404a0:61_1: Imasmiñca vāre buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā tusitabhavanato paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhipallaṅkā dasabalassa
atk-s0404a0:61_4: Dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā “ekapadepi ekabyañjanepi avakhalitaṃ nāma natthī”ti sukathitavaseneva dhammaguṇaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:61_5: Saṅghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā “evarūpaṃ yasasirivibhavaṃ pahāya satthu sāsane pabbajitā na kosajjapakatikā honti,
atk-s0404a0:61_6: terasasu pana dhutaṅgaguṇesu paripūrakārino hutvā sattasu anupassanāsu kammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0404a0:62_0: Tatiyavāre pana buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsamānā “itipi so bhagavā”ti suttantapariyāyeneva buddhaguṇe kathayiṃsu,
atk-s0404a0:62_2: “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”tiādinā suttantapariyāyeneva saṅghaguṇe ca kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:62_4: “imesañca licchavirājakumārānaṃ tatiyadivasato paṭṭhāya buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe kathentānaṃ mukhaṃ nappahoti,
atk-s0404a0:62_6: imaṃ dāni uppannaṃ pītiṃ avijahitvāva ahaṃ ajja sammāsambuddhaṃ passissāmī”ti.
atk-s0404a0:62_7: Athassa “kiṃ hi me karissanti nigaṇṭhā”ti vitakko udapādi.
atk-s0404a0:62_8: Tattha kiṃ hi me karissantīti kiṃ nāma mayhaṃ nigaṇṭhā karissanti.
atk-s0404a0:62_9: Apalokitā vā anapalokitā vāti āpucchitā vā anāpucchitā vā.
atk-s0404a0:62_10: Na hi me te āpucchitā yānavāhanasampattiṃ,
atk-s0404a0:63_0: Vesāliyā niyyāsīti yathā hi gimhakāle deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ sandamānaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā thokameva gantvā tiṭṭhati nappavattati,
atk-s0404a0:63_1: evaṃ sīhassa paṭhamadivase “dasabalaṃ passissāmī”ti uppannāya pītiyā nigaṇṭhena paṭibāhitakālo.
atk-s0404a0:63_2: Yathāpi dutiyadivase deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ sandamānaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā thokaṃ gantvā vālikāpuñjaṃ paharitvā appavattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0404a0:63_3: evaṃ sīhassa dutiyadivase “dasabalaṃ passissāmī”ti uppannāya pītiyā nigaṇṭhena paṭibāhitakālo.
atk-s0404a0:63_4: Yathā tatiyadivase deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ sandamānaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā purāṇapaṇṇasukkhadaṇḍakaṭṭhakacavarādīni
atk-s0404a0:63_6: evaṃ sīho tatiyadivase tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ guṇakathaṃ sutvā uppanne pītipāmojje “aphalā nigaṇṭhā nipphalā nigaṇṭhā,
atk-s0404a0:63_8: gamissāmahaṃ satthusantika”nti manaṃ abhinīharitvā vesāliyā niyyāsi.
atk-s0404a0:63_9: Niyyanto ca “cirassāhaṃ dasabalassa santikaṃ gantukāmo jāto,
atk-s0404a0:63_10: na kho pana me yuttaṃ aññātakavesena gantu”nti “yekeci dasabalassa santikaṃ gantukāmā,
atk-s0404a0:63_11: sabbe nikkhamantū”ti ghosanaṃ kāretvā pañcarathasatāni yojāpetvā uttamarathe ṭhito tehi ceva pañcahi
atk-s0404a0:63_12: rathasatehi mahatiyā ca parisāya parivuto gandhapupphacuṇṇavāsādīni gāhāpetvā niyyāsi.
atk-s0404a0:64_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti ārāmaṃ pavisanto dūratova asīti-
atk-s0404a0:64_4: mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni chabbaṇṇaghanabuddharasmiyo ca disvā “evarūpaṃ nāma purisaṃ evaṃ āsanne vasantaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ nāddasaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:64_6: alābhā vata me”ti cintetvā mahānidhiṃ disvā daliddapuriso viya sañjātapītipāmojjo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0404a0:64_7: Dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarontīti bhotā gotamena vuttakāraṇassa anukāraṇaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0404a0:64_8: Kāraṇavacano hettha dhammasaddo “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0404a0:64_9: Kāraṇanti cettha tathāpavattassa saddassa attho adhippeto tassa pavattihetubhāvato.
atk-s0404a0:64_11: Anukāraṇanti eso eva parehi tathā vuccamāno.
atk-s0404a0:64_13: Parehi vuttakāraṇehi sakāraṇo hutvā tumhākaṃ vādo vā tato paraṃ tassa anuvādo vā koci appamattakopi viññūhi garahitabbaṃ ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na āgacchati.
atk-s0404a0:64_15: kiṃ sabbākārenapi tava vāde gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0404a0:64_17: Atthi sīhapariyāyotiādīnaṃ attho verañjakaṇḍe āgatanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0404a0:64_19: Assāsāya dhammaṃ desemīti assāsanatthāya santhambhanatthāya dhammaṃ desemi.
atk-s0404a0:64_20: Iti bhagavā aṭṭhahaṅgehi sīhassa senāpatissa dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0404a0:65_0: Anuviccakāranti anuviditvā cintetvā tulayitvā kattabbaṃ karohīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:65_2: Tumhādisasmiñhi maṃ disvā maṃ saraṇaṃ gacchante nigaṇṭhaṃ disvā nigaṇṭhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchante “kiṃ ayaṃ
atk-s0404a0:65_3: sīho diṭṭhadiṭṭhameva saraṇaṃ gacchatī”ti garahā uppajjati,
atk-s0404a0:65_5: Paṭākaṃ parihareyyunti te kira evarūpaṃ sāvakaṃ labhitvā “asuko nāma rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā seṭṭhi
atk-s0404a0:65_6: vā amhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gato sāvako jāto”ti paṭākaṃ ukkhipitvā nagare ghosentā āhiṇḍanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0404a0:65_8: Sace panassa “kimahaṃ etesaṃ saraṇaṃ gato”ti vippaṭisāro uppajjeyya,
atk-s0404a0:65_9: tampi so “etesaṃ me saraṇagatabhāvaṃ bahū jānanti,
atk-s0404a0:65_10: dukkhaṃ idāni paṭinivattitu”nti vinodetvā na paṭikkamissatīti ca. Tenāha –
atk-s0404a0:65_14: Dātabbaṃ maññeyyāsīti pubbe dasapi vīsatipi saṭṭhipi jane āgate disvā natthīti avatvā desi,
atk-s0404a0:65_15: idāni maṃ saraṇaṃ gatakāraṇamatteneva mā imesaṃ deyyadhammaṃ upacchindi.
atk-s0404a0:65_20: Te kira kulagharesu evaṃ pakāsenti “mayaṃ yassa kassaci sampattassa dātabbanti vadāma,
atk-s0404a0:65_21: samaṇo pana gotamo ‘mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ nāññesaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:66_3: Tattha dānakathanti idaṃ dānaṃ nāma sukhānaṃ nidānaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:66_7: idhalokaparalokesu dānasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi.
atk-s0404a0:66_28: sasabhūtena jalitaaggikkhandhe attānaṃ niyyādentena sampattayācakānaṃ cittaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:66_29: Dānañhi loke sakkasampattiṃ deti mārasampattiṃ brahmasampattiṃ,
atk-s0404a0:67_0: Yasmā pana dānaṃ dento sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0404a0:67_2: Sīlakathanti sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:67_4: ahaṃ saṅkhapālanāgarājakāle bhūridattanāgarājakāle campeyyanāgarājakāle sīlavarājakāle mātuposakahatthirājakāle
atk-s0404a0:67_6: Idhalokaparalokasampattīnañhi sīlasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0404a0:67_10: Sīlālaṅkārena hi alaṅkataṃ sīlagandhānulittaṃ sadevakopi loko olokento tittiṃ na gacchatīti evamādisīlaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:68_0: “Idaṃ pana sīlaṃ nissāya ayaṃ saggo labbhatī”ti dassetuṃ sīlānantaraṃ saggakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0404a0:68_1: Saggakathanti “ayaṃ saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo,
atk-s0404a0:68_4: cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni dibbasukhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanti,
atk-s0404a0:68_5: tāvatiṃsā tisso ca vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānī”ti evamādisaggaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:69_0: Evaṃ saggakathāya palobhetvā pana hatthiṃ alaṅkaritvā tassa soṇḍaṃ chindanto viya “ayampi saggo anicco addhuvo,
atk-s0404a0:69_1: na ettha chandarāgo kattabbo”ti dassanatthaṃ “appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā,
atk-s0404a0:69_2: ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”tiādinā nayena kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0404a0:69_5: Saṃkilesoti tehi sattānaṃ saṃsāre saṃkilissanaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0404a0:70_0: Evaṃ kāmādīnavena tajjetvā nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0404a0:70_2: Sāmukkaṃsikāti sāmaṃ ukkaṃsikā attanāyeva uddharitvā gahitā,
atk-s0404a0:70_11: Tassa uppattiākāradassanatthaṃ yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti āha.
atk-s0404a0:70_12: Tañhi nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccavasena evaṃ sabbasaṅkhataṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0404a0:70_20: na paraṃ saddhāya ettha vattatīti aparappaccayo.
atk-s0404a0:71_0: Pavattamaṃsanti pakatiyā pavattaṃ kappiyamaṃsaṃ mūlaṃ gahetvā antarāpaṇe pariyesāhīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0404a0:71_2: Thūlaṃ pasunti thūlaṃ mahāsarīraṃ gokaṇṇamahiṃsasūkarasaṅkhātaṃ pasuṃ.
atk-s0404a0:71_5: Paṭiccakammanti svāyaṃ taṃ maṃsaṃ paṭicca taṃ pāṇavadhakammaṃ phusati.
atk-s0404a0:71_11: taṃ paṭiccakammaṃ ettha atthīti maṃsampi paṭiccakammanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:71_15: Na ca paneteti ete āyasmanto dīgharattaṃ avaṇṇakāmā hutvā avaṇṇaṃ bhāsantāpi abbhācikkhantā na jiridanti,
atk-s0404a0:71_17: Atha vā lajjanatthe idaṃ jiridantīti padaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:73_2: Tassaṃ disāyaṃ jāto hotīti tassaṃ sindhunadītīradisāyaṃ jāto hoti.
atk-s0404a0:73_4: Allaṃ vā sukkhaṃ vāti allatiṇaṃ vā sukkhatiṇaṃ vā.
atk-s0404a0:73_5: Nāññe asse ubbejetāti aññe asse na ubbejeti na paharati na ḍaṃsati na kalahaṃ karoti.
atk-s0404a0:73_12: Yāva jīvitamaraṇapariyādānāti yāva jīvitassa maraṇena pariyosānā.
atk-s0404a0:73_13: Sakkaccaṃ paribhuñjatīti amataṃ viya paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjati.
atk-s0404a0:75_2: Piṭṭhito rathaṃ pavattetīti khandhaṭṭhikena yugaṃ uppīḷitvā pacchimabhāgena rathaṃ pavaṭṭento osakkati.
atk-s0404a0:75_4: kubbaraṃ hanatīti dve pacchimapāde ukkhipitvā tehi paharitvā rathakubbaraṃ bhindati.
atk-s0404a0:75_5: Tidaṇḍaṃ bhañjatīti rathassa purato tayo daṇḍakā honti,
atk-s0404a0:75_7: Rathīsāya satthiṃ ussajjitvāti sīsaṃ nāmetvā yugaṃ bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā satthinā rathīsaṃ paharitvā.
atk-s0404a0:75_8: Ajjhomaddatīti dvīhi purimapādehi īsaṃ maddanto tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0404a0:75_9: Ubbaṭumaṃ rathaṃ karotīti thalaṃ vā kaṇḍakaṭṭhānaṃ vā rathaṃ āropeti.
atk-s0404a0:75_12: Khīlaṭṭhāyīti cattāro pāde thambhe viya niccalaṃ ṭhapetvā khīlaṭṭhānasadisena ṭhānena tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0404a0:77_1: Pañcame asajjhāyamalāti uggahitamantānaṃ asajjhāyakaraṇaṃ malaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0404a0:77_2: Anuṭṭhānamalā gharāti uṭṭhānavīriyābhāvo gharānaṃ malaṃ nāma.
atk-s0404a0:77_5: Avijjā paramaṃ malanti tato sesākusaladhammamalato aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇabhūtā vaṭṭamūlasaṅkhātā bahalandhakāraavijjā paramaṃ malaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:79_2: Gantumarahatīti taṃ dūteyyasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanaṃ dhāretvā harituṃ arahati.
atk-s0404a0:79_3: Sotāti yo taṃ assa sāsanaṃ deti,
atk-s0404a0:79_5: Sāvetāti taṃ uggaṇhitvā “idaṃ nāma tumhehi vutta”nti paṭisāvetā.
atk-s0404a0:79_12: upagatānupagatesu cheko sāsanaṃ ārocento sahitaṃ sallakkhetvā āroceti.
atk-s0404a0:83_3: Asuresu hi vepacitti rāhu pahārādoti ime tayo jeṭṭhakā.
atk-s0404a0:83_4: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti dasabalassa abhisambuddhadivasato paṭṭhāya “ajja gamissāmi sve gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0404a0:83_5: ekādasa vassāni atikkamitvā dvādasame vasse satthu verañjāyaṃ vasanakāle “sammāsambuddhassa santikaṃ
atk-s0404a0:83_6: gamissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā “mama ‘ajja sve’ti dvādasa vassāni jātāni,
atk-s0404a0:83_7: handāhaṃ idāneva gacchāmī”ti taṅkhaṇaṃyeva asuragaṇaparivuto asurabhavanā nikkhamitvā divā divassa yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0404a0:83_8: ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsīti so kira “tathāgataṃ pañhaṃ pucchitvā eva dhammaṃ suṇissāmī”ti āgato,
atk-s0404a0:83_9: tathāgatassa pana diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya buddhagāravena pucchituṃ asakkonto api satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0404a0:83_11: “ayaṃ pahārādo mayi akathente paṭhamataraṃ kathetuṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0404a0:83_12: ciṇṇavasiṭṭhāneyeva naṃ kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ ekaṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti.
atk-s0404a0:84_0: Atha naṃ pucchanto api pana pahārādātiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:84_3: So “pariciṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva maṃ bhagavā pucchatī”ti attamano hutvā abhiramanti,
atk-s0404a0:84_6: Na āyatakeneva papātoti na chinnataṭamahāsobbho viya āditova papāto.
atk-s0404a0:84_8: gambhīro hutvā gacchanto sinerupādamūle caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro hutvā ṭhitoti dasseti.
atk-s0404a0:85_2: Thalaṃ ussāretīti hatthena gahetvā viya vīcipahāreneva thalaṃ khipati.
atk-s0404a0:86_0: Gaṅgāyamunāti idha ṭhatvā imāsaṃ nadīnaṃ uppattikathaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0404a0:86_2: tattha catusahassayojanaparimāṇo padeso udakena ajjhotthaṭo mahāsamuddoti saṅkhaṃ gato,
atk-s0404a0:86_4: tisahassayojanappamāṇe himavā patiṭṭhito ubbedhena pañcayojanasatiko caturāsītikūṭasahassapaṭimaṇḍito samantato sandamānapañcasatanadīvicitto,
atk-s0404a0:86_5: yattha āyāmavitthārena ca gambhīrato ca paṇṇāsapaṇṇāsayojanā diyaḍḍhayojanasataparimaṇḍalā anotattadaho
atk-s0404a0:86_6: kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho mandākinidaho sīhappapātadahoti satta mahāsarā
atk-s0404a0:87_0: Tesu anotatto sudassanakūṭaṃ cittakūṭaṃ kāḷakūṭaṃ gandhamādanakūṭaṃ kelāsakūṭanti imehi pañcahi pabbatehi parikkhitto.
atk-s0404a0:87_1: Tattha sudassanakūṭaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ dviyojanasatubbedhaṃ antovaṅkaṃ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0404a0:87_5: mūlagandho sāragandho pheggugandho tacagandho papaṭikāgandho rasagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho
atk-s0404a0:87_7: nānappakāraosadhasañchannaṃ kāḷapakkhauposathadivase ādittamiva aṅgāraṃ jalantaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0404a0:87_9: Sabbāni sudassanena samānubbedhasaṇṭhānāni tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni.
atk-s0404a0:87_10: Tāni sabbāni devānubhāvena nāgānubhāvena ca vassanti,
atk-s0404a0:87_13: Candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena tattha obhāsaṃ karonti,
atk-s0404a0:88_0: Tattha manoharasilātalāni nimmacchakacchapāni phalikasadisanimmalodakāni nhānatitthāni supaṭiyattāni honti,
atk-s0404a0:88_1: yesu buddhā khīṇāsavā ca paccekabuddhā ca iddhimantā ca isayo nhāyanti,
atk-s0404a0:89_7: Puratthimadisato nikkhantanadī anotattaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā itarā tisso nadiyo anupagamma pācīnahimavanteneva
atk-s0404a0:89_9: Pacchimadisato ca uttaradisato ca nikkhantanadiyopi tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pacchimahimavanteneva uttarahimavanteneva
atk-s0404a0:89_11: Dakkhiṇamukhato nikkhantanadī pana taṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā uttarena ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭheneva
atk-s0404a0:89_12: saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā pabbataṃ paharitvā uṭṭhāya parikkhepena tigāvutappamāṇā udakadhārā hutvā ākāsena
atk-s0404a0:89_13: saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā tiyaggaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patitā,
atk-s0404a0:89_15: Tattha paññāsayojanappamāṇā tiyaggaḷā nāma mahāpokkharaṇī jātā,
atk-s0404a0:89_16: pokkharaṇiyā kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhi yojanāni gatā.
atk-s0404a0:89_17: Tato ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā ummaṅgena saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā giñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā
atk-s0404a0:89_18: hatthatale pañcaṅgulisadisā pañca dhārā hutvā pavattati.
atk-s0404a0:89_19: Sā tikkhattuṃ anotattaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne āvattagaṅgāti vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:89_20: Ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne kaṇhagaṅgā,
atk-s0404a0:89_23: kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne bahalagaṅgāti,
atk-s0404a0:89_24: umaṅgena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne umaṅgagaṅgāti vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:89_25: Viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā pañca dhārā hutvā pavattanaṭṭhāne pana gaṅgā, yamunā,
atk-s0404a0:89_28: Evametā pañca mahānadiyo himavantato pavattantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0404a0:90_0: Savantiyoti yā kāci savamānā gacchantī mahānadiyo vā kunnadiyo vā.
atk-s0404a0:90_6: jālakkhipādīni ādāya macchakacchape gaṇhissāmā”ti vā “imasmiṃ kāle mahantā vuṭṭhi,
atk-s0404a0:90_7: labhissāma nu kho piṭṭhipasāraṇaṭṭhāna”nti vā vattuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0404a0:90_8: Paṭhamakappikakālato paṭṭhāya hi yaṃ sinerumekhalaṃ āhacca udakaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:90_9: tato ekaṅgulamattampi udakaṃ neva heṭṭhā osīdati,
atk-s0404a0:92_0: Aṭṭha pahārādāti satthā aṭṭhapi dhamme vattuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0404a0:92_3: ahampi teheva sarikkhake katvā kathessāmīti cintetvā evamāha.
atk-s0404a0:92_6: anupubbapaṭipadāya satta anupassanā aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā aṭṭhatiṃsa ārammaṇavibhattiyo sattatiṃsa bodhapakkhiyadhammā.
atk-s0404a0:92_7: Na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedhoti maṇḍūkassa uppatitvā gamanaṃ viya āditova sīlapūraṇādiṃ akatvā arahattappaṭivedho nāma natthi,
atk-s0404a0:92_8: paṭipāṭiyā pana sīlasamādhipaññāyo pūretvāva sakkā arahattaṃ pattunti attho.
atk-s0404a0:93_1: Na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃ vāti asaṅkhyeyyepi kappe buddhesu anuppannesu ekasattopi parinibbātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0404a0:93_3: Buddhakāle ca pana ekekasmiṃ samāgame asaṅkhyeyyāpi sattā amataṃ ārādhenti,
atk-s0404a0:95_1: Dasame nisinno hotīti uposathakaraṇatthāya upāsikāya ratanapāsāde nisinno.
atk-s0404a0:95_2: Nisajja pana bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni olokento ekaṃ dussīlapuggalaṃ disvā “sacāhaṃ imasmiṃ puggale nisinneyeva pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmi,
atk-s0404a0:95_3: sattadhā tassa muddhā phalissatī”ti tassa anukampāya tuṇhīyeva ahosi.
atk-s0404a0:97_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame paññatte āsane nisīdīti tassa kira ghare pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pañca āsanasatāni niccaṃ paññattāneva honti,
atk-s0404a0:97_5: Cittaṃ pasīdīti “buddho nu kho na buddho nu kho”ti vitakkamattampi na uppajji,
atk-s0404a0:97_6: ayameva buddhoti cittuppādo pasanno anāvilo ahosi.
atk-s0404a0:97_7: Sakāni vā ñātikulānīti attano yāpanamattaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā ñātigharāni gacchatu.
atk-s0404a0:97_8: Kassa vo dammīti katarapurisassa tumhe dadāmi,
atk-s0404a0:97_11: idaṃ dassāmi idaṃ na dassāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādentena hi paṭivibhattā nāma hoti,
atk-s0404a0:97_13: Atha kho saṅghikā viya gaṇasantakā viya ca sīlavantehi saddhiṃ sādhāraṇāyeva.
atk-s0404a0:98_0: Anacchariyaṃ kho pana maṃ, bhanteti, bhante,
atk-s0404a0:98_1: yaṃ maṃ devatā upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ ārocenti,
atk-s0404a0:98_3: Yaṃ panāhaṃ tatonidānaṃ cittassa uṇṇatiṃ nābhijānāmi,
atk-s0404a0:98_7: upāsakasseva pana veyyākaraṇasampahaṃsane esa sādhukāroti veditabbo.
atk-s0404a0:100_1: Dutiye nāgavaneti tassa kira seṭṭhino nāgavanaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:100_2: so tattha purebhattaṃ gandhamālādīni gāhāpetvā uyyānakīḷikaṃ kīḷitukāmo gantvā paricāriyamāno bhagavantaṃ addasa.
atk-s0404a0:100_9: imassa bahuka”nti evaṃ cittanānattaṃ na karomi,
atk-s0404a0:100_12: Natthi taṃ saṃyojananti iminā upāsako attano anāgāmiphalaṃ byākaroti.
atk-s0404a0:102_1: Tatiye hatthako āḷavakoti bhagavatā āḷavakayakkhassa hatthato hatthehi sampaṭicchitattā hatthakoti laddhanāmo rājakumāro.
atk-s0404a0:104_1: Catutthe pañcamattehi upāsakasatehīti sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃyeva ariyasāvakaupāsakānaṃ pañcahi satehi
atk-s0404a0:104_2: parivuto bhuttapātarāso gandhamālavilepenacuṇṇāni gahetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0404a0:104_5: Taṃ dānena saṅgaṇhāmīti naṅgalabalibaddabhattabījādīni ceva gandhamālamūlādīni ca datvā saṅgaṇhāmi.
atk-s0404a0:104_8: Atthacariyāyāti “imassa dānena vā piyavacanena vā kiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0404a0:104_9: atthacariyāya saṅgaṇhitabbayuttako aya”nti ñatvā uppannakiccanittharaṇasaṅkhātāya atthacariyāya saṅgaṇhāmi.
atk-s0404a0:104_11: samānattatāya saṅgaṇhitabbo aya”nti ekato khādanapivananisajjādīhi attanā samānaṃ katvā saṅgaṇhāmi.
atk-s0404a0:104_12: Daliddassa kho no tathā sotabbaṃ maññantīti daliddassa kiñci dātuṃ vā kātuṃ vā asakkontassa,
atk-s0404a0:104_13: yathā daliddassa no tathā sotabbaṃ maññanti,
atk-s0404a0:104_17: Yoni kho tyāyanti upāyo kho te ayaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:104_18: Imesu pana dvīsupi suttesu satthārā sīlacāgapaññā missakā kathitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0404a0:106_1: Pañcame atthūpaparikkhitā hotīti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ upaparikkhitā hoti.
atk-s0404a0:110_6: Aṅgārakāsūpamāti santāpanaṭṭhena aṅgārakāsuyā upamitā ime kāmāti.
atk-s0404a0:110_10: Byantibhūtanti vigatantabhūtaṃ ekadesenāpi anallīnaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ visaṃsaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:110_13: Atha vā byantibhūtanti vigatavāyanti attho. Kuto?
atk-s0404a0:112_7: Dīghāyukaṃ devanikāyanti idaṃ asaññaṃ devanikāyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:113_2: Khaṇo ve mā upaccagāti ayaṃ laddho khaṇo mā atikkami.
atk-s0404a0:113_3: Idha ceva naṃ virādhetīti sace koci pamattacārī idha imaṃ khaṇaṃ labhitvāpi saddhammassa niyāmataṃ ariyamaggaṃ virādheti na sampādeti.
atk-s0404a0:113_6: Yathā hi “asukaṭṭhāne bhaṇḍaṃ samuppanna”nti sutvā eko vāṇijo na gaccheyya,
atk-s0404a0:113_10: evaṃ yo idha khaṇaṃ labhitvā appaṭipajjanto saddhammassa niyāmataṃ virādheti,
atk-s0404a0:113_11: so ayaṃ vāṇijova atītattho ciraṃ anutapissati socissati.
atk-s0404a0:113_17: Ye pattā āsavakkhayanti ye arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0404a0:115_1: Dasame cetīsūti cetināmakānaṃ rājūnaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānattā evaṃladdhavohāre raṭṭhe.
atk-s0404a0:115_2: Pācīnavaṃsadāyeti dasabalassa vasanaṭṭhānato pācīnadisāya ṭhite vaṃsadāye nīlobhāsehi veḷūhi sañchanne araññe.
atk-s0404a0:115_3: Evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādīti thero kira pabbajitvā paṭhamaantovassamhiyeva samāpattilābhī hutvā
atk-s0404a0:115_7: dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassalokaṃ olokemi.
atk-s0404a0:115_8: Āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ asallīnaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:115_12: Atha ca pana me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ na vimuccatī”ti.
atk-s0404a0:115_18: idaṃ te mānasmiṃ. Yampi te, āvuso,
atk-s0404a0:115_19: anuruddha evaṃ hoti ‘āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ…pe…
atk-s0404a0:115_23: evaṃ hoti ‘atha ca pana me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ na vimuccatī’ti,
atk-s0404a0:115_25: Sādhu vatāyasmā anuruddho ime tayo dhamme pahāya ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritvā amatāya dhātuyā cittaṃ
atk-s0404a0:115_27: So kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ āpucchitvā cetiraṭṭhaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto aṭṭhamāsaṃ caṅkamena vītināmesi.
atk-s0404a0:115_28: So padhānaveganimmathitattā kilantakāyo ekassa veḷugumbassa heṭṭhā nisīdi.
atk-s0404a0:116_4: Tattha paccayappiccho bahuṃ dente appaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0404a0:116_7: Adhigamappiccho majjhantikatthero viya attano adhigamaṃ aññesaṃ jānituṃ na deti.
atk-s0404a0:116_8: Pariyattiappiccho tepiṭakopi samāno na bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetukāmo hoti sāketatissatthero viya.
atk-s0404a0:116_9: Dhutaṅgappiccho dhutaṅgapariharaṇabhāvaṃ aññesaṃ jānituṃ na deti dvebhātikattheresu jeṭṭhatthero viya.
atk-s0404a0:116_11: Ayaṃ dhammoti evaṃ santaguṇaniguhanena ca paṭiggahaṇe mattaññutāya ca appicchassa puggalassa ayaṃ navalokuttaradhammo sampajjati,
atk-s0404a0:117_0: Santuṭṭhassāti catūsu paccayesu tīhi santosehi santuṭṭhassa.
atk-s0404a0:117_2: Tattha kāyaviveko nāma gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodetvā ārambhavatthuvasena ekībhāvo.
atk-s0404a0:117_3: Ekībhāvamatteneva kammaṃ na nipphajjatīti kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbatteti,
atk-s0404a0:117_5: Samāpattimatteneva kammaṃ na nipphajjatīti jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0404a0:118_0: Saṅgaṇikārāmassāti gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ceva kilesasaṅgaṇikāya ca ratassa.
atk-s0404a0:119_0: Sādhu sādhūti therassa vitakkaṃ sampahaṃsento evamāha.
atk-s0404a0:119_1: Imaṃ aṭṭhamanti satta nidhī laddhapurisassa aṭṭhamaṃ dento viya,
atk-s0404a0:119_4: satta assaratanāni laddhapurisassa aṭṭhamaṃ dento viya satta mahāpurisavitakke vitakketvā ṭhitassa aṭṭhamaṃ ācikkhanto evamāha.
atk-s0404a0:120_4: Khāyissatīti yathā tassa pubbaṇhasamayādīsu yasmiṃ samaye yaṃ icchati,
atk-s0404a0:120_5: tasmiṃ samaye taṃ pārupantassa so dussakaraṇḍako manāpo hutvā khāyati,
atk-s0404a0:120_6: evaṃ tuyhampi cīvarasantosamahāariyavaṃsena tuṭṭhassa viharato paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ khāyissati upaṭṭhahissati.
atk-s0404a0:121_0: Piṇḍiyālopabhojananti gāmanigamarājadhānīsu jaṅghābalaṃ nissāya gharapaṭipāṭiyā carantena laddhapiṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:121_1: Khāyissatīti tassa gahapatino nānaggarasabhojanaṃ viya upaṭṭhahissati.
atk-s0404a0:121_3: Rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ khāyissatīti tassa gahapatino tebhūmakapāsāde gandhakusumavāsasugandhaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ viya rukkhamūlaṃ upaṭṭhahissati.
atk-s0404a0:121_5: Tiṇasanthārakoti tiṇehi vā paṇṇehi vā bhūmiyaṃ vā phalakapāsāṇatalāni vā aññatarasmiṃ santhatasanthato.
atk-s0404a0:122_0: Iti bhagavā catūsu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pakkhipanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā “katarasenāsane nu kho vasantassa
atk-s0404a0:122_1: kammaṭṭhānaṃ sappāyaṃ bhavissatī”ti āvajjento “tasmiññeva vasantassā”ti ñatvā tena hi tvaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:122_3: Pavivittassa viharatoti tīhi vivekehi vivittassa viharantassa.
atk-s0404a0:122_9: Iti bhagavā cetiraṭṭhe pācīnavaṃsadāye āyasmato anuruddhassa kathite aṭṭha mahāpurisavitakke puna bhesakaḷāvanamahāvihāre
atk-s0404a0:123_0: Manomayenāti manena nibbattitakāyopi manomayoti vuccati manena gatakāyopi,
atk-s0404a0:123_2: Yathā me ahu saṅkappoti yathā mayhaṃ vitakko ahosi,
atk-s0404a0:123_3: tato uttari aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ dassento tato uttariṃ desayi.
atk-s0404a0:125_1: Catutthassa paṭhame āsajja dānaṃ detīti patvā dānaṃ deti.
atk-s0404a0:125_2: Āgataṃ disvā taṃ muhuttaṃyeva nisīdāpetvā sakkāraṃ katvā dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0404a0:125_6: Adāsi meti mayhaṃ pubbe esa idaṃ nāma adāsīti deti.
atk-s0404a0:125_7: Dassati meti anāgate idaṃ nāma dassatīti deti.
atk-s0404a0:125_8: Sāhu dānanti dānaṃ nāma sādhu sundaraṃ buddhādīhi paṇḍitehi pasatthanti deti.
atk-s0404a0:125_9: Cittālaṅkāracittaparikkhāratthaṃ dānaṃ detīti samathavipassanācittassa alaṅkāratthañceva parikkhāratthañca deti.
atk-s0404a0:128_0: Imesu pana aṭṭhasu dānesu cittālaṅkāradānameva uttamanti.
atk-s0404a0:130_1: Dutiye saddhāti yāya saddhāya dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0404a0:132_2: Chandā dānaṃ detīti pemena dānaṃ deti.
atk-s0404a0:132_3: Dosāti dosena kuddho hutvā yaṃ atthi,
atk-s0404a0:132_7: tassa tasseva vā pana bhayena deti.
atk-s0404a0:134_1: Catutthe na mahapphalaṃ hotīti dhaññaphalena mahapphalaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0404a0:134_3: tassa assādo na mahā hoti mandassādaṃ na madhuraṃ.
atk-s0404a0:134_4: Na phātiseyyanti seyyāpissa na hoti vuḍḍhi,
atk-s0404a0:134_5: tassa mahantaṃ vīhithambhasannivesaṃ na hotīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:134_9: Pāsāṇasakkharikanti pattharitvā ṭhitapiṭṭhipāsāṇehi ca khuddakapāsāṇehi ca sakkharāhi ca samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0404a0:134_12: naṅgalamaggaṃ katvā kasituṃ na sakkā hoti,
atk-s0404a0:134_15: Na apāyasampannanti pacchābhāge udakaniggamanamaggasampannaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0404a0:134_16: Na mātikāsampannanti na khuddakamahantīhi udakamātikāhi sampannaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:135_3: Anītisampadā hotīti kīṭakimiādipāṇakaītiyā abhāvo ekā sampadā hoti.
atk-s0404a0:135_12: yasmāssa taṃ katakammaṃ sampannaṃ paripuṇṇanti attho.
atk-s0404a0:135_14: Vijjācaraṇasampannoti tīhi vijjāhi ca pañcadasahi caraṇadhammehi ca samannāgato.
atk-s0404a0:135_15: Laddhāti evarūpo puggalo cittassa sampadaṃ avekallaparipuṇṇabhāvaṃ labhitvā.
atk-s0404a0:135_20: Yāti sampannamānasoti paripuṇṇacitto hutvā arahattaṃ yāti.
atk-s0404a0:135_21: Sā hoti sabbasampadāti sā sabbadukkhehi vimutti sabbasampadā nāma hotīti.
atk-s0404a0:137_5: Hīne vimuttanti hīnesu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu vimuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:137_7: Tatrūpapattiyā saṃvattatīti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthetvā kusalaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0404a0:137_9: Vītarāgassāti maggena vā samucchinnarāgassa samāpattiyā vā vikkhambhitarāgassa.
atk-s0404a0:137_10: Dānamatteneva hi brahmaloke nibbattituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0404a0:137_12: Tato dānena muducitto brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbattati.
atk-s0404a0:139_1: Chaṭṭhe puññakiriyāni ca tāni tesaṃ tesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ vatthūni cāti puññakiriyavatthūni.
atk-s0404a0:139_2: Dānādīnañhi lakkhaṇe cittaṃ ṭhapetvā “evarūpaṃ nāma amhehi dānaṃ dātabbaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:139_6: dānacetanāsu vā purimacetanāto nipphannā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā dānamayaṃ sīlādīhi sīlamayādīni viya.
atk-s0404a0:139_8: Parittaṃ kataṃ hotīti thokaṃ mandaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:139_10: Akataṃ hotīti bhāvanāyayogoyeva anāraddho hotīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:141_6: imassa na mahapphala”nti evaṃ paṭiggāhakapariyesanavasena dānaṃ vā paṇidhāyavasena dānaṃ vā vicinitvā deti.
atk-s0404a0:143_4: Imasmiṃ sutte anuppanne buddhe cakkavattirājāno bodhisattā paccekabuddhā labbhanti,
atk-s0404a0:143_6: Yathāvuttānañhi etesaṃ atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti.
atk-s0404a0:143_8: sappañño gharamāvasanti sappañño ghare vasanto bahūnaṃ vata atthāya hoti.
atk-s0404a0:145_0: 39. Navame dānānīti cetanādānāni. Aggaññānītiādīnaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0404a0:147_3: Appāyukasaṃvattanikoti tena parittakena kammavipākena appāyuko hoti,
atk-s0404a0:147_4: dinnamattāya vā paṭisandhiyā vilīyati mātukucchito nikkhantamatte vā.
atk-s0404a0:147_5: Evarūpo hi na aññassa kassaci nissando,
atk-s0404a0:147_7: Bhogabyasanasaṃvattanikoti yathā kākaṇikāmattampi hatthe na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0404a0:147_9: Sapattaverasaṃvattaniko hotīti saha sapattehi veraṃ saṃvatteti.
atk-s0404a0:147_10: Tassa hi sapattā ca bahukā honti.
atk-s0404a0:147_13: Evarūpo hi parassa rakkhitagopitabhaṇḍe aparādhassa nissando.
atk-s0404a0:148_1: yena kenaci kataṃ tasseva upari patati.
atk-s0404a0:148_6: Yā sā vācā kaṇṭakā kakkasā kaṭukā abhisajjanī mammacchedikā,
atk-s0404a0:148_12: ko hi tava vacanaṃ gahessatī”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0404a0:148_15: Tena hi manusso ummatto vā khittacitto vā eḷamūgo vā hoti.
atk-s0404a0:150_2: mahāsālāti purato ṭhite dve sālarukkhe dassento parikappopamaṃ āha.
atk-s0404a0:150_5: Sace etepi sacetanā hutvā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavaseyyuṃ,
atk-s0404a0:150_6: etesampi so uposathavāso dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya assa.
atk-s0404a0:152_1: Chaṭṭhe yenāyasmā anuruddhoti tā kira devatā attano sampattiṃ oloketvā “kiṃ nu kho nissāya ayaṃ sampatti
atk-s0404a0:152_2: amhehi laddhā”ti āvajjamānā theraṃ disvā “mayaṃ amhākaṃ ayyassa pubbe cakkavattirajjaṃ karontassa pādaparicārikā
atk-s0404a0:152_3: hutvā tena dinnovāde ṭhatvā imaṃ sampattiṃ labhimha,
atk-s0404a0:152_4: gacchāma theraṃ ānetvā imaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavissāmā”ti divā yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:152_7: Saranti vacanasaddaṃ vā gītasaddaṃ vā ābharaṇasaddaṃ vā.
atk-s0404a0:152_9: pītā bhavituṃ na sakkhissantītiādinā nayena cintetvā vitakketi.
atk-s0404a0:153_4: Tattha ātataṃ nāma cammapariyonaddhesu bheriādīsu ekatalatūriyaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:153_11: Kusalehi susamannāhatassāti ye vādetuṃ kusalā chekā,
atk-s0404a0:153_20: Indriyāni okkhipīti “asāruppaṃ imā devatā karontī”ti indriyāni heṭṭhā khipi,
atk-s0404a0:153_22: Na khvayyo anuruddho sādiyatīti “mayaṃ naccāma gāyāma,
atk-s0404a0:153_23: ayyo pana anuruddho na kho sādiyati,
atk-s0404a0:153_25: kiṃ mayaṃ naccitvā vā gāyitvā vā karissāmā”ti tattheva antaradhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:153_26: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti tāsaṃ devatānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ disvā “katihi nu kho dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo
atk-s0404a0:153_27: manāpakāyike devaloke nibbattatī”ti imamatthaṃ pucchituṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0404a0:155_1: Navame ayaṃ’sa loko āraddho hotīti ayamassa loko idhaloke karaṇamattāya āraddhattā paripuṇṇattā āraddho hoti paripuṇṇo.
atk-s0404a0:155_4: yāni vā aṭṭhaṅgāni parampi tesu samādapetīti evampi soḷasākārasampannāti eke.
atk-s0404a0:157_1: Chaṭṭhassa paṭhame sakkesu viharatīti paṭhamagamanena gantvā viharati.
atk-s0404a0:157_2: Mahāpajāpatīti puttapajāya ceva dhītupajāya ca mahantattā evaṃladdhanāmā.
atk-s0404a0:157_3: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti bhagavā kapilapuraṃ gantvā paṭhamameva nandaṃ pabbājesi,
atk-s0404a0:157_5: Cumbaṭakakalahe pana ubhayanagaravāsikesu yuddhatthāya nikkhantesu satthā gantvā te rājāno saññāpetvā attadaṇḍasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0404a0:157_6: Rājāno pasīditvā aḍḍhatiyasate aḍḍhatiyasate kumāre adaṃsu,
atk-s0404a0:157_7: tāni pañca kumārasatāni satthu santike pabbajiṃsu,
atk-s0404a0:157_8: atha nesaṃ pajāpatiyo sāsanaṃ pesetvā anabhiratiṃ uppādayiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:157_9: Satthā tesaṃ anabhiratiyā uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā te pañcasate daharabhikkhū kuṇāladahaṃ netvā attano kuṇālakāle
atk-s0404a0:157_10: nisinnapubbe pāsāṇatale nisīditvā kuṇālajātakakathāya tesaṃ anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā sabbepi te sotāpattiphale
atk-s0404a0:157_13: Tesaṃ cittajānanatthaṃ punapi pajāpatiyo sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:157_15: Tā “na dāni amhākaṃ gharaṃ gantuṃ yuttaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:157_16: mahāpajāpatiyā santikaṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā pabbajissāmā”ti pañcasatāpi mahāpajāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ayye,
atk-s0404a0:157_18: Mahāpajāpatī tā itthiyo gahetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0404a0:157_19: Setacchattassa heṭṭhā rañño parinibbutakāle upasaṅkamītipi vadantiyeva.
atk-s0404a0:158_2: nanu sabbesampi buddhānaṃ catasso parisā hontīti?
atk-s0404a0:158_4: kilametvā pana anekavāraṃ yācite anuññātaṃ pabbajjaṃ “dukkhena laddhā”ti sammā paripālessantīti garuṃ katvā anuññātukāmo paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0404a0:158_6: Yathābhirantaṃ viharitvāti bodhaneyyasattānaṃ upanissayaṃ olokento yathājjhāsayane viharitvā.
atk-s0404a0:158_7: Cārikaṃ pakkāmīti mahājanasaṅgahaṃ karonto uttamāya buddhasiriyā anopamena buddhavilāsena aturitacārikaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0404a0:159_0: Sambahulāhi sākiyānīhi saddhinti antonivesanamhiyeva dasabalaṃ uddissa pabbajjāvesaṃ gahetvā pañcasatā
atk-s0404a0:159_1: sākiyāniyo pabbajjāvesaṃyeva gāhāpetvā sabbāhipi tāhi sambahulāhi sākiyānīhi saddhiṃ.
atk-s0404a0:159_3: Gamanābhinīharaṇakāle pana tā sukhumālā rājitthiyo padasā gantuṃ na sakkhissantīti sākiyakoliyarājāno sovaṇṇasivikāyo upaṭṭhāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:159_4: Tā pana “yāne āruyha gacchantīti satthari agāravo kato hotī”ti ekapaṇṇāsayojanikaṃ padasāva paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:159_5: Rājānopi purato ca pacchato ca ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahāpetvā taṇḍulasappitelādīnaṃ sakaṭāni pūrāpetvā “gataṭṭhāne
atk-s0404a0:159_7: Sūnehi pādehīti tāsañhi sukhumālattā pādesu eko phoṭo uṭṭheti,
atk-s0404a0:159_9: Ubho pādā katakaṭṭhisamparikiṇṇā viya hutvā uddhumātā jātā.
atk-s0404a0:159_16: evaṃ gahitabhāvo ca pana me sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0404a0:159_20: mahatī garahā bhavissatī”ti vihāraṃ pavisituṃ asakkontī rodamānāva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0404a0:160_0: Kiṃ nu tvaṃ gotamīti kiṃ nu rājakulānaṃ vipatti uppannā,
atk-s0404a0:160_1: kena tvaṃ kāraṇena evaṃ vivaṇṇabhāvaṃ pattā,
atk-s0404a0:160_4: bhantetiādinā tassā guṇaṃ kathetvā puna pabbajjaṃ yācanto evamāha.
atk-s0404a0:160_6: ekayācitamattena pabbajjāya anuññātāya na mama sāsanaṃ garuṃ katvā gaṇhissantī”ti tikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā idāni garuṃ katvā gāhāpetukāmatāya sace, ānanda,
atk-s0404a0:160_9: Tattha sāvassāti sā eva assā pabbajjāpi upasampadāpi hotu.
atk-s0404a0:161_1: Abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kattabbanti omānātimāne akatvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena abhivādanaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:161_5: Abhikkhuke āvāseti yattha vasantiyā anantarāyena ovādatthāya upasaṅkamanaṭṭhāne ovādadāyako ācariyo natthi,
atk-s0404a0:161_17: Akkositabbo paribhāsitabboti dasannaṃ akkosavatthūnaṃ aññatarena akkosavatthunā na akkositabbo,
atk-s0404a0:161_18: bhayūpadaṃsanāya yāya kāyaci paribhāsāya na paribhāsitabbo.
atk-s0404a0:162_0: Ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu vacanapathoti ovādānusāsanadhammakathāsaṅkhāto vacanapatho bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu ovarito pihito,
atk-s0404a0:162_1: na bhikkhuniyā koci bhikkhu ovaditabbo anusāsitabbo vā “bhante,
atk-s0404a0:162_2: porāṇakattherā idaṃ cīvaravattaṃ pūrayiṃsū”ti evaṃ pana paveṇivasena kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0404a0:162_3: Anovaṭo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīsu vacanapathoti bhikkhūnaṃ pana bhikkhunīsu vacanapatho anivārito,
atk-s0404a0:162_4: yathāruci ovadituṃ anusāsituṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetunti ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0404a0:162_5: vitthārato panesā garudhammakathā samantapāsādikāya vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāya vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0404a0:163_0: Ime pana aṭṭha garudhamme satthu santike uggahetvā therena attano ārociyamāne sutvāva mahāpajāpatiyā tāva mahantaṃ domanassaṃ khaṇena paṭippassambhi,
atk-s0404a0:163_1: anotattadahato ābhatena sītudakassa ghaṭasatena matthake parisittā viya vigatapariḷāhā attamanā hutvā
atk-s0404a0:164_0: Kumbhatthenakehīti kumbhe dīpaṃ jāletvā tena ālokena paraghare bhaṇḍaṃ vicinitvā thenakacorehi.
atk-s0404a0:164_1: Setaṭṭhikā nāma rogajātīti eko pāṇako nāḷamajjhagataṃ kaṇḍaṃ vijjhati,
atk-s0404a0:164_2: yena viddhā kaṇḍā nikkhantampi sālisīsaṃ khīraṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0404a0:165_0: Mahato taḷākassa paṭikacceva āḷinti iminā pana etamatthaṃ dasseti –
atk-s0404a0:165_1: yathā mahato taḷākassa pāḷiyā abaddhāyapi kiñci udakaṃ tiṭṭhateva,
atk-s0404a0:165_2: paṭhamameva baddhāya pana yaṃ abaddhapaccayā na tiṭṭheyya,
atk-s0404a0:165_4: evameva ye ime anuppanne vatthusmiṃ paṭikacceva anatikkamanatthāya garudhammā paññattā,
atk-s0404a0:165_5: tesu apaññattesu mātugāmassa pabbajitattā pañca vassasatāni saddhammo tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0404a0:165_6: Paṭikacceva paññattattā pana aparānipi pañca vassasatāni ṭhassatīti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttavassasahassameva ṭhassati.
atk-s0404a0:165_11: sotāpannavasena vassasahassanti evaṃ pañcavassasahassāni paṭivedhasaddhammo ṭhassati.
atk-s0404a0:165_13: Na hi pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho atthi,
atk-s0404a0:165_14: nāpi pariyattiyā sati paṭivedho na hoti.
atk-s0404a0:165_15: Liṅgaṃ pana pariyattiyā antarahitāyapi ciraṃ pavattissatīti.
atk-s0404a0:167_1: Dutiye bahussutoti idha sakalassapi buddhavacanassa vasena bahussutabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0404a0:169_11: Iminā ca pana ovādena gotamī arahattaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0404a0:171_1: Catutthe byagghapajjāti idamassa paveṇi nāma vasena ālapanaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:171_2: Tassa hi pubbapurisā byagghapathe jātāti tasmiṃ kule manussā byagghapajjāti vuccanti.
atk-s0404a0:171_4: Tatrupāyāyāti “imasmiṃ kāle idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti jānane upāyabhūtāya.
atk-s0404a0:171_11: tassa vayo āyaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0404a0:173_0: Ekena bhoge bhuñjeyya, dvīhi kammaṃ payojaye;
atk-s0404a0:175_0: Evaṃ paṭipajjato pana vayo āyaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkotiyeva.
atk-s0404a0:176_0: Udumbarakhādīvāti yathā udumbarāni khāditukāmena pakke udumbararukkhe cālite ekappahāreneva bahūni phalāni patanti,
atk-s0404a0:176_1: so khāditabbayuttakāni khāditvā itarāni bahutarāni pahāya gacchati,
atk-s0404a0:176_2: evamevaṃ yo āyato vayaṃ bahutaraṃ katvā vippakiranto bhoge paribhuñjati,
atk-s0404a0:176_5: Samaṃ jīvikaṃ kappetīti sammā jīvikaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0404a0:177_4: Cāgo puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti cāgo ca sesapuññañca pavaḍḍhati.
atk-s0404a0:179_4: Ubhayaṃ ete kāmā pavuccantīti bhayañca dukkhañca,
atk-s0404a0:179_10: bhayañca gabbho cāti evaṃ ubhayaṃ ete kāmā pavuccanti.
atk-s0404a0:179_13: Atikkammāti imasmiṃ ṭhāne vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā assa bhikkhuno arahattappattabhāvo gahito.
atk-s0404a0:179_14: Evarūpaṃ pajaṃ jātijarūpetaṃ tīsu bhavesu phandamānaṃ avekkhatīti sutte vaṭṭaṃ kathetvā gāthāsu vivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti.
atk-s0404a0:181_2: Paññāsīlasamāhitoti paññāya ca sīlena ca samannāgato.
atk-s0404a0:183_4: Socī ca paridevī cāti sokī ca paridevī ca.
atk-s0404a0:183_6: Cuto ca saddhammāti taṃkhaṇaṃyeva vipassanāsaddhammā cuto.
atk-s0404a0:185_1: Dutiye alaṃ attano alaṃ paresanti attano ca paresañca hitapaṭipattiyaṃ samattho pariyatto anucchaviko.
atk-s0404a0:185_3: khandhadhātuāyatanādīsu kathiyamānesu te dhamme khippaṃ jānātīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:185_5: Puggalajjhāsayena pana desanāvilāsena cetaṃ matthakato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā otarantaṃ kathitanti.
atk-s0404a0:187_5: Anubandhitabbanti iriyāpathānugamanena anubandhitabbaṃ maṃ na vijahitabbaṃ maññanti.
atk-s0404a0:187_7: Esa kira bhikkhu ovāde dinnepi pamādameva anuyuñjati,
atk-s0404a0:187_10: Tasmā bhagavā evaṃ apasādetvā puna yasmā so arahattassa upanissayasampanno,
atk-s0404a0:187_11: tasmā taṃ ovadanto tasmātiha te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbantiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:187_12: Tattha ajjhattaṃ me cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhavissati susaṇṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:187_13: na ca uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassantīti iminā tāvassa ovādena niyakajjhattavasena cittekaggatāmatto mūlasamādhi vutto.
atk-s0404a0:188_0: Tato “ettakeneva santuṭṭhiṃ anāpajjitvā evaṃ so samādhi vaḍḍhetabbo”ti dassetuṃ yato kho te bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti susaṇṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:188_1: na ca uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0404a0:188_2: tato te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ “mettā me cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissati…pe…
atk-s0404a0:188_3: susamāraddhā”ti evamassa mettāvasena bhāvanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā puna yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti bahulīkato,
atk-s0404a0:188_4: tato tvaṃ bhikkhu imaṃ samādhiṃ savitakkasavicārampi bhāveyyāsītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:188_6: yadā te bhikkhu ayaṃ mūlasamādhi evaṃ mettāvasena bhāvito hoti,
atk-s0404a0:188_7: tadā tvaṃ tāvatakenapi tuṭṭhiṃ anāpajjitvāva imaṃ mūlasamādhiṃ aññesupi ārammaṇesu catukkapañcakajjhānāni
atk-s0404a0:189_0: Evaṃ vatvā ca pana avasesabrahmavihārapubbaṅgamampissa aññesu ārammaṇesu catukkapañcakajjhānabhāvanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:189_1: kareyyāsīti dassento yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti subhāvito,
atk-s0404a0:189_2: tato te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ “karuṇā me cetovimuttī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:189_3: Evaṃ mettāpubbaṅgamaṃ catukkapañcakajjhānabhāvanaṃ dassetvā puna kāyānupassanādipubbaṅgamaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0404a0:189_4: yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti subhāvito,
atk-s0404a0:189_5: tato te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ “kāye kāyānupassī”tiādiṃ vatvā yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti subhāvito,
atk-s0404a0:189_6: tato tvaṃ bhikkhu yena yeneva gagghasītiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:189_9: Arahattappatto hi sabbiriyāpathesu phāsu viharati nāma.
atk-s0404a0:191_1: Catutthe etadavocāti attano padhānabhūmiyaṃ uppannaṃ vitakkaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocetuṃ –
atk-s0404a0:191_14: pubbenivāsañāṇanti imāni tāva aṭṭha ñāṇāni pāḷiyaṃyeva āgatāni,
atk-s0404a0:191_15: tehi pana saddhiṃ vipassanāñāṇāni cattāri maggañāṇāni,
atk-s0404a0:191_18: cattāri paṭisambhidāñāṇāni cha asādhāraṇañāṇānīti etāni ñāṇāni samodhānetvā kathentena evaṃ idaṃ suttaṃ kathitaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0404a0:193_6: Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññītiādīsu pana ajjhattarūpe parikammavasena ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī nāma hoti.
atk-s0404a0:193_7: Ajjhattañhi nīlaparikammaṃ karonto kese vā pitte vā akkhitārakāya vā karoti.
atk-s0404a0:193_8: Pītaparikammaṃ karonto mede vā chaviyā vā hatthatalapādatalesu vā akkhīnaṃ pītaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-s0404a0:193_9: Lohitaparikammaṃ karonto maṃse vā lohite vā jivhāya vā akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-s0404a0:193_10: Odātaparikammaṃ karonto aṭṭhimhi vā dante vā nakhe vā akkhīnaṃ setaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-s0404a0:193_11: Taṃ pana sunīlakaṃ supītakaṃ sulohitakaṃ suodātaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0404a0:194_0: Eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti yassevaṃ parikammaṃ ajjhattaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
atk-s0404a0:194_2: so evaṃ ajjhattaṃ parikammassa bahiddhā ca appanāya vasena “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:194_4: Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānīti suvaṇṇāni vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni vā,
atk-s0404a0:194_6: Tāni abhibhuyyāti yathā nāma sampannaggahaṇiko kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā “kiṃ ettha bhuñjitabbaṃ atthī”ti saṃkaḍḍhitvā ekakabaḷameva karoti,
atk-s0404a0:194_7: evameva ñāṇuttariko puggalo visadañāṇo “kimettha parittake ārammaṇe samāpajjitabbaṃ atthi,
atk-s0404a0:194_8: nāyaṃ mama bhāro”ti tāni rūpāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati,
atk-s0404a0:194_10: Jānāmi passāmīti iminā panassa ābhogo kathito.
atk-s0404a0:194_13: Evaṃsaññī hotīti ābhogasaññāyapi jhānasaññāyapi evaṃsaññī hoti.
atk-s0404a0:195_2: Abhibhuyyāti ettha ca pana yathā mahagghaso puriso ekaṃ bhattavaḍḍhitakaṃ labhitvā “aññāpi hotu,
atk-s0404a0:195_4: kiṃ esā mayhaṃ karissatī”ti na taṃ mahantato passati,
atk-s0404a0:195_5: evameva ñāṇuttaro puggalo visadañāṇo “kiṃ ettha samāpajjitabbaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:195_7: na mayhaṃ cittekaggatākaraṇe bhāro atthī”ti abhibhavitvā samāpajjati,
atk-s0404a0:196_0: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti alābhitāya vā anatthikatāya vā ajjhattarūpe parikammasaññāvirahito.
atk-s0404a0:197_0: Eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti yassa parikammampi nimittampi bahiddhā uppannaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:197_1: so evaṃ bahiddhā parikammassa ceva appanāya ca vasena “ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:197_3: Imesu pana catūsu parittaṃ vitakkacaritavasena āgataṃ,
atk-s0404a0:197_8: Sā ca nesaṃ sappāyatā visuddhimagge cariyaniddese vuttā.
atk-s0404a0:198_3: Apaññāyamānavivarāni asambhinnavaṇṇāni ekanīlāneva hutvā dissantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:198_8: “Nīlakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto nīlasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vā”tiādikaṃ
atk-s0404a0:198_9: panettha kasiṇakaraṇañca parikammañca appanāvidhānañca sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vitthārato vuttamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:200_6: pituaṅke vissaṭṭhaṅgapaccaṅgassa dārakassa sayanaṃ viya aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya ārammaṇe pavattīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:201_0: Rūpī rūpāni passatīti ettha ajjhattaṃ kesādīsu nīlakasiṇādivasena uppāditaṃ rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:201_3: Iminā ajjhattabahiddhavatthukesu kasiṇesu uppāditajjhānassa puggalassa cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni dassitāni.
atk-s0404a0:201_6: Iminā bahiddhā parikammaṃ katvā bahiddhāva uppāditajjhānassa rūpāvacarajjhānāni dassitāni.
atk-s0404a0:202_0: Subhanteva adhimutto hotīti iminā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu jhānāni dassitāni.
atk-s0404a0:202_2: yo pana suvisuddhaṃ subhaṃ kasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā viharati,
atk-s0404a0:202_3: so yasmā “subhanti adhimutto hotī”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0404a0:203_1: Idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ …pe… viharati.
atk-s0404a0:203_7: Evaṃ subhanteva adhimutto hotīti vimokkho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:204_2: Ayaṃ aṭṭhamo vimokkhoti ayaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ sabbaso vissaṭṭhattā vimuttattā aṭṭhamo uttamo vimokkho nāma.
atk-s0404a0:208_1: Navame khattiyaparisāti khattiyānaṃ parisānaṃ sannipāto samāgamo.
atk-s0404a0:208_9: Yādisako tesaṃ vaṇṇoti te odātāpi honti kāḷāpi maṅguracchavīpi,
atk-s0404a0:208_17: Yādisako tesaṃ saroti te chinnassarāpi honti gaggassarāpi kākassarāpi,
atk-s0404a0:208_20: Sacepi hi satthā rājāsane nisinno katheti,
atk-s0404a0:208_22: Kathetvā pakkante pana bhagavati puna rājānaṃ āgataṃ disvā “ko nu kho aya”nti vīmaṃsā uppajjati.
atk-s0404a0:208_23: Tattha ko nu kho ayanti “imasmiṃ ṭhāne idāneva māgadhabhāsāya sīhaḷabhāsāya madhurena ākārena kathento ko nu kho ayaṃ antarahito,
atk-s0404a0:208_24: kiṃ devo udāhu manusso”ti evaṃ vīmaṃsantāpi na jānantīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:208_27: Evaṃ sutopi hi dhammo anāgate paccayo hotīti anāgataṃ paṭicca deseti.
atk-s0404a0:208_28: Anekasataṃ brāhmaṇaparisantiādinaṃ soṇadaṇḍasamāgamādivasena ceva aññacakkavāḷavasena ca sambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0404a0:210_2: Udenaṃ cetiyanti udenayakkhassa vasanaṭṭhāne katavihāro vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:211_0: Iti aniyamena kathetvā puna niyametvā dassento tathāgatassa khotiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:211_2: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:211_4: Kappāvasesaṃ vāti “appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti vuttavassasatato atirekaṃ vā.
atk-s0404a0:211_7: punappunaṃ samāpajjitvā maraṇantikavedanaṃ vikkhambhento bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0404a0:211_10: buddhā ca khaṇḍiccādibhāvaṃ appatvā pañcame āyukoṭṭhāse bahujanassa piyamanāpakāleyeva parinibbāyanti.
atk-s0404a0:211_11: Buddhānubuddhesu ca mahāsāvakesu parinibbutesu ekakeneva khāṇukena viya ṭhātabbaṃ hoti daharasāmaṇeraparivārena vā,
atk-s0404a0:212_0: Yathā taṃ mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittoti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:212_1: yathā mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto ajjhotthaṭacitto aññopi koci puthujjano paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya,
atk-s0404a0:212_3: Māro hi yassa sabbena sabbaṃ dvādasa vipallāsā appahīnā,
atk-s0404a0:212_7: So pana cittapariyuṭṭhānaṃ karonto kiṃ karotīti?
atk-s0404a0:212_10: Tato sattā taṃ disvā vā sutvā vā satiṃ vissajjetvā vivaṭamukhā honti,
atk-s0404a0:212_11: tesaṃ mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetvā hadayaṃ maddati,
atk-s0404a0:212_13: Therassa panesa mukhe hatthaṃ pavesetuṃ kiṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0404a0:212_16: Bhagavā jānantoyeva kimatthaṃ yāva tatiyaṃ āmantesīti?
atk-s0404a0:213_0: Māro pāpimāti ettha satte anatthe niyojento māretīti māro.
atk-s0404a0:213_2: So hi pāpadhammasamannāgatattā “pāpimā”ti vuccati. Kaṇho, antako, namuci,
atk-s0404a0:213_4: Bhāsitā kho panesāti ayañhi bhagavato sambodhipattiyā aṭṭhame sattāhe bodhimaṇḍeyeva āgantvā “bhagavā yadatthaṃ tumhehi pāramiyo pūritā,
atk-s0404a0:213_7: kiṃ te lokavicāraṇenā”ti vatvā yathā ajja,
atk-s0404a0:214_3: Bahussutāti tepiṭakavasena bahu sutaṃ etesanti bahussutā.
atk-s0404a0:214_5: Atha vā pariyattibahussutā ceva paṭivedhabahussutā ca.
atk-s0404a0:214_6: Pariyattipaṭivedhadhammānaṃyeva dhāraṇato dhammadharāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0404a0:214_13: Sappāṭihāriyanti yāva niyyānikaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desessanti.
atk-s0404a0:215_3: Vitthārikanti vitthataṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge patiṭṭhitavasena.
atk-s0404a0:215_7: yattakā viññujātikā devā ceva manussā ca atthi,
atk-s0404a0:215_14: mā mayhaṃ parinibbānatthaṃ vāyāmaṃ karohīti vadati.
atk-s0404a0:216_0: Sato sampajāno āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajjīti satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajji pajahi.
atk-s0404a0:216_1: Tattha na bhagavā hatthena leḍḍuṃ viya āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossaji,
atk-s0404a0:216_2: temāsamattameva pana phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato paraṃ na samāpajjissāmīti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0404a0:217_1: Koci nāma vadeyya “bhagavā pacchato pacchato anubandhitvā ‘parinibbātu,
atk-s0404a0:217_4: bhītassa hi udānaṃ nāma natthīti pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0404a0:218_0: Tattha sabbesaṃ soṇasiṅgālādīnampi paccakkhabhāvato tulitaṃ paricchinnanti tulaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
atk-s0404a0:218_2: na vā tulaṃ sadisamassa aññaṃ lokiyaṃ kammaṃ atthīti atulaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
atk-s0404a0:218_19: bhavābhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena bhavasaṅkhāranti ca laddhanāmaṃ tulātulasaṅkhātaṃ lokiyakammañca ossaji,
atk-s0404a0:218_20: saṅgāmasīse mahāyodho kavacaṃ viya attasambhavaṃ kilesañca ajjhattarato hutvā samāhito hutvā abhindīti.
atk-s0404a0:219_4: pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nirodho nibbānaṃ nicca”ntiādinā nayena tulayanto buddhamuni bhave ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:219_5: nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā taṃ khandhānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ bhavasaṅkhāraṃ kammaṃ “kammakkhayāya saṃvattatī”ti
atk-s0404a0:219_6: evaṃ vuttena kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena avassaji. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0404a0:219_10: samathavasena samāhitoti evaṃ pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya samathavipassanābalena kavacamiva attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:219_12: Kilesābhāvena ca kataṃ kammaṃ appaṭisandhikattā avassaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti evaṃ kilesappahānena kammaṃ pajahi.
atk-s0404a0:220_0: Yaṃ mahāvātāti yena samayena yasmiṃ vā samaye mahāvātā.
atk-s0404a0:220_5: puna vāto attano balena antodhammakaraṇe viya udakaṃ ābandhitvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0404a0:221_4: So imaṃ pathaviṃ kampetīti so iddhiṃ nibbattetvā saṃvejento mahāmoggallāno viya,
atk-s0404a0:221_5: vīmaṃsanto vā mahānāgattherassa bhāgineyyo saṅgharakkhitasāmaṇero viya pathaviṃ kampeti.
atk-s0404a0:221_8: Iti imesu aṭṭhasu pathavikampesu paṭhamo dhātukopena,
atk-s0404a0:221_15: Mātukucchiṃ okkamante ca tato nikkhamante ca mahāsatte tassa puññatejena pathavī akampittha,
atk-s0404a0:223_1: Aṭṭhamassa paṭhame no ca sīlavāti na sīlesu paripūrakārī.
atk-s0404a0:225_5: So mamassa antarāyoti so mama jīvitantarāyopi,
atk-s0404a0:225_7: Satthakā vā me vātāti satthaṃ viya aṅgamaṅgāni kantantīti satthakā.
atk-s0404a0:227_1: Dasame kusītavatthūnīti kusītassa alasassa vatthūni patiṭṭhā,
atk-s0404a0:227_3: Kammaṃ kattabbaṃ hotīti cīvaravicāraṇādikammaṃ kattabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:227_4: Na vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti duvidhampi vīriyaṃ nārabhati.
atk-s0404a0:227_8: Idaṃ paṭhamanti idaṃ “handāhaṃ nipajjāmī”ti evaṃ osīdanaṃ paṭhamaṃ kusītavatthu.
atk-s0404a0:227_10: Māsācitakaṃ maññeti ettha pana māsācitaṃ nāma tintamāso.
atk-s0404a0:227_13: Gilānā vuṭṭhito hotīti gilāno hutvā pacchā vuṭṭhito hoti.
atk-s0404a0:229_4: No ca paripucchitāti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ paripucchitā na hoti.
atk-s0404a0:229_7: Ekantapaṭibhānā tathāgataṃ dhammadesanā hotīti tathāgatassa ekantapaṭibhānā dhammadesanā hoti,
atk-s0404a0:231_2: Chandamūlakāti ajjhāsayacchando kattukamyatāchando taṃ mūlaṃ etesanti chandamūlakā.
atk-s0404a0:231_11: Ettha ca chandamūlakādayo cattāropi lokiyā kathitā,
atk-s0404a0:233_1: Catutthe mahācoroti rajjantare dubbhituṃ samattho mahācoro.
atk-s0404a0:233_3: Na ciraṭṭhitiko hotīti addhānaṃ pālento ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0404a0:233_4: Appaharantassa paharatīti attano averine appaharante guṇasampanne ca mahallake ca taruṇadārake ca appaharitabbayuttake paharati.
atk-s0404a0:233_8: ekasmiṃ sante dubbalaṃ datvā thiro gahetabbo.
atk-s0404a0:233_9: Puṭabhattataṇḍulādīsu ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ datvā eko gahetabboti.
atk-s0404a0:233_10: Accāsanne kammaṃ karotīti gāmanigamarājadhānīnaṃ āsannaṭṭhāne corikakammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0404a0:233_11: Na ca nidhānakusalo hotīti yaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:233_12: taṃ dakkhiṇeyye nidahituṃ cheko na hoti,
atk-s0404a0:235_1: Pañcame yaṃ samaṇenāti yaṃ guṇajātaṃ samaṇena pattabbaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:235_3: Mutto mocemi bandhanāti ahaṃ sabbabandhanehi mutto hutvā mahājanampi rāgādibandhanato mocemi.
atk-s0404a0:235_4: Paramadantoti aññena kenaci asikkhāpito acodito sayambhuñāṇena paṭivijjhitvā paramadamathena dantattā paramadanto nāma.
atk-s0404a0:237_1: Chaṭṭhe mā ca mayā yasoti yaso ca mayā saddhiṃ mā gañchi.
atk-s0404a0:237_7: Na hi nūnameti na hi nūna ime.
atk-s0404a0:237_8: Tathā hi panameti tathā hi pana ime.
atk-s0404a0:239_1: Sattame nikkujjeyyāti tena dinnassa deyyadhammassa appaṭiggahaṇatthaṃ pattanikkujjanakammavācāya nikujjeyya,
atk-s0404a0:241_3: Nisinnāsanato na uṭṭhātabbaṃ na vanditabbaṃ na paccuggamanaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:243_1: Navame dhammikañca gihipaṭissavanti “imaṃ temāsaṃ idheva vasitabba”nti vutto “evaṃ hotū”tiādinā nayena paṭissavaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:243_2: Na saccāpetīti vuttaṃ na saccaṃ karoti visaṃvādeti.
atk-s0404a0:245_2: Tañhi jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā kiñci saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ na labhati.
atk-s0404a0:245_3: Na ca tena mūlena vuṭṭhāpetabboti taṃ mūlaṃ katvā abbhānakammaṃ kātuṃ na labhati.
atk-s0404a0:246_1: Ito paraṃ atha kho bojjhā upāsikātiādīsu bojjhā upāsikā,
atk-s0404a0:246_26: nakulamātā gahapatānīti imāsaṃ ettakānaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathakammameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:253_1: Navakanipātassa paṭhame sambodhipakkhikānanti catumaggasaṅkhātassa sambodhissa pakkhe bhavānaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:253_3: Pāḷiyaṃ āgate nava dhamme sandhāyevaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0404a0:254_0: Asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāyāti ayamattho sālilāyakopamāya vibhāvetabbo –
atk-s0404a0:254_1: eko hi puriso asitaṃ gahetvā koṭito paṭṭhāya sālikkhette sāliyo lāyati.
atk-s0404a0:254_3: So asitaṃ ṭhapetvā yaṭṭhiṃ ādāya teneva maggena gāvo nīharitvā vatiṃ pākatikaṃ katvā punapi asitaṃ ādāya sāliyo lāyi.
atk-s0404a0:254_10: vatiṃ bhinditvā gāvīnaṃ pavisanaṃ viya sahasā appaṭisaṅkhāya pamādaṃ ārabbha rāgassa uppajjanaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:254_11: asitaṃ ṭhapetvā yaṭṭhiṃ ādāya paviṭṭhamaggeneva gāvo nīharitvā vatiṃ paṭipākatikaṃ katvā puna koṭito
atk-s0404a0:254_12: paṭṭhāya sālilāyanaṃ viya asubhakammaṭṭhānena rāgaṃ vikkhambhetvā puna vipassanāya kammaṃ ārabhanakālo.
atk-s0404a0:255_2: Byāpādassa pahānāyāti vuttanayeneva uppannassa kopassa pajahanatthāya.
atk-s0404a0:255_6: Anattasaññā saṇṭhātīti aniccalakkhaṇe diṭṭhe anattalakkhaṇaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti.
atk-s0404a0:255_7: Etesu hi tīsu lakkhaṇesu ekasmiṃ diṭṭhe itaradvayaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti.
atk-s0404a0:255_12: Diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānanti diṭṭheyeva dhamme apaccayaparinibbānañca pāpuṇātīti imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:257_11: Evaṃ kho bhikkhūti evaṃ kho bhikkhu uggahaparipucchāvasena ceva dhammavavatthānavasena ca paṭisevitabbādīni
atk-s0404a0:257_12: suppaṭividdhāni supaccakkhāni katvā paṭisevanto adhivāsento parivajjento vinodento ca bhikkhu nissayasampanno
atk-s0404a0:259_2: Taṃ kira calamaggaṃ nissāya katattā olokentānaṃ calamānaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0404a0:259_4: Cāliyapabbateti sopi pabbato sabbasetattā kāḷapakkhuposathe olokentānaṃ calamāno viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0404a0:259_7: Iti bhagavā taṃ nagaraṃ nissāya cālikāpabbatamahāvihāre viharati.
atk-s0404a0:259_8: Jantugāmanti evaṃnāmakaṃ aparampi tasseva vihārassa gocaragāmaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:259_12: Āgamehi tāvāti satthā therassa vacanaṃ sutvā upadhārento “na tāvassa ñāṇaṃ paripakka”nti ñatvā paṭibāhanto evamāha.
atk-s0404a0:259_13: Ekakamhi tāvāti idaṃ panassa “evamayaṃ gantvāpi kamme anipphajjamāne nirāsaṅko hutvā pemavasena puna āgacchissatī”ti cittamaddavajananatthaṃ āha.
atk-s0404a0:259_14: Natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catunnaṃ kiccānaṃ katattā aññaṃ uttari karaṇīyaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0404a0:259_15: Katassa vā paṭicayoti adhigatassa vā puna paṭicayopi natthi.
atk-s0404a0:259_19: vadamānaṃ kinti vadeyyāmāti “samaṇadhammaṃ karomī”ti taṃ vadamānaṃ mayaṃ aññaṃ kiṃ nāma vadeyyāma.
atk-s0404a0:260_1: Nisīdanto ca yasmiṃ maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe pubbe anupaṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni rājā hutvā uyyānakīḷikaṃ kīḷanto tividhanāṭakaparivāro nisīdi,
atk-s0404a0:260_3: Athassa nisinnakālato paṭṭhāya samaṇabhāvo jahito viya ahosi,
atk-s0404a0:260_4: rājavesaṃ gahetvā nāṭakavaraparivuto setacchattassa heṭṭhā mahārahe pallaṅke nisinno viya jāto.
atk-s0404a0:260_5: Athassa taṃ sampattiṃ assādayato kāmavitakko udapādi.
atk-s0404a0:260_6: So tasmiṃyeva khaṇe mahāyodhehi gahite dve core ānetvā purato ṭhapite viya addasa.
atk-s0404a0:260_7: Tesu ekassa vadhaṃ āṇāpanavasenassa byāpādavitakko uppajji,
atk-s0404a0:260_9: Evaṃ so latājālena rukkho viya madhumakkhikāhi madhughātako viya akusalavitakkehi parikkhitto ahosi.
atk-s0404a0:260_13: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti evaṃ pāpavitakkehi samparikiṇṇo kammaṭṭhānaṃ sappāyaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto “idaṃ
atk-s0404a0:260_14: vata disvā dīghadassī bhagavā paṭisedhesī”ti sallakkhetvā “idaṃ kāraṇaṃ dasabalassa ārocessāmī”ti nisinnāsanato
atk-s0404a0:262_2: Yenupaṭṭhānasālāti satthā nandakattherena madhurassarena āraddhāya dhammadesanāya saddaṃ sutvā, “ānanda,
atk-s0404a0:262_3: ko eso upaṭṭhānasālāya madhurassarena dhammaṃ desetī”ti pucchitvā “dhammakathikanandakattherassa ajja, bhante,
atk-s0404a0:262_6: mayampi gantvā suṇissāmā”ti vatvā yenupaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0404a0:262_7: Bahidvārakoṭṭhake aṭṭhāsīti chabbaṇṇarasmiyo cīvaragabbhe paṭicchādetvā aññātakavesena aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0404a0:262_8: Kathāpariyosānaṃ āgamayamānoti “idamavocā”ti idaṃ kathāvasānaṃ udikkhamāno dhammakathaṃ suṇanto aṭṭhāsiyeva.
atk-s0404a0:262_9: Athāyasmā ānando nikkhante paṭhame yāme satthu saññaṃ adāsi –
atk-s0404a0:262_20: Aruṇuggamanañca therassa “idamavocā”ti pāpetvā kathāpariyosānañca dasabalassa chabbaṇṇasarīrasmivissajjanañca ekappahāreneva ahosi.
