atk-s0404a0:263_2: Ettakampi no nappaṭibhāseyyāti paṭisambhidāppattassa appaṭibhānaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0404a0:263_4: Sādhu sādhūti therassa dhammadesanaṃ sampahaṃsanto āha.
atk-s0404a0:263_5: Ayañhettha attho “sugahitā ca te dhammadesanā sukathitā cā”ti.
atk-s0404a0:263_10: Idaṃ vatvāti imaṃ catūhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ dhammaṃ kathayitvā.
atk-s0404a0:264_2: Gambhīraṃ atthapadanti gambhīraṃ guḷhaṃ rahassaṃ atthaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:264_5: Patto vā pajjati vāti arahattaṃ patto vā pāpuṇissati vāti evaṃ guṇasambhāvanāya sambhāveti.
atk-s0404a0:264_7: arahattaṃ vā appattaṃ mānasaṃ etesantipi appattamānasā.
atk-s0404a0:264_8: Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāranti ettha diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro lokiyopi vaṭṭati lokuttaropi.
atk-s0404a0:268_4: Rattibhāgaṃ vā divasabhāgaṃ vāti ettha rattibhāge ñatvā rattibhāgeyeva pakkamitabbaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:268_9: So puggaloti padassa pana “nānubandhitabbo”ti iminā sambandho.
atk-s0404a0:268_10: Anāpucchāti idha pana taṃ puggalaṃ anāpucchā pakkamitabbanti attho.
atk-s0404a0:268_12: Evarūpo hi puggalo sacepi dārukalāpasataṃ vā udakaghaṭasataṃ vā vālikāghaṭasataṃ vā daṇḍaṃ āropeti,
atk-s0404a0:270_1: Sattame pañca ṭhānāni ajjhācaritunti pañca kāraṇāni atikkamituṃ.
atk-s0404a0:270_5: Sannidhikārakaṃ kāme paribhuñjitunti sannidhiṃ katvā ṭhapetvā vatthukāmakilesakāme paribhuñjituṃ abhabbo.
atk-s0404a0:270_7: Buddhaṃ paccakkhātunti “na buddho aya”nti evaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ.
atk-s0404a0:270_10: Pāḷiyaṃ pana imasmiṃ sutte agatigamanāni kathitāni.
atk-s0404a0:272_3: Dasame gotrabhūti sotāpattimaggassa anantarapaccayena sikhāpattabalavavipassanācittena samannāgato.
atk-s0404a0:274_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti “sace satthā cārikaṃ pakkamitukāmo assa,
atk-s0404a0:274_3: Handāhaṃ cārikaṃ gamanatthāya satthāraṃ āpucchāmī”ti cintetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto upasaṅkami.
atk-s0404a0:274_5: bhanteti so kira bhikkhu theraṃ mahatā bhikkhuparivārena gacchantaṃ disvā “ime bhikkhū tathāgataṃ pahāya sāriputtaṃ parivāretvā nikkhantā,
atk-s0404a0:274_6: gamanavicchedamassa karissāmī”ti aṭṭhāne kopaṃ bandhitvā evamāha.
atk-s0404a0:274_9: Kismiṃ pana so kāraṇe āghātaṃ bandhīti?
atk-s0404a0:274_10: Therassa kira dasabalaṃ vanditvā uṭṭhāya gacchato cīvarakaṇṇo tassa sarīraṃ phusi,
atk-s0404a0:274_12: Ettakena āghātaṃ bandhitvā theraṃ mahatā parivārena gacchantaṃ disvā usūyamāno “gamanavicchedamassa karissāmī”ti evamāha.
atk-s0404a0:274_13: Ehi tvaṃ bhikkhūti satthā tassa bhikkhuno vacanaṃ sutvā “na taṃ bhikkhu sāriputto paharīti vutte, ‘bhante,
atk-s0404a0:274_15: na mayha’nti mayi manopadosaṃ katvā apāye nibbatteyyā”ti ñatvā “sāriputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā imamatthaṃ pucchissāmī”ti ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantetvā evamāha.
atk-s0404a0:274_18: Evaṃ dvīhi mahātherehi ārocito bhikkhusaṅgho rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni pahāya satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0404a0:275_3: Na hi pathavī “mayi suciṃ nikkhipantī”ti somanassaṃ karoti,

atk-s0404a0:276_8: Na kañci hiṃsatīti visāṇādīsu gaṇhantampi piṭṭhiṃ parimajjantampi na kañci viheṭheti.
atk-s0404a0:277_0: Aṭṭīyeyyāti aṭṭo pīḷito bhaveyya. Harāyeyyāti lajjeyya. Jiguccheyyāti jigucchaṃ āpajjeyya.
atk-s0404a0:278_0: Medakathālikanti medakathālikā vuccati sūnakārakehi yūsanikkhamanatthāya tattha tattha katachiddā thālikā.
atk-s0404a0:278_7: Evamettha aṭṭhamanavamehi dvīhi aṅgehi thero attano sarīre nicchandarāgataṃ kathesi.
atk-s0404a0:279_0: Atha kho so bhikkhūti evaṃ therena navahi kāraṇehi sīhanāde nadite atha so bhikkhu.
atk-s0404a0:279_2: Maṃ accagamāti maṃ atikkamma abhibhavitvā pavatto.
atk-s0404a0:279_10: Taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti taṃ tava aparādhaṃ mayaṃ khamāma.
atk-s0404a0:279_11: Vuddhihesā bhikkhu ariyassa vinayeti esā bhikkhu ariyassa vinaye buddhassa bhagavato sāsane vuḍḍhi nāma. Katamā?
atk-s0404a0:279_12: Accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaritvā āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanā.
atk-s0404a0:279_13: Desanaṃ pana puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ karonto yo accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti,
atk-s0404a0:279_15: Phalatīti sace hi thero na khameyya,
atk-s0404a0:279_16: tassa bhikkhuno tattheva sattadhā muddhā phaleyya.
atk-s0404a0:279_18: Sace maṃ soti sace maṃ ayaṃ bhikkhu khamāhīti evaṃ vadati.
atk-s0404a0:279_19: Khamatu ca me soti ayampi cāyasmā mayhaṃ khamatūti evaṃ thero tassa accayaṃ paṭiggaṇhitvā sayampi taṃ satthu sammukhe khamāpesīti.
atk-s0404a0:281_6: dhammapariyāyo paṭibhāsīti appaṭibhānaṃ nāma bhagavato natthi,

atk-s0404a0:281_8: Māyimaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ sutvā pamādaṃ āhariṃsūti “mayaṃ kira catūhi apāyehi muttā”ti upari arahattatthāya vīriyaṃ akarontā mā pamādaṃ āpajjiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:281_9: Pañhādhippāyena bhāsitoti tayā pucchitapañhassa sabhāvena kathitoti dasseti.
atk-s0404a0:281_10: Imesaṃ pana navannaṃ puggalānaṃ bhavesu chandarāgavinodanatthaṃ etameva atthuppattiṃ katvā –
atk-s0404a0:281_16: appamattakampi bhavaṃ na vaṇṇemi antamaso accharāsaṅghātamattampī”ti imaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0404a0:281_17: Na kevalañca etesaṃyeva navannaṃ puggalānaṃ gati nibaddhā,
atk-s0404a0:281_18: yesaṃ pana kulānaṃ tīṇi saraṇāni pañca sīlāni ekaṃ salākabhattaṃ ekaṃ pakkhiyabhattaṃ ekaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ ekā pokkharaṇī eko āvāso,

atk-s0404a0:285_5: Iminā cattāro arūpakkhandhā bhūtupādāyarūpañca vitakkānaṃ paccayoti dasseti.
atk-s0404a0:285_6: Kva nānattaṃ gacchantīti kasmiṃ ṭhāne nānāsabhāvataṃ vemattaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0404a0:285_14: Tattha pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena jeṭṭhakaṭṭhena vā samādhi pamukhaṃ etesanti samādhippamukhā.
atk-s0404a0:285_18: Ārammaṇavasena amataṃ nibbānaṃ ogāhitvā tattha patiṭṭhitāti amatogadhā.
atk-s0404a0:285_19: Tena ca mā maññīti tena vissajjanena “ahaṃ aggasāvakena pucchite pañhe vissajjesi”nti mā mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akāsi.
atk-s0404a0:287_8: odanakummāsūpacayassāti odanena ceva kummāsena ca upacitassa vaḍḍhitassa.
atk-s0404a0:287_12: daharakāle vā ūrūsu sayāpetvā gabbhavāsena dussaṇṭhitānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ saṇṭhānasampādanatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:287_16: Ettha ca aniccapadena ceva bhedanaviddhaṃsanapadehi cassa atthaṅgamo kathito,
atk-s0404a0:287_18: Nibbindathāti ukkaṇṭhatha pajahatha imaṃ kāyanti dasseti.
atk-s0404a0:289_1: Sattame na manāpena paccuṭṭhentīti manavaḍḍhanena manaṃ allīyanākārena āsanā vuṭṭhāya paccuggamanaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0404a0:289_2: Na manāpena abhivādentīti na pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandanti.
atk-s0404a0:289_5: Na upanisīdanti dhammasavanāyāti “dhammaṃ suṇissāmā”ti na samīpe nisīdanti.
atk-s0404a0:289_6: Na sussūsantīti ghaṭapiṭṭhe āsittaudakaṃ viya vivaṭṭetvā gacchati.
atk-s0404a0:289_7: Aṭṭhame veneyyajjhāsayavasena mettābhāvanaṃ pakkhipitvā navaṅgasamannāgatoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:291_2: Hīnaṃ kāyanti uparidevalokaṃ upādāya heṭṭhimo hīnoti vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:291_3: No ca kho yathāsatti yathābalaṃ saṃvibhajimhāti attano sattiyā ca balassa ca anurūpena sīlavantānaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ katvā na bhuñjimhā.
atk-s0404a0:293_2: kule dānaṃ dīyatīti nayidaṃ bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ sandhāya pucchati.
atk-s0404a0:293_3: Seṭṭhissa hi ghare bhikkhusaṅghassa niccaṃ paṇītadānaṃ dīyati,
atk-s0404a0:293_14: Asahatthā detīti sahatthena adatvā parahatthena deti,
atk-s0404a0:293_18: Anāgamanadiṭṭhiko detīti na kammañca phalañca saddahitvā deti.
atk-s0404a0:294_0: Yattha yatthāti tīsu kulasampadāsu yasmiṃ yasmiṃ kule.
atk-s0404a0:294_1: Na uḷārāya bhattabhogāyātiādīsu nānaggarasasugandhasālibhojane upanīte cittaṃ na namati,
atk-s0404a0:294_2: “harathetaṃ rogavaḍḍhana”nti vatvā yena vā tena vā ḍākena saddhiṃ sakuṇḍakabhattaṃ amataṃ viya sampiyāyamāno bhuñjati.

atk-s0404a0:294_9: Na uḷāresu pañcasu kāmaguṇesūti alaṅkatapaṭiyattā rūpavatiyo itthiyo disvā “yakkhiniyo maññe,
atk-s0404a0:294_14: Na sotaṃ odahantīti kathitassa savanatthaṃ na sotapasādaṃ odahanti.
atk-s0404a0:295_0: Velāmoti jātigottarūpabhogasaddhāpaññādīhi mariyādavelaṃ atikkantehi uḷārehi guṇehi samannāgatattā evaṃladdhanāmo.
atk-s0404a0:295_1: So evarūpaṃ dānaṃ adāsi mahādānanti ettha ayaṃ anupubbīkathā –
atk-s0404a0:295_2: so kira atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ purohitagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0404a0:295_4: So soḷasavassakāle bārāṇasirājakumārena saddhiṃ sippuggahaṇatthaṃ takkasilaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0404a0:295_5: Te ubhopi disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike sippaṃ paṭṭhapayiṃsu.

atk-s0404a0:296_1: rājakumāraṃ uggaṇhāpetvā tassa sippe paguṇe jāte taṃ tattheva nivattesi.
atk-s0404a0:296_2: Etenupāyena caturāsīti nagarasahassāni gantvā caturāsītiyā rājakumārānaṃ sippaṃ paguṇaṃ kāretvā tasmiṃ
atk-s0404a0:296_3: tasmiṃ nagare taṃ taṃ nivattetvā bārāṇasirājakumāraṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ paccāgañchi.

atk-s0404a0:297_10: Velāmo caturāsītiyā rājasahassānaṃ janapade vicāretvā cakkanābhiyaṃ are viya rañño janapadasmiṃ oropesi.

atk-s0404a0:298_2: dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti rañño ārocetvā gaṅgātīre dvādasayojanikā uddhanapantiyo kāretvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne

atk-s0404a0:298_7: dānaṃ bhuñjantū”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā “dānaggaṃ pariniṭṭhita”nti dānayuttehi ārocite sahassagghanakaṃ
atk-s0404a0:298_8: vatthaṃ nivāsetvā pañcasatagghanakaṃ ekaṃsaṃ katvā sabbālaṅkārabhūsito dānavīmaṃsanatthāya phalikavaṇṇassa

atk-s0404a0:298_22: Eteneva nīhārena divase divase dānaṃ dīyati.
atk-s0404a0:299_0: Tasmiṃ kho pana dānagge “idaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0404a0:299_2: Idāni taṃ dānaṃ ettakamatteneva na niṭṭhaṃ gamissatīti rattasuvaṇṇaṃ nīharāpetvā suvaṇṇapātiyo kāretvā
atk-s0404a0:299_4: Rājāno “cirassaṃ vata mayaṃ ācariyena anuggahitā”ti sabbaṃ sampādetvā pesesuṃ.
atk-s0404a0:299_5: Dāne diyyamāneyeva satta vassāni satta māsā atikkantā.
atk-s0404a0:299_6: Atha brāhmaṇo “hiraññaṃ bhājetvā dānaṃ dassāmī”ti mahante okāse dānaṃ sajjāpesi.
atk-s0404a0:299_7: Sajjāpetvā caturāsīti suvaṇṇapātisahassāni ādiṃ katvā koṭito paṭṭhāya adāsi.
atk-s0404a0:300_6: dadamāno pātiyā bāhirantena vaggavagge paṭiggāhake ṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃ pātiyā pakkhittaṃ datvā pacchā sandhisandhito
atk-s0404a0:300_7: viyojetvā pātinti evaṃ caturāsīti pātisahassāni adāsi.

atk-s0404a0:300_24: Najjo maññe vissandantīti nadiyo viya vissandanti.
atk-s0404a0:301_4: Evarūpaṃ pana dānaṃ dadantopi ahaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yuttarūpaṃ puggalaṃ nālatthaṃ,

atk-s0404a0:301_8: Kasmā “ahaṃ tena samayena velāmo brāhmaṇo”ti āhāti?
atk-s0404a0:301_10: Tāni hi rūpādīni nirujjhamānāni imesaṃ paccaye datvā niruddhāni aparāparaṃ avicchinnaṃ paveṇiṃ gahetvā evamāha.
atk-s0404a0:301_11: Na taṃ koci dakkhiṇaṃ sodhetīti koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā uṭṭhāya taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ sodhetīti vattabbo nāhosi.
atk-s0404a0:302_1: Idaṃ tato mahapphalataranti idaṃ sotāpannassa dinnadānaṃ lokiyamahājanassa sattamāsādhikāni satta saṃvaccharāni
atk-s0404a0:303_0: Yo ca sataṃ diṭṭhisampannānanti ettha ekassa sakadāgāmissa vasena ekuttarasataṃ sotāpanne katvā sotāpannagaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-s0404a0:303_1: Iminā upāyena sabbavāresu heṭṭhā heṭṭhā āgate anantarena sataguṇaṃ katvā puggalagaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-s0404a0:304_0: Buddhappamukhanti ettha sammāsambuddhaṃ saṅghattheraṃ katvā nisinno saṅgho buddhappamukho saṅghoti veditabbo.
atk-s0404a0:304_1: Cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissāti ettha cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa katavihāro nāma yattha cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0404a0:304_3: catūhi disāhi anudisāhi ca bhikkhū āgantvā appaṭipucchitvāyeva pāde dhovitvā kuñcikāya dvāraṃ vivaritvā
atk-s0404a0:305_0: Saraṇaṃ gaccheyyāti ettha maggenāgataṃ anivattanasaraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:305_2: attānaṃ niyyādetvā dinnattā saraṇāgamanaṃ tato mahapphalataranti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:305_6: sabbasattānaṃ abhayadānassa dinnattā sīlaṃ tato mahapphalataranti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:305_9: Apare pana “gaddohanamatta”nti pāḷiṃ vatvā gāviyā ekavāraṃ thanaañchanamattanti atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0404a0:306_0: Upamāto pana imāni dānādīni puññāni evaṃ veditabbāni –
atk-s0404a0:306_1: sacepi hi jambudīpaṃ bheritalasadisaṃ samatalaṃ katvā koṭito paṭṭhāya pallaṅke attharitvā ariyapuggale nisīdāpeyya,
atk-s0404a0:306_8: Ettakassa janassa dinnadānato sammāsambuddhassa dinnameva mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:309_0: Teneva bhagavā parinibbānasamaye “dhammānudhammappaṭipatti anuttarā pūjā”ti āha.
atk-s0404a0:311_10: Satimantoti devatānañhi ekantasukhitāya sati thirā na hoti,

atk-s0404a0:311_13: Idha brahmacariyavāsoti jambudīpe buddhapaccekabuddhānaṃ uppajjanato aṭṭhaṅgikamaggabrahmacariyavāsopi idheva hoti.

atk-s0404a0:316_7: vitakkanidāno”ti imasmiṃ pana sutte idha vinicchayoti vutto vitakkoyeva āgato.
atk-s0404a0:316_8: Lābhaṃ labhitvā hi iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ sundarāsundaraṃ vitakkeneva vinicchinanti “ettakaṃ me rūpārammaṇatthāya bhavissati,
atk-s0404a0:317_0: Chandarāgoti evaṃ akusalavitakkena vitakkite vatthusmiṃ dubbalarāgo ca balavarāgo ca uppajjati.
atk-s0404a0:317_7: mā aññassa acchariyaṃ hotūti pavattattā macchariyanti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0404a0:319_6: asaṅkheyyakappe buddhesu anibbattesu taṃ ṭhānaṃ suññaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:321_2: Suparicitaṃ hotīti suṭṭhu upacitaṃ suvaḍḍhitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:323_1: Chaṭṭhe candikāputtoti mātu nāmavasena paññāto candikāputtatthero.
atk-s0404a0:323_2: Cetasā cittaṃ hotīti cittavārapariyāyena cittavārapariyāyo cito vaḍḍhito hoti.
atk-s0404a0:323_3: Cetasā cittaṃ suparicitanti cittavārapariyāyena cittavārapariyāyo uparūpari sucito suvaḍḍhito hoti.
atk-s0404a0:323_4: Nevassa cittaṃ pariyādiyantīti tāni ārammaṇāni tassa khīṇāsavassa cittuppādaṃ gahetvā khepetvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0404a0:323_5: Amissīkatanti tāni ārammaṇāni anallīnattā tehi amissīkataṃ.
atk-s0404a0:324_4: Sunikhātattāti ayamusalehi koṭṭetvā koṭṭetvā suṭṭhu nikhātattā.
atk-s0404a0:324_5: Evameva khoti ettha silāyūpo viya khīṇāsavo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0404a0:324_6: mahāvātā viya chasu dvāresu uppajjanakā kilesā,
atk-s0404a0:324_7: catūhi disāhi āgantvā vātānaṃ silāyūpaṃ cāletuṃ asamatthabhāvo viya chasu dvāresu uppajjanakakilesānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:326_1: Sattame bhayaṃ veraṃ pasavatīti cittutrāsabhayañca puggalaverañca paṭilabhati.
atk-s0404a0:328_0: 29. Navame āghātavatthūnīti āghātakāraṇāni. Āghātaṃ bandhatīti kopaṃ bandhati uppādeti.
atk-s0404a0:330_2: Taṃ kutettha labbhāti “taṃ anatthacaraṇaṃ mā ahosī”ti etasmiṃ puggale kuto labbhā,
atk-s0404a0:330_4: “paro nāma parassa attano cittaruciyā anatthaṃ karotī”ti evaṃ cintetvā āghātaṃ paṭivineti.
atk-s0404a0:330_6: taṃ kopakaraṇaṃ ettha puggale kuto labbhā,
atk-s0404a0:330_10: tasmiṃ me kopakaraṇe kuto lābhā lābhā,
atk-s0404a0:332_2: Dutiye yattha kāmā nirujjhantīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne kāmā vūpasammanti.
atk-s0404a0:332_9: Ettha kāmā nirujjhantīti ettha paṭhamajjhāne kāmā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0404a0:332_11: te kāme nirodhetvā nirodhetvā viharanti nāma.
atk-s0404a0:336_2: Na suppatiṭṭhitaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvāti yathā suppatiṭṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0404a0:336_5: Na svādhiṭṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti yathā suṭṭhu adhiṭṭhitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0404a0:336_8: Mudu cittaṃ hoti kammaññanti yathā vipassanācittaṃ lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe mudu kammakkhamaṃ kammayoggaṃ hoti,
atk-s0404a0:336_9: evamassa abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ mudu hoti kammaññaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:336_10: Appamāṇo samādhīti catubrahmavihārasamādhipi maggaphalasamādhipi appamāṇo samādhi nāma,
atk-s0404a0:336_11: idha pana “appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇa”nti iminā pariyāyena suppaguṇasamādhi appamāṇasamādhīti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0404a0:336_12: So appamāṇena samādhinā subhāvitenāti imasmiṃ ṭhāne ayaṃ bhikkhu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0404a0:336_13: Idāni khīṇāsavassa abhiññāpaṭipāṭiṃ dassento yassa yassa cātiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:338_2: Yadeva tattha hoti rūpagatanti tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānakkhaṇe vatthuvasena vā cittasamuṭṭhānikādivasena vā yaṃ rūpaṃ nāma pavattati.
atk-s0404a0:339_3: Cittaṃ upasaṃharatīti ñāṇena ānisaṃsaṃ disvā otāreti.
atk-s0404a0:339_6: So tattha ṭhito āsavānaṃ khayaṃ pāpuṇātīti so tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhāne ṭhito taṃ balavavipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0404a0:339_8: so tehi dhammehīti yasmā aniccatotiādīsu aniccato palokatoti dvīhi padehi aniccalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:339_11: Tasmā so tehi evaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā diṭṭhehi antosamāpattiyaṃ pañcakkhandhadhammehi.
atk-s0404a0:339_12: Cittaṃ paṭivāpetīti cittaṃ paṭisaṃharati moceti apaneti.
atk-s0404a0:339_13: Upasaṃharatīti vipassanācittaṃ tāva savanavasena thutivasena pariyattivasena paññattivasena ca santaṃ
atk-s0404a0:339_14: nibbānanti evaṃ asaṅkhatāya amatāya dhātuyā upasaṃharati.
atk-s0404a0:339_15: Maggacittaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavaseneva “etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇīta”nti na evaṃ vadati.
atk-s0404a0:339_16: Iminā panākārena taṃ paṭivijjhanto tattha cittaṃ upasaṃharatīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:340_0: So tattha ṭhitoti tassā tilakkhaṇārammaṇāya vipassanāya ṭhito.
atk-s0404a0:340_1: Āsavānaṃ khayaṃ pāpuṇātīti anukkamena cattāro magge bhāvetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0404a0:340_4: Samathavipassanāsu hi sabbaso chandarāgaṃ pariyādātuṃ sakkonto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0404a0:341_3: Yadeva tattha hoti vedanāgatanti idha rūpaṃ na gahitaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0404a0:341_5: Ayañhi heṭṭhā rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā rūpaṃ atikkamitvā arūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ samāpannoti samathavasenāpi anena rūpaṃ samatikkantaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:341_6: heṭṭhā rūpaṃ sammasitvā taṃ atikkamma idāni arūpaṃ sammasatīti vipassanāvasenāpi anena rūpaṃ atikkantaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:341_7: Āruppe pana sabbasopi rūpaṃ natthīti taṃ sandhāyapi rūpaṃ na gahitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:341_10: Tasmiñhi cattāropi arūpakkhandhā sukhumā na sammasanūpagā.
atk-s0404a0:341_16: tāvatā oḷārike dhamme sammasato aññāpaṭivedho hoti,
atk-s0404a0:341_18: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ pana sukhumattā saññāsamāpattīti na vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:341_22: “santāni paṇītānī”ti evaṃ kevalaṃ ācikkhitabbāni thometabbāni vaṇṇetabbānīti.
atk-s0404a0:343_8: Tadeva nāma cakkhuṃ bhavissatīti taññeva pasādacakkhu asambhinnaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0404a0:343_9: Te rūpāti tadeva rūpārammaṇaṃ āpāthaṃ āgamissati.
atk-s0404a0:343_10: Tañcāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedissatīti tañca rūpāyatanaṃ na jānissati.
atk-s0404a0:344_1: Saññīmeva nu khoti sacittakoyeva nu kho.
atk-s0404a0:344_5: kiṃ paṭhamajjhānādisamaṅgino rūpādipaṭisaṃvedanā hotīti? Na hoti,
atk-s0404a0:344_7: tāva rūpaṃ samatikkantaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-s0404a0:344_9: Samatikkantattā pana taṃ natthi nāma hoti,
atk-s0404a0:344_10: natthitāya paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkotīti dassetuṃ idameva gaṇhi.
atk-s0404a0:345_3: Sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilese niggaṇhitvā vāretvā ṭhito,
atk-s0404a0:345_4: kilesānaṃ pana chinnante uppannoti na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato.
atk-s0404a0:345_6: Ṭhitattā santusitoti ṭhitattāyeva santuṭṭho nāma jāto.
atk-s0404a0:345_7: Santusitattā no paritassatīti santuṭṭhattāyeva paritāsaṃ nāpajjati. Ayaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:345_9: samādhi kiṃ phaloti iminā ayaṃ therī tālaphalaññeva gahetvā “idaṃ phalaṃ kiṃ phalaṃ nāmā”ti pucchamānā viya arahattaphalasamādhiṃ gahetvā “ayaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:345_11: samādhi kiṃ phalo vutto bhagavatā”ti pucchati.
atk-s0404a0:345_14: Evaṃsaññīpīti imāya arahattaphalasaññāya saññīpi tadāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedetīti evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte arahattaphalasamādhi kathitoti.
atk-s0404a0:347_7: Dhammaṃ vo brāhmaṇā desessāmīti ahaṃ vo catusaccadhammaṃ desessāmi.
atk-s0404a0:348_3: Dvisahassathāmaṃ nāma yassa āropitassa jiyābaddho lohasīsādīnaṃ bhāro daṇḍe gahetvā yāva kaṇḍappamāṇā ukkhittassa pathavito muccati.
atk-s0404a0:348_4: Sikkhitoti dasa dvādasa vassāni ācariyakule uggahitasippo.
atk-s0404a0:348_6: katahattho na hoti ayaṃ pana katahattho ciṇṇavasibhāvo.
atk-s0404a0:348_8: Lahukena asanenāti anto susiraṃ katvā tūlādīhi pūretvā katalakkhaparikammena sallahukakaṇḍena.
atk-s0404a0:348_9: Evaṃ katañhi ekausabhagāmī dve usabhānipi gacchati…pe…
atk-s0404a0:348_14: yathā so dhanuggaho taṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ chāyaṃ sīghameva atikkāmeti,
atk-s0404a0:348_15: evaṃ sakalacakkavāḷaṃ sīghaṃ sīghaṃ atikkamanasamatthena javena samannāgato.
atk-s0404a0:350_11: Tato uppannakodhā “gaṇhatha deve”ti sammukhasammukhaṭṭhāneneva sineruṃ abhiruhanti,
atk-s0404a0:350_13: Tesaṃ gopālakadārakānaṃ aññamaññaṃ daṇḍakehi paharaṇasadisaṃ yuddhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:350_14: Sakko devarājā heṭṭhā pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā upari devapuraṃ parivāretvā attasadisā vajirahatthā paṭimā ṭhapāpesi.
atk-s0404a0:350_15: Asurā heṭṭhā pañca ṭhānāni paṭibāhitvā abhiruḷhā indapaṭimāyo disvā nivattitvā asurapurameva gacchanti.
atk-s0404a0:351_2: Adassanaṃ gatoti māropi vaṭṭapādakaṃ katvā rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ samāpannassa cittaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0404a0:351_3: tadeva vipassanāpādakaṃ katvā samāpannassa cittaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:351_4: Arūpāvacarasamāpatti pana vaṭṭapādā vā hotu vipassanāpādā vā,
atk-s0404a0:351_5: taṃ samāpannassa māro cittaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:353_6: Ogāhaṃ otiṇṇassāti ogāhitabbattā ogāhanti laddhanāmaṃ udakatitthaṃ otiṇṇassa.
atk-s0404a0:353_9: Idāni yasmā dasabalassa hatthināgena kiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0404a0:353_10: sāsane pana taṃsarikkhakaṃ puggalaṃ dassetuṃ idamāhaṭaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:353_11: tasmā taṃ puggalaṃ dassento evameva khotiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:355_3: hotīti idha bhagavā “tapussagahapatino idha ṭhitena ānandena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo bhavissati,
atk-s0404a0:355_4: tatonidānaṃ ahaṃ mahantaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ desessāmī”ti ñatvā āha.
atk-s0404a0:355_5: Upasaṅkamīti so kira bhuttapātarāso “dasabalassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gamissāmī”ti nikkhamanto dūratova theraṃ disvā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0404a0:355_8: taṃ amhākaṃ mahāpapāto viya ogāhitvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0404a0:355_9: Nekkhamme cittaṃ pakkhandatīti pabbajjāya cittaṃ ārammaṇavasena pakkhandati,
atk-s0404a0:355_13: ‘Etaṃ santa’nti passatoti etaṃ nekkhammaṃ santaṃ vigatadarathapariḷāhanti evaṃ passantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:355_14: Bahunā janena visabhāgoti tayidaṃ bahunā mahājanena saddhiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ visabhāgaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:356_2: nekkhamme cittaṃ na pakkhandatīti tassa evaṃ vitakkentassāpi mayhaṃ pabbajjāya cittaṃ na otarati.
atk-s0404a0:356_3: “Etaṃ santa”nti passatoti “sādhu nekkhamma”nti parivitakkanavasena “etaṃ nekkhammaṃ santa”nti passantassapi.
atk-s0404a0:356_4: Anāsevitoti na āsevito na phassito na sacchikato.
atk-s0404a0:356_9: Svāssa me hoti ābādhoti so mayhaṃ ābādhanaṭṭhena ābādho hoti.
atk-s0404a0:356_10: Avitakke cittaṃ na pakkhandatīti avitakkavicāre dutiyajjhāne ārammaṇavasena cittaṃ na pakkhandati.
atk-s0404a0:358_5: Paṭilīnanisabhoti ekībhāvavasena paṭilīno ceva uttamaṭṭhena ca nisabho.
atk-s0404a0:358_8: Kāmasambādhassa hi abhāvamatteneva paṭhamajjhānaṃ okāsādhigamo nāma,
atk-s0404a0:358_10: Tatrāpatthi sambādhoti tasmimpi paṭhamajjhāne sambādho paṭipīḷanaṃ atthiyeva.
atk-s0404a0:358_12: Kiñca tattha sambādhoti tasmiṃ pana jhāne kiṃ sambādho nāma.
atk-s0404a0:358_13: Ayamettha sambādhoti ayaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ aniruddhabhāvo sambādho saṃpīḷā nāma.
atk-s0404a0:358_16: atha kho āsavakkhayo nāma sabbasambādhānaṃ pahīnattā sabbena sabbaṃ okāsādhigamo nāmāti.
atk-s0404a0:360_1: Dutiye yathā yathā ca tadāyatananti yena yena kāraṇena yena yenākārena taṃ paṭhamajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ āyatanaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:360_2: Tathā tathā naṃ kāyena phusitvā viharatīti tena tena kāraṇena tena tenākārena taṃ samāpattiṃ sahajātanāmakāyena phusitvā viharati,
atk-s0404a0:360_4: Kāyasakkhi vutto bhagavatā pariyāyenāti yasmā tena nāmākāyena paṭhamajjhānaṃ sacchikataṃ,
atk-s0404a0:360_7: sabbassa katattā ayaṃ nippariyāyena kāyasakkhi nāma.
atk-s0404a0:362_1: Tatiye paññāya ca naṃ pajānātīti taṃ paṭhamajjhānavipassanāpaññāya jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:364_2: Ettha ca ubhatobhāgavimuttoti ubhatobhāgehi samathavipassanānaṃ paccanīkakilesehi vimutto.
atk-s0404a0:366_4: Tadaṅganibbānanti paṭhamajjhānādinā tena tena aṅgena nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:379_1: Dutiye na cetanāya karaṇīyanti na cetetvā kappetvā pakappetvā kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:379_2: Dhammatā esāti dhammasabhāvo eso kāraṇaniyamo ayaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:379_5: Apārā pāraṃ gamanāyāti orimatīrabhūtā tebhūmakavaṭṭā nibbānapāraṃ gamanatthāya.
atk-s0404a0:381_0: 3-5. Tatiye hatūpanisoti hatakāraṇo. Catutthapañcamesu dvīhi therehi kathitabhāvova viseso.
atk-s0404a0:383_1: Chaṭṭhe neva pathaviyaṃ pathavīsaññī assāti pathaviṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pathavīti evaṃ uppannāya saññāya saññī na bhaveyya.
atk-s0404a0:383_3: Na idhaloketi idhaloke uppajjanakacatukkapañcakajjhānasaññāya na saññī bhaveyya.
atk-s0404a0:383_4: Na paraloketi paraloke uppajjanakacatukkapañcakajjhānasaññāya na saññī bhaveyya.
atk-s0404a0:383_5: Saññī ca pana assāti atha ca panassa samāpatti savitakkasamāpattiyeva assāti vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:383_6: Etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītanti santaṃ santanti appetvā nisinnassa divasampi cittuppādo “santaṃ santa”nteva pavattati,
atk-s0404a0:383_7: paṇītaṃ paṇītanti appetvā nisinnassa divasampi cittuppādo “paṇītaṃ paṇīta”nteva pavattati.
atk-s0404a0:383_8: Yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamathoti nibbānaṃ nibbānanti appetvā nisinnassa divasampi cittuppādo “nibbānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:383_9: nibbāna”nteva pavattatīti sabbampetaṃ phalasamāpattisamādhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:385_3: tasmiṃ samaye ahaṃ “bhavanirodho nibbāna”nti imāya phalasamāpattisaññāya saññī ahosiṃ.
atk-s0404a0:385_4: Sacittakā me sā samāpatti ahosīti paccavekkhaṇā kathitā.
atk-s0404a0:387_1: Aṭṭhame samantapāsādikoti pasādāvahānaṃyeva kāyakammādīnaṃ sabbhāvato samanto pāsādiko.
atk-s0404a0:389_2: Vimokkhāti paccanīkadhammehi vimuttattā ārammaṇe ca nirāsaṅkabhāvena suṭṭhu muttattā evaṃladdhanāmā.
atk-s0404a0:391_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame pañcaṅgasamannāgatoti pañcahi guṇaṅgehi samannāgato.
atk-s0404a0:391_2: Nātidūraṃ hoti nāccāsannanti yañhi atidūre hoti,
atk-s0404a0:391_3: piṇḍāya caritvā tattha gacchantassa kāyacittadarathā hoti,
atk-s0404a0:391_4: tato anuppannaṃ vā samādhiṃ uppādetuṃ uppannaṃ vā thiraṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0404a0:391_6: Cattālīsausabhamatte pana padese vasataṃ dūrāsannadosavimuttañca gamanāgamanasampannaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0404a0:393_1: Dutiye kevalīti kevalehi sakalehi guṇehi samannāgato.
atk-s0404a0:393_5: Vimuttikkhandhenāti ettha ṭhapetvā sīlādayo tayo sesā phaladhammā vimutti nāma,
atk-s0404a0:397_1: Pañcame evameva khoti yathā sabbasattānaṃ sammāsambuddho aggo,
atk-s0404a0:397_2: evaṃ sabbesaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ kārāpakaappamādo aggoti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0404a0:398_8: Idaṃ kira suttaṃ sutvā bhātiyamahārājā vīmaṃsitukāmatāya ekasmiṃ gabbhe catujātigandhehi paribhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0404a0:398_9: katvā sugandhapupphāni āharāpetvā ekassa samuggassa majjhe sumanapupphamuṭṭhiṃ ṭhapetvā sesāni tassa
atk-s0404a0:398_10: samantato muṭṭhiṃ katvā ṭhapetvā dvāraṃ pidhāya bahi nikkhanto.
atk-s0404a0:398_11: Athassa muhuttaṃ bahi vītināmetvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā pavisantassa sabbapaṭhamaṃ sumanapupphagandho ghānaṃ pahari.
atk-s0404a0:398_12: So mahātalasmiṃyeva mahācetiyābhimukho nipajjitvā “vassikaṃ tesaṃ agganti kathentena sukathitaṃ sammāsambuddhenā”ti cetiyaṃ vandi.
atk-s0404a0:400_0: 16. Chaṭṭhe gotrabhūti sikhāpattavipassanābhūtena nibbānārammaṇena gotrabhuñāṇena samannāgato.
atk-s0404a0:402_1: Sattame sanāthāti sañātakā bahuñātivaggā hutvā viharatha.
atk-s0404a0:402_4: Kalyāṇamittotiādīsu sīlādiguṇasampannā kalyāṇā mittā assāti kalyāṇamitto.
atk-s0404a0:402_5: Tevassa ṭhānanisajjādīsu saha ayanato sahāyāti kalyāṇasahāyo.
atk-s0404a0:402_6: Cittena ceva kāyena ca kalyāṇamittesuyeva sampavaṅko oṇatoti kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
atk-s0404a0:402_9: Khamoti gāḷhena pharusena kakkhaḷena vutto khamati na kuppati.
atk-s0404a0:402_10: Padakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsaninti yathā ekacco ovadiyamāno vāmato gaṇhāti,
atk-s0404a0:402_15: tumhesu anovadantesu ko añño ovadissatī”ti padakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0404a0:403_2: Tattha uccakammaṃ nāma cīvarassa karaṇaṃ rajanaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:404_10: Atha vā suttantapiṭakampi abhidhammapiṭakampi dhammo eva,
atk-s0404a0:404_14: Iti sabbasmimpi ettha dhamme ca abhidhamme ca vinaye ca abhivinaye ca uḷārapāmojjo hotīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:404_16: cātubhūmakakusaladhammakāraṇā tesaṃ adhigamatthāya anikkhittadhuro hotīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:406_0: 18. Aṭṭhame therānukampitassāti therehi ovādānusāsanidānasamussāhitāya hitapharaṇāya anukampitassa.
atk-s0404a0:410_1: Dasamaṃ yasmā kururaṭṭhavāsino bhikkhū gambhīrapaññākārakā yuttappayuttā,
atk-s0404a0:410_2: tasmā yathā tesaṃ dīghanikāyādīsu mahānidānādīni kathitāni,
atk-s0404a0:410_3: evamidampi gambhīraṃ sukhumaṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ suttaṃ tattheva avoca.
atk-s0404a0:410_4: Tattha pañcaṅgavippahīnoti pañcahi aṅgehi vippayutto hutvā khīṇāsavo avasi vasati vasissati.
atk-s0404a0:410_8: bhikkhu chaḷaṅgasamannāgato hotīti chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0404a0:410_14: Satārakkhena cetasāti khīṇāsavassa hi tīsu dvāresu sabbakāle sati ārakkhakiccaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0404a0:410_15: Tenevassa carato ca tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hotīti vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:411_5: idameva sacca”nti evaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ gahitāni bahūni saccānīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:411_12: Paṭinissaṭṭhānīti yathā na puna cittaṃ ārohanti,
atk-s0404a0:412_2: Sammā avayā saṭṭhā esanā assāti samavayasaṭṭhesano,
atk-s0404a0:412_4: Rāgā cittaṃ vimuttantiādīhi maggassa kiccanipphatti kathitā.
atk-s0404a0:414_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame visamagateti visamaṭṭhānesu gocaresu gate.
atk-s0404a0:414_3: Tassa hi ussannatejatāya khuddakesu pāṇesu anukampā hoti.
atk-s0404a0:414_6: te palāyissantīti sīhanādaṃ naditvāva gocarāya pakkamati.
atk-s0404a0:414_7: Tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacananti yadi hi sahanatāya hananatāya ca sīho,
atk-s0404a0:414_8: tathāgato hi sabbāni ca iṭṭhāniṭṭhāni sahati,
atk-s0404a0:415_1: Yathā vā pubbabuddhānaṃ balāni puññasampattiyā āgatāni,
atk-s0404a0:415_3: Tattha duvidhaṃ tathāgatassa balaṃ kāyabalaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:419_6: saṃyuttake āgatāni tesattati ñāṇāni sattasattati ñāṇānīti,
atk-s0404a0:419_9: Ñāṇañhi akampiyaṭṭhena upatthambhanaṭṭhena ca balanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:420_7: Sabbagavaseṭṭho sabbaparissayasaho seto pāsādiko mahābhāravaho asanisatasaddehipi asampakampiyo nisabho,
atk-s0404a0:420_11: Ṭhānanti catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:420_13: Yatheva hi nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho usabhabalena samannāgato catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0404a0:420_14: evaṃ tathāgatopi dasahi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato catūhi vesārajjapādehi aṭṭhaparisapathaviṃ uppīḷetvā
atk-s0404a0:420_15: sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiyo acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0404a0:420_16: Evaṃ tiṭṭhamāno ca taṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti upagacchati na paccakkhāti attani āropeti.
atk-s0404a0:421_5: yathā sīho sīhabalena samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati,
atk-s0404a0:421_6: evaṃ tathāgatasīhopi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso “iti sakkāyo”tiādinā
atk-s0404a0:422_0: Brahmacakkaṃ pavattetīti ettha brahmanti seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:422_2: Taṃ panetaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti paṭivedhañāṇañceva desanāñāṇañca.
atk-s0404a0:422_8: Tusitabhavanato vā yāva mahābodhipallaṅke arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:422_10: Dīpaṅkarato vā paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:423_0: Idāni yehi dasahi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
atk-s0404a0:423_1: tāni vitthārato dassetuṃ katamāni dasa? Idha,
atk-s0404a0:423_8: Taṃ bhagavā “ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ hetū paccayā uppādāya,
atk-s0404a0:423_10: Ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ na hetū na paccayā uppādāya,
atk-s0404a0:423_11: taṃ taṃ aṭṭhāna”nti pajānanto ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0404a0:423_12: Abhidhamme panetaṃ “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇa”ntiādinā nayena vitthāritameva.
atk-s0404a0:423_15: tathāgatassāti idampi ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇaṃ tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:424_2: Ṭhānaso hetusoti paccayato ceva hetuto ca.
atk-s0404a0:424_5: Imassa pana ñāṇassa vitthārakathā “atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni gatisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantī”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme āgatāyeva.
atk-s0404a0:425_2: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ ghātentesu “imassa cetanā nirayagāminī bhavissati,
atk-s0404a0:425_3: imassa tiracchānayonigāminī”ti iminā nayena ekavatthusmimpi kusalākusalacetanāsaṅkhātānaṃ paṭipattīnaṃ aviparītato sabhāvaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:425_4: Imassapi ca ñāṇassa vitthārakathā “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa sabbatthagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ?
atk-s0404a0:425_5: Idha tathāgato ayaṃ maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā nirayagāminīti pajānātī”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme āgatāyeva.
atk-s0404a0:426_0: Anekadhātunti cakkhudhātuādīhi kāmadhātuādīhi vā dhātūhi bahudhātuṃ.
atk-s0404a0:426_3: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti tāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ aviparītato sabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhati.
atk-s0404a0:426_4: Idampi ñāṇaṃ “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa anekadhātunānādhātulokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ?
atk-s0404a0:426_5: Idha tathāgato khandhanānattaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme vitthāritameva.
atk-s0404a0:427_1: Idampi ñāṇaṃ “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ?
atk-s0404a0:427_2: Idha tathāgato pajānāti santi sattā hīnādhimuttikā”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme vitthāritameva.
atk-s0404a0:428_6: Imassāpi ñāṇassa vitthārakathā “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ?
atk-s0404a0:428_7: Idha tathāgato sattānaṃ āsayaṃ pajānātī”ti ādinā nayena abhidhamme āgatāyeva.
atk-s0404a0:429_7: tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ paguṇajjhānañceva bhavaṅgaphalasamāpattiyo ca.
atk-s0404a0:429_8: Heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimañhi paguṇajjhānaṃ uparimassa uparimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0404a0:429_12: Taṃ sandhāya ca “tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:429_13: Idampi ñāṇaṃ “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ?
atk-s0404a0:429_15: atthekacco jhāyī sampattiṃyeva samānaṃ vipattīti paccetī”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme vitthāritameva.
atk-s0404a0:429_16: Sabbañāṇānaṃ vitthārakathāya vinicchayo sammohavinodaniyā vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāya vutto,
atk-s0404a0:430_0: Tattha paravādīkathā hoti “dasabalañāṇaṃ nāma pāṭiyekkaṃ ñāṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0404a0:430_17: Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana etehi jānitabbañca tato uttariñca pajānāti,
atk-s0404a0:430_18: etesaṃ pana kiccaṃ na sabbaṃ karoti.
atk-s0404a0:430_19: Tañhi jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0404a0:430_21: maggo hutvā kilese khepetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0404a0:431_0: Apica paravādī evaṃ pucchitabbo “dasabalañāṇaṃ nāmetaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ,
atk-s0404a0:432_0: Evamettha anupadavaṇṇanaṃ ñatvā idāni yasmā tathāgato paṭhamaṃyeva ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇena veneyyasattānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:432_1: āsavakkhayādhigamassa ceva anadhigamassa ca ṭhānāṭṭhānabhūtaṃ kilesāvaraṇābhāvaṃ passati lokiyasammādiṭṭhiṭṭhānādidassanato
atk-s0404a0:432_3: Atha nesaṃ kammavipākañāṇena vipākāvaraṇābhāvaṃ passati tihetukappaṭisandhidassanato,
atk-s0404a0:432_5: Evamanāvaraṇānaṃ anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇena anukūladhammadesanatthaṃ cariyāvisesaṃ passati dhātuvemattadassanato.
atk-s0404a0:432_6: Atha nesaṃ nānādhimuttikatañāṇena adhimuttiṃ passati payogaṃ anādiyitvāpi adhimuttivasena dhammadesanatthaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:432_7: Athevaṃ diṭṭhādhimuttīnaṃ yathāsatti yathābalaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ indriyaparopariyattiñāṇena indriyaparopariyattaṃ
atk-s0404a0:432_9: Evaṃ pariññātindriyaparopariyattā pana te sace dūre honti,
atk-s0404a0:432_10: atha jhānādiñāṇena jhānādīsu vasībhūtattā iddhivisesena te khippaṃ upagacchati.
atk-s0404a0:432_12: dibbacakkhānubhāvato pattabbena cetopariyañāṇena sampati cittavisesaṃ passanto āsavakkhayañāṇānubhāvena
atk-s0404a0:432_13: āsavakkhayagāminiyā paṭipadāya vigatasammohattā āsavakkhayāya dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0404a0:432_14: Tasmā iminānukkamena imāni balāni vuttānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0404a0:434_1: Dutiye ye te dhammāti ye te dasabalañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇadhammā.
atk-s0404a0:434_6: Atītā buddhāpi hi ete dhamme kathayiṃsu,
atk-s0404a0:434_10: Atha vā bhūtamatthaṃ abhibhavitvā yathāsabhāvato aggahetvā vattanato adhivuttiyoti diṭṭhiyo vuccanti,
atk-s0404a0:434_16: Tatthāti tesu dhammesu tesaṃ tesaṃ tathā tathā dhammaṃ desetunti tesaṃ tesaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vā itaresaṃ vā āsayaṃ ñatvā tathā tathā dhammaṃ desetuṃ.
atk-s0404a0:434_17: Hīnaṃ vā hīnanti ñassatīti hīnaṃ vā dhammaṃ “hīno dhammo”ti jānissati.
atk-s0404a0:434_21: Tattha tattha yathābhūtañāṇanti tesu tesu dhammesu yathāsabhāvañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:434_23: Evaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dassetvā puna dasabalañāṇaṃ dassento dasayimānītiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:436_1: Tatiye āpanno hoti kañcideva desanti kañci āpattikoṭṭhāsaṃ āpanno hoti.
atk-s0404a0:436_6: Paññāya disvāti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya passitvā passitvā pahātabbā.
atk-s0404a0:438_1: Catutthe jānāmimaṃ dhammanti iminā ñāṇavādassa vadanākāro vutto.
atk-s0404a0:440_2: tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ khettaṭṭhena adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vā āyatanānīti kasiṇāyatanāni.
atk-s0404a0:440_9: Tena tena vā kāraṇena evaṃ pasāreti ālokamiva rūpadassanakāmo.
atk-s0404a0:440_12: Advayanti idaṃ pana ekassa aññabhāvānupagamanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:440_13: Yathā hi udakaṃ paviṭṭhassa sabbadisāsu udakameva hoti na aññaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:440_17: Appamāṇanti idaṃ tassa tassa pharaṇaappamāṇavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:440_25: kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayena panetāni pathavīkasiṇādīni vitthārato visuddhimagge vuttāneva.
atk-s0404a0:442_2: Atthassa pattiṃ hadayassa santinti dvīhipi padehi arahattameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:442_4: Piyasātarūpanti piyajātikesu ca sātajātikesu ca vatthūsu uppajjanato evaṃladdhanāmaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:442_5: Ekohaṃ jhāyaṃ sukhamanubodhinti evaṃ kilesasenaṃ jinitvā ahaṃ ekakova jhāyanto sukhaṃ anubujjhiṃ sacchiakāsiṃ.
atk-s0404a0:442_7: Na sampajjati kenaci meti mayhaṃ kenaci saddhiṃ mittadhammo nāma natthi.
atk-s0404a0:442_9: eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā atthoti abhinibbattesunti pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiparamo uttamo atthoti gahetvā abhinibbattesuṃ.
atk-s0404a0:442_12: Tadabhiññāsi bhagavāti taṃ bhagavā abhiññāpaññāya abhiññāsi.
atk-s0404a0:442_17: Atthassa pattīti etesaṃ catunnaṃ saccānaṃ diṭṭhattā arahattasaṅkhātassa atthassa patti,
atk-s0404a0:444_1: Sattame abhijānāthāti abhijānitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā viharatha.
atk-s0404a0:444_4: Dhammadesanāya vā dhammadesananti yadidaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa dhammadesanāya saddhiṃ amhākaṃ dhammadesanaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:444_5: amhākaṃ vā dhammadesanāya saddhiṃ samaṇassa gotamassa dhammadesanaṃ ārabbha nānākaraṇaṃ vuccetha,
atk-s0404a0:444_8: Iti te majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya sāsanena saddhiṃ attano laddhiṃ vacanamattena samadhuraṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:444_11: Te kira “titthiyā nāma andhasadisā jānitvā vā ajānitvā vā katheyyu”nti nābhinandiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:445_0: Na sampāyissantīti sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkhissanti.
atk-s0404a0:445_1: Uttari ca vighātanti asampādanato uttarimpi dukkhaṃ āpajjissanti.
atk-s0404a0:445_7: yasmā avisaye pañhaṃ pucchitā hontīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:445_8: Ito vā pana sutvāti ito vā pana mama sāsanato sutvā.
atk-s0404a0:446_2: Parato katamasmiṃ ekadhammeti iminā pañho dassito.
atk-s0404a0:446_3: Sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikāti idaṃ panettha veyyākaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:446_5: Sammā nibbindamānotiādīsu pana sammā hetunā nayena nibbidānupassanāya nibbindanto ukkaṇṭhanto,
atk-s0404a0:446_8: adhimokkhavasena vā vimuccamāno sanniṭṭhānaṃ kurumānoti attho.
atk-s0404a0:446_10: Sammadatthaṃ abhisameccāti sammā sabhāgatthaṃ ñāṇena abhisamāgantvā.
atk-s0404a0:446_11: Dukkhassantakaro hotīti sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa pariyantaṃ parivaṭumaṃ karo hoti.
atk-s0404a0:447_0: Sabbe sattāti kāmabhavādīsu ekavokārabhavādīsu ca sabbabhavesu sabbe sattā.
atk-s0404a0:447_2: Iti sabbasattānampi ṭhitihetu āhāro nāma eko dhammo,
atk-s0404a0:447_4: Nanu ca evaṃ sante yaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0404a0:447_13: Etasmiñhi sutte nippariyāyena āhāralakkhaṇā dhammā āhārāti vuttā,
atk-s0404a0:447_14: idha pana pariyāyena paccayo āhāroti vutto.
atk-s0404a0:447_16: So ca yaṃ yaṃ phalaṃ janeti,
atk-s0404a0:447_28: Etasmiñhi paccayāhāre gahite pariyāyāhāropi nippariyāyāhāropi sabbo gahitova hoti.
atk-s0404a0:448_1: Anuppanne hi buddhe titthāyatane pabbajitā vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tato vuṭṭhāya “dhi cittaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:448_5: Citte asati nattheta”nti khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvā aparihīnajjhānā kālaṃ katvā asaññībhave nibbattanti.
atk-s0404a0:448_6: Yo yassa iriyāpatho manussaloke paṇihito ahosi,
atk-s0404a0:448_7: so tena iriyāpathena nibbattitvā cittarūpasadiso hutvā pañca kappasatāni tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0404a0:448_10: Te hi yaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetvā nibbattā,
atk-s0404a0:448_12: Yathā jiyāvegena khittasaro yāva jiyāvego atthi,
atk-s0404a0:448_16: Tasmiṃ niṭṭhite khīṇavego viya saro patanti.
atk-s0404a0:448_17: Cavanakāle ca tesaṃ so rūpakāyo antaradhāyati,
atk-s0404a0:448_19: tena saññuppādena te devā tamhā kāyā cutāti paññāyanti.
atk-s0404a0:449_0: Ye pana te nerayikā neva vuṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī,
atk-s0404a0:449_11: yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantī hotī”ti.
atk-s0404a0:450_0: Kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ ārabbhāpi cettha vivādo na kātabbo.
atk-s0404a0:450_1: Mukhe uppajjanakheḷopi hi tesaṃ āhārakiccaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0404a0:450_2: Kheḷo hi niraye dukkhavedanīyo hutvā paccayo hoti,
atk-s0404a0:450_6: asaññānañceva avasesānañca paccayāhāroti iminā ākārena sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikāti veditabbā.
atk-s0404a0:450_7: Tattha cattāro āhāro yo vā pana koci paccayāhāro dukkhasaccaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:450_10: nirodhappajānanā paññā maggasaccanti evaṃ catusaccavasena sabbavāresu yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0404a0:452_4: Yathā mettha khāyatīti yathā me ettha upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0404a0:452_5: Sammā subhāvitacittoti hetunā nayena suṭṭhu bhāvitacitto.
atk-s0404a0:452_6: Eso ceva tassa atthoti kiñcāpi bhagavatā “cattāro dhammā”tiādayo pañhā “cattāro āhārā”tiādinā nayena vissajjitā,
atk-s0404a0:452_7: yasmā pana catūsu āhāresu pariññātesu cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā honti,
atk-s0404a0:452_8: tesu ca bhāvitesu cattāro āhārā pariññātāva honti.
atk-s0404a0:452_14: Atthato hi ubhayampetaṃ majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇamiva hoti.
atk-s0404a0:454_6: Agge virajjatīti sampattiyā agge kosalarājabhāve virajjati.
atk-s0404a0:454_7: Pageva hīnasminti paṭhamataraṃyeva hīne ittaramanussānaṃ pañca kāmaguṇajāte.
atk-s0404a0:455_5: Ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhanti dvīsupi passesu maṭṭhaṃ mudu siniddhaṃ khāyati.
atk-s0404a0:455_11: Yasmā pana sā saññā aggāti āgatā,
atk-s0404a0:456_1: No cassaṃ no ca me siyāti sace ahaṃ atīte na bhavissaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:456_2: etarahipi me ayaṃ attabhāvo na siyā.
atk-s0404a0:456_3: Na bhavissāmi na me bhavissatīti sacepi anāgate na bhavissāmi,
atk-s0404a0:456_4: na ca me kiñci palibodhajātaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0404a0:456_6: Ucchedadiṭṭhi hi idha nibbānassa santatāya agganti jātā.
atk-s0404a0:457_5: Anupādā vimokkhoti catūhi upādānehi aggahetvā cittassa vimokkho.
atk-s0404a0:457_8: Tattha bhagavā paṭhamajjhānena kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti,
atk-s0404a0:457_13: Idaṃ pana suttaṃ kathento bhagavā anabhiratipīḷitāni pañca bhikkhusatāni disvā tesaṃ anabhirativinodanatthaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0404a0:457_14: Tepi anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sotāpannā hutvā aparabhāge vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0404a0:459_1: Dasame uyyodhikā nivatto hotīti yuddhato nivatto hoti.
atk-s0404a0:459_2: Laddhādhippāyoti mahākosalaraññā kira bimbisārassa dhītaraṃ dentena dvinnaṃ rajjānaṃ antare satasahassuṭṭhāno kāsigāmo nāma dhītu dinno.
atk-s0404a0:459_3: Ajātasattunā pitari mārite mātāpissa rañño viyogasokena nacirasseva matā.
atk-s0404a0:459_5: mama pitu santako gāmo”ti tassatthāya aṭṭaṃ karoti,
atk-s0404a0:459_7: Dvepi mātulabhāgineyyā caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā yujjhiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:459_8: Tattha pasenadikosalo dve vāre ajātasattunā parājito nagarameva pāvisi.
atk-s0404a0:459_9: Tatiyavāre “kathaṃ nu kho me jayo bhaveyyā”ti upassutivasena yujjhitabbākāraṃ ñatvā byūhaṃ racayitvā ubhohi passehi parikkhipitvā ajātasattuṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0404a0:459_10: Tāvadeva jayādhippāyassa laddhattā laddhādhippāyo nāma ahosi.
atk-s0404a0:460_0: Yena ārāmo tena pāyāsīti bahinagare jayakhandhāvāraṃ nivesetvā “yāva nagaraṃ alaṅkaronti,
atk-s0404a0:460_2: Nagaraṃ paviṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya hi papañco hotī”ti amaccagaṇaparivuto yenārāmo tena pāyāsi,
atk-s0404a0:460_5: Piṇḍapātappaṭikkantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ datvā sammāsambuddhe gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe bhikkhusaṅghe ca
atk-s0404a0:460_6: ovādaṃ sampaṭicchitvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni gate.
atk-s0404a0:460_10: Tādisānañhi pacchābhattaṃ caṅkamitvā nhatvā sarīraṃ utuṃ gāhāpetvā nisajja samaṇadhammaṃ karontānaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:460_11: Ye te bhikkhūti so kira “kahaṃ satthā kahaṃ sugatoti pariveṇena pariveṇaṃ āgantvā pucchitvāva pavisissāmī”ti
atk-s0404a0:460_12: vilokento araññahatthī viya mahācaṅkame caṅkamamāne paṃsukūlike bhikkhū disvā tesaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0404a0:460_17: saṇikaṃ padapamāṇaṭṭhāne padaṃ nikkhipanto vattaṃ katvā susammaṭṭhaṃ muttajālasinduvārasadisaṃ vālukaṃ avināsentoti attho.
atk-s0404a0:460_21: Ākoṭehīti agganakhena īsakaṃ kuñcikāchiddasamīpe koṭehīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:460_24: Tathā akoṭetvā majjhe chiddasamīpe koṭetabbanti idaṃ dvārakoṭanavattanti vadanti.
atk-s0404a0:460_25: Vivari bhagavā dvāranti na bhagavā uṭṭhāya dvāraṃ vivarati,
atk-s0404a0:460_27: Tato “bhagavā tumhehi anekakappakoṭīsu dānaṃ dadamānehi na sahatthā dvāravivaraṇakammaṃ kata”nti sayameva dvāraṃ vivaṭaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:460_28: Taṃ pana yasmā bhagavato manena vivaṭaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:461_1: Kataññutanti ayañhi rājā pubbe thūlasarīro ahosi,
atk-s0404a0:461_3: Athassa bhagavā divase divase thokaṃ thokaṃ hāpanatthāya –
atk-s0404a0:466_1: So imasmiṃ ovāde ṭhatvā divase divase thokaṃ thokaṃ hāpetvā anukkamena nāḷikodanaparamatāya saṇṭhāsi,
atk-s0404a0:466_3: Taṃ bhagavatā kataṃ upakāraṃ sandhāya “kataññutaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0404a0:466_11: devavimānakappāya gandhakuṭiyā vasantopi araññeyeva vasīti dassento evamāha.
atk-s0404a0:468_1: Catutthassa paṭhame saṅghasuṭṭhutāyātiādīsu saṅghasuṭṭhutā nāma saṅghassa suṭṭhubhāvo,
atk-s0404a0:468_5: tassa taṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0404a0:468_10: na balakkārena abhibhavitvāti etamatthaṃ āvikaronto āha –
atk-s0404a0:469_2: vītikkamaṃ karontā vā katvā vā na lajjanti,
atk-s0404a0:469_4: Te hi sikkhāpade asati “kiṃ tumhehi diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:469_7: katamasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ katamaṃ āpattiṃ ropetvā amhe niggaṇhathā”ti saṅghaṃ viheṭheyyuṃ.
atk-s0404a0:469_8: Sikkhāpade pana sati te saṅgho sikkhāpadaṃ dassetvā saha dhammena niggahessati.
atk-s0404a0:470_1: Piyasīlā hi bhikkhū kattabbākattabbaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ velaṃ mariyādañca ajānantā sikkhāttayapāripūriyā ghaṭamānā kilamanti,
atk-s0404a0:470_2: te pana sāvajjānavajjaṃ velaṃ mariyādañca ñatvā sikkhāpāripūriyā ghaṭamānā na kilamanti.
atk-s0404a0:470_6: Dussīlapuggale nissāya hi uposathappavāraṇā na tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0404a0:470_9: bhikkhū anekaggā uddesādīsu anuyuñjituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0404a0:470_10: Dussīlesu pana niggahitesu sabbopi ayaṃ upaddavo na hoti,
atk-s0404a0:470_12: Evaṃ “pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāyā”ti ettha dvidhā attho veditabbo.
atk-s0404a0:471_0: Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāyāti diṭṭhadhammikā āsavā nāma asaṃvare ṭhitena tasmiṃyeva attabhāve
atk-s0404a0:471_3: Samparāyikānanti samparāyikā āsavā nāma asaṃvare ṭhitena katapāpakammamūlakā samparāye narakādīsu pattabbā dukkhavisesā,
atk-s0404a0:472_0: Appasannānanti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi sati sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ ñatvā vā,
atk-s0404a0:472_4: tehi ime samaṇā ārakā viratā viharanti,
atk-s0404a0:472_5: dukkaraṃ vata karontī”ti pasādaṃ āpajjanti vinayapiṭakapotthakaṃ disvā micchādiṭṭhikatavedibrāhmaṇā viya.
atk-s0404a0:473_2: yathāpaññattaṃ paṭipajjamāne bhikkhū vā disvā “aho ayyā dukkaraṃ karonti,
atk-s0404a0:473_3: ye yāvajīvaṃ ekabhattā vinayasaṃvaraṃ pālentī”ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīdanti.
atk-s0404a0:474_0: Saddhammaṭṭhitiyāti tividho saddhammo pariyattisaddhammo paṭipattisaddhammo adhigamasaddhammoti.
atk-s0404a0:474_2: Terasa dhutaguṇā cārittavārittasīlasamādhivipassanāti ayaṃ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma.
atk-s0404a0:474_4: So sabbopi yasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sati bhikkhū sikkhāpadañca tassa vibhaṅgañca tadatthajotanatthaṃ aññañca buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇanti,
atk-s0404a0:474_5: yathāpaññattañca paṭipajjamānā paṭipattiṃ pūretvā paṭipattiyā adhigantabbaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigacchanti,
atk-s0404a0:475_3: paññattivinayoti catubbidho vinayo anuggahito hoti sūpatthambhito.
atk-s0404a0:477_2: Pārājikakathā vippakatā hotīti “asukapuggalo pārājikaṃ āpanno nu kho no”ti evaṃ kathā ārabhitvā aniṭṭhāpitā hoti.
atk-s0404a0:479_1: Tatiye ubbāhikāyāti sampattaadhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ saṅghato ubbāhitvā uddharitvā gahaṇatthāya.
atk-s0404a0:479_2: Vinaye kho pana ṭhito hotīti vinayalakkhaṇe patiṭṭhito hoti.
atk-s0404a0:479_3: Asaṃhīroti na aññassa vacanamatteneva attano laddhiṃ vissajjeti.
atk-s0404a0:483_2: Avakassantīti parisaṃ ākaḍḍhanti vijaṭenti ekamantaṃ ussārenti.
atk-s0404a0:483_6: Āveni kammāni karontīti visuṃ saṅghakammāni karonti.
atk-s0404a0:485_6: Yogakkhemā padhaṃsatīti yogehi khemato arahattato dhaṃsati vigacchati.
atk-s0404a0:487_2: Devatānaṃ atthāya baliṃ haranti etthāti baliharaṇo,
atk-s0404a0:487_4: Acchiddena appaṭimaṃsenātiādīsu yena kenacideva pahaṭo vā hoti,
atk-s0404a0:487_6: tassa kāyasamācāro upacikādīhi khāyitatālapaṇṇaṃ viya chiddo ca,
atk-s0404a0:487_7: paṭimasituṃ yattha katthaci gahetvā ākaḍḍhituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāya paṭimaṃso ca hoti,
atk-s0404a0:487_9: Vacīsamācāro pana musāvādaomasavādapesuññaamūlakānuddhaṃsanādīhi chiddo sappaṭimaṃso ca hoti,
atk-s0404a0:487_11: Mettaṃ nu kho me cittanti palibodhaṃ chinditvā kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogena adhigataṃ me mettacittaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:487_14: Kattha vuttanti idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ kismiṃ nagare vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:488_0: Kālena vakkhāmītiādīsu eko ekaṃ okāsaṃ kāretvā codento kālena vadati nāma.
atk-s0404a0:488_1: Saṅghamajjhe vā gaṇamajjhe vā salākaggayāgaggavitakkamāḷakabhikkhācāramaggaāsanasālādīsu vā upaṭṭhākehi
atk-s0404a0:488_2: parivāritakkhaṇe vā codento akālena vadati nāma.
atk-s0404a0:488_4: “Daharamahallakaparisāvacarakapaṃsukūlikadhammakathikapatirūpaṃ tava ida”nti vadanto pharusena vadati nāma.
atk-s0404a0:488_9: dhammakathikatthapatirūpaṃ tumhākamida”nti vadanto saṇhena vadati nāma.
atk-s0404a0:488_10: Kāraṇanissitaṃ katvā vadanto atthasaṃhitena vadati nāma.
atk-s0404a0:488_11: Mettacitto vakkhāmi no dosantaroti mettacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā vakkhāmi,
atk-s0404a0:490_1: Pañcame kataṃ vā karissanti vāti methunavītikkamaṃ kariṃsu vā karissanti vā.
atk-s0404a0:490_9: Rajanīyāni rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbānīti etāni rāgajanakāni rūpādīni tattha paripūrāni honti.
atk-s0404a0:492_5: Yena kenaci kammaṭṭhānenāti kasivaṇijjādikammesu yena kenaci kammena.
atk-s0404a0:492_11: Ekantasukhappaṭisaṃvedī vihareyyāti ekantameva kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ ñāṇena paṭisaṃvedento vihareyya.
atk-s0404a0:492_14: Musāti niccasubhasukhā viya khāyamānāpi tathā na hontīti musā.
atk-s0404a0:492_16: Tasmā te paṭicca dukkhaṃ uppajjatīti sandasseti.
atk-s0404a0:492_17: Idha pana voti ettha vo ti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:492_18: Apaṇṇakaṃ vā sotāpannoti avirādhitaṃ ekaṃsena sotāpanno vā hoti.
atk-s0404a0:492_20: brahmalokaṃ vā gantvā chasu vā kāmasaggesu ekantasukhappaṭisaṃvedī hutvā vihareyya.
atk-s0404a0:492_21: Imasmiṃ sutte satthā aṭṭhaṅguposathassa guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0404a0:496_1: Aṭṭhame pabbajitenāti gharāvāsaṃ pahāya sāsane pabbajjaṃ upagatena.
atk-s0404a0:496_5: Taṃ panetaṃ vevaṇṇiyaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti sarīravevaṇṇiyaṃ parikkhāravevaṇṇiyañca.
atk-s0404a0:496_7: Pubbe pana nānāvirāgāni sukhumavatthāni nivāsetvāpi nānaggarasabhojanaṃ suvaṇṇarajatabhājanesu bhuñjitvāpi
atk-s0404a0:496_8: sirigabbhe varasayanāsanesu nipajjitvāpi nisīditvāpi sappinavanītādīhi bhesajjaṃ katvāpi pabbajitakālato
atk-s0404a0:496_10: ayapatte vā mattikapatte vā missakodano bhuñjitabbo,
atk-s0404a0:496_15: Evaṃ paccavekkhato kopo ca māno ca pahīyati.
atk-s0404a0:497_0: Parapaṭibaddhā me jīvikāti mayhaṃ paresu paṭibaddhā parāyattā catupaccayajīvikāti.
atk-s0404a0:497_3: catūsu paccayesu apaccavekkhitaparibhogo nāma na hoti.
atk-s0404a0:497_4: Añño me ākappo karaṇīyoti yo gihīnaṃ uraṃ abhinīharitvā gīvaṃ paggahetvā lalitenākārena aniyatapadavītihārena gamanākappo hoti,
atk-s0404a0:497_6: santindriyena santamānasena yugamattadassinā visamaṭṭhāne udakasakaṭeneva mandamitapadavītihārena hutvā gantabbanti paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:497_7: Evaṃ paccavekkhato hi iriyāpatho sāruppo hoti,
atk-s0404a0:497_11: Sīlato na upavadatīti aparisuddhaṃ te sīlanti sīlapaccayo na upavadati.
atk-s0404a0:497_12: Evaṃ paccavekkhato hi ajjhattaṃ hirī samuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0404a0:497_15: catupārisuddhisīle ṭhito vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0404a0:497_16: Anuvicca viññū sabrahmacārīti paṇḍitā sabrahmacārino anuvicāretvā.
atk-s0404a0:497_17: Evaṃ paccavekkhato hi bahiddhā ottappaṃ saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0404a0:497_18: taṃ tīsu dvāresu saṃvaraṃ sādhetīti anantaranayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:498_2: Evaṃ paccavekkhato hi tīsu dvāresu asaṃvutākāro nāma na hoti,
atk-s0404a0:498_4: Kammassakomhītiādīsu kammaṃ mayhaṃ sakaṃ attano santakanti kammassakā.
atk-s0404a0:498_11: Tassa dāyādo bhavissāmīti tassa kammassa dāyādo tena dinnaphalaṃ paṭiggāhako bhavissāmi.
atk-s0404a0:498_12: Evaṃ kammassakataṃ pana paccavekkhato pāpakaraṇaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-s0404a0:498_13: Kathaṃbhūtassa me rattindivā vītivattantīti kinnu kho me vattappaṭipattiṃ karontassa,
atk-s0404a0:498_18: udāhu akarontassāti kathaṃbhūtassa me rattindivā vītivattanti,
atk-s0404a0:499_0: Suññāgāre abhiramāmīti vivittokāse sabbiriyāpathesu ekakova hutvā kacci nu kho abhiramāmīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:499_2: Uttarimanussadhammoti uttarimanussānaṃ ukkaṭṭhamanussabhūtānaṃ jhāyīnañceva ariyānañca jhānādidhammo,
atk-s0404a0:499_3: dasakusalakammapathasaṅkhātamanussadhammato vā uttaritaro visiṭṭhataro dhammo me mama santāne atthi nu kho,
atk-s0404a0:499_6: cakkhunā diṭṭhamiva dhammaṃ paccakkhakaraṇato dassanaṭṭhena dassananti ñāṇadassanaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:499_10: jhānādibhedo uttarimanussadhammo alamariyañāṇadassano ca so viseso cāti alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso.
atk-s0404a0:499_11: Atha vā tameva kilesaviddhaṃsanasamatthaṃ visuddhaṃ ñāṇadassanameva visesoti alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso vā.
atk-s0404a0:499_12: Adhigatoti paṭiladdho me atthi nu kho.
atk-s0404a0:499_16: Na maṅku bhavissāmīti patitakkhandho nittejo na hessāmīti.
atk-s0404a0:499_17: Evaṃ paccavekkhantassa hi moghakālakiriyā nāma na hoti.
atk-s0404a0:505_1: Aṭṭhame amatogadhāti ettha saupādisesā nibbānadhātu kathitā,

atk-s0404a0:515_4: Tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ anuviloketi,

atk-s0404a0:517_1: Navame tiracchānakathanti aniyyānikattā saggamokkhamaggānaṃ tiracchānabhūtaṃ kathaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:517_2: Tattha rājānaṃ ārabbha “mahāsammato mandhātā dhammāsoko evaṃmahānubhāvo”tiādinā nayena pavattakathā rājakathā.
atk-s0404a0:517_4: Tesu “asuko rājā abhirūpo dassanīyo”tiādinā gehasitakathāva tiracchānakathā hoti,
atk-s0404a0:517_5: “sopi nāma evaṃmahānubhāvo khayaṃ gato”ti evaṃ pavattā pana kammaṭṭhānabhāve tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0404a0:517_7: meghadevo evaṃmahānubhāvo”ti tesaṃ kammaṃ paṭicca “aho sūrā”ti gehasitakathāva tiracchānakathā.
atk-s0404a0:517_8: Yuddhesupi bhāratayuddhādīsu “asukena asuko evaṃ mārito evaṃ viddho”ti kammassādavaseneva kathā tiracchānakathā,
atk-s0404a0:517_9: “tepi nāma khayaṃ gatā”ti evaṃ pavattā pana sabbattha kammaṭṭhānameva hoti.
atk-s0404a0:517_10: Apica annādīsu “evaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ rasavantaṃ phassasampannaṃ khādimha bhuñjimha pivimha paribhuñjimhā”ti kāmarasassādavasena kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0404a0:517_11: sātthakaṃ pana katvā “pubbe evaṃ vaṇṇādisampannaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālaṃ gandhaṃ sīlavantānaṃ adamha,
atk-s0404a0:518_0: Ñātikathādīsupi “amhākaṃ ñātakā sūrā samatthā”ti vā “pubbe mayaṃ evaṃ vicitrehi yānehi vicarimhā”ti vā assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0404a0:518_1: sātthakaṃ pana katvā “tepi no ñātakā khayaṃ gatā”ti vā “pubbe mayaṃ evarūpā upāhanā saṅghassa adamhā”ti vā kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:518_2: Gāmakathāpi suniviṭṭhadunniviṭṭhasubhikkhadubbhikkhādivasena vā “asukagāmavāsino sūrā samatthā”ti vā evaṃ assādavaseneva na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0404a0:518_3: sātthakaṃ pana katvā “saddhā pasannā”ti vā “khayavayaṃ gatā”ti vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0404a0:519_0: Itthikathāpi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni paṭicca assādavasena na vaṭṭati,

atk-s0404a0:519_4: Surākathanti pāḷiyaṃ pana anekavidhaṃ majjakathaṃ assādavasena kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0404a0:519_6: Visikhākathāpi “asukavisikhā suniviṭṭhā dunniviṭṭhā sūrā samatthā”ti assādavaseneva na vaṭṭati,

atk-s0404a0:520_2: Nānattakathā nāma purimapacchimakathāvimuttā avasesā nānāsabhāvā tiracchānakathā.

atk-s0404a0:520_12: Iti bhavo iti abhavoti yaṃ vā taṃ vā niratthakakāraṇaṃ vatvā pavattitakathā itibhavābhavakathā nāma.
atk-s0404a0:521_0: Tejasā tejanti attano tejasā tesaṃ tejaṃ.

atk-s0404a0:523_3: Tattha dvīhi kāraṇehi sampannasīlatā hoti sīlavipattiyā ca ādīnavadassanena,
atk-s0404a0:523_6: Tattha “sampannasīlā”ti ettāvatā kira bhagavā catupārisuddhisīlaṃ uddisitvā “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutā”ti
atk-s0404a0:523_7: iminā tattha jeṭṭhakasīlaṃ vitthāretvā dassesīti dīpavihāravāsī sumanatthero āha.
atk-s0404a0:523_11: itarāni pana tīṇi sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ atthīti ananujānanto vatvā āha –
atk-s0404a0:523_17: ayaṃ sīsacchinno viya puriso hatthapāde sesāni rakkhissatīti na vattabbo.
atk-s0404a0:523_19: ayaṃ acchinnasīso viya puriso jīvitaṃ sesāni puna pākatikāni kātuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0404a0:523_20: Tasmā “sampannasīlā”ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ uddisitvā “sampannapātimokkhā”ti tasseva vevacanaṃ vatvā
atk-s0404a0:523_25: Sacepi acirapabbajitānaṃ vā duppaññānaṃ vā evamassa “bhagavā ‘sīlaṃ pūretha sīlaṃ pūrethā’ti vadati,
atk-s0404a0:523_28: kā vaḍḍhī”ti tesaṃ dasa ānisaṃse dassetuṃ evamāha –
atk-s0404a0:523_29: “appeva nāma etaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyamanāpatādiāsavakkhayapariyosānaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ sutvāpi sīlaṃ paripūreyyu”nti.
atk-s0404a0:524_7: Bhāvanīyoti “addhāyamāyasmā jānaṃ jānāti passaṃ passatī”ti evaṃ sambhāvanīyo.

atk-s0404a0:524_15: Ettha ca samathavipassanāvasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā rattindivaṃ suññāgāraṃ pavisitvā nisīdamāno bhikkhu “brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti veditabbo.

atk-s0404a0:525_8: Apica sarasānisaṃso esa sīlassa yadidaṃ cattāro paccayā nāma.
atk-s0404a0:525_9: Tathā hi paṇḍitamanussā koṭṭhādīsu ṭhapitaṃ nīharitvā attanāpi aparibhuñjitvā sīlavantānaṃ dentīti sīlassa sarasānisaṃsadassanatthampetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:526_1: Tesaṃ te kārāti tesaṃ devānaṃ vā manussānaṃ vā te mayi katā paccayadānakārā.

atk-s0404a0:526_5: Sīlādiguṇayuttassa hi kaṭacchubhikkhāpi pañcaratanamattāya bhūmiyā paṇṇasālāpi katvā dinnā anekāni kappasahassāni duggativinipātato rakkhati,

atk-s0404a0:526_8: Sakalameva vā petavatthu vimānavatthu ca sādhakaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:527_4: Tesaṃ tanti tesaṃ taṃ mayi pasannacittaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:527_6: Yassa hi bhikkhuno kālakato pitā vā mātā vā “amhākaṃ ñātakatthero sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo”ti pasannacitto hutvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ anussarati,
atk-s0404a0:527_7: tassa so cittappasādopi taṃ anussaraṇamattampi mahapphalaṃ mahānisaṃsameva hoti.

atk-s0404a0:530_1: Dutiye abhiññātehīti gaganamajjhe puṇṇacando viya sūriyo viya ñātehi pākaṭehi.
atk-s0404a0:530_4: purato dhāvantena pacchato anubandhantena ca mahāparivārenāti attho.
atk-s0404a0:532_5: Sārādāyī ca hoti varadāyīti sārassa ca varassa ca ādāyako hoti.

atk-s0404a0:534_11: Puthujjanassa sīlaṃ pañcahi kāraṇehi bhijjati pārājikāpajjanena sikkhāpaccakkhānena titthiyapakkhandanena arahattena maraṇenāti.
atk-s0404a0:534_17: arahattamaggo ca kusalākusalakammakkhayāya saṃvattatīti evaṃ tena taṃ bhijjati.
atk-s0404a0:534_18: Savanenapi akataṃ hotīti sotabbayuttakaṃ assutaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:534_19: Bāhusaccenapi akataṃ hotīti ettha bāhusaccanti vīriyaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:534_22: Diṭṭhiyāpi appaṭividdhaṃ hotīti diṭṭhiyā paṭivijjhitabbaṃ appaṭividdhaṃ hoti apaccakkhakataṃ.
atk-s0404a0:534_23: Sāmayikampi vimuttiṃ na labhatīti kālānukālaṃ dhammassavanaṃ nissāya pītipāmojjaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0404a0:535_0: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti “sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā pañcavidhaṃ dussīlyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti uggahaparipucchāvasena jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:535_1: Tassa savanenapi kataṃ hotīti sotabbayuttakaṃ sutaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:535_2: Bāhusaccenapi kataṃ hotīti vīriyena kattabbayuttakaṃ antamaso dubbalavipassanāmattakampi kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:535_3: Diṭṭhiyāpi suppaṭividdhaṃ hotīti antamaso lokiyapaññāyapi paccayapaṭivedho kato hoti.
atk-s0404a0:535_4: Imassa hi puggalassa paññā sīlaṃ paridhovati,
atk-s0404a0:536_7: Dhammasoto nibbahatīti sūraṃ hutvā pavattamānaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ nibbahati,
atk-s0404a0:536_9: Tadantaraṃ ko jāneyyāti taṃ evaṃ kāraṇaṃ ko jāneyya.
atk-s0404a0:536_11: Yatthassa taṃ sīlanti arahattavimuttiṃ patvā sīlaṃ aparisesampi nirujjhati nāma,
atk-s0404a0:536_13: Ito paresu dvīsu aṅgesu anāgāmiphalaṃ vimutti nāma,
atk-s0404a0:538_2: Kassaci guṇaṃ anādiyitvā hatthenapi gahito tassa sīsepi vaccaṃ karoti.
atk-s0404a0:540_4: Tasmā tattha āghāto aṭṭhāne āghāto nāma.

atk-s0404a0:544_4: Atha vā irīṇasaṅkhātaṃ araññaṃ vicinasaṅkhātaṃ mahāgahanañca āpanno viya hoti.

atk-s0404a0:548_6: Dhammānaṃ na nisāmakajātikoti navannaṃ lokuttaradhammānaṃ na nisāmanasabhāvo na upadhāraṇasabhāvo.

atk-s0404a0:550_3: Ariyānaṃ pana guṇe chindissāmīti antimavatthunā upavadanto ariyūpavādī nāma hoti.

atk-s0404a0:552_1: Navame kokāliko bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti koyaṃ kokāliko,
atk-s0404a0:552_3: Ayaṃ kira kokālikaraṭṭhe kokālikanagare kokālikaseṭṭhissa putto pabbajitvā pitarā kārite vihāre vasati cūḷakokālikoti nāmena,
atk-s0404a0:552_6: Bhagavati pana sāvatthiyaṃ viharante dve aggasāvakā pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0404a0:552_7: caramānā upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya vivekavāsaṃ vasitukāmā te bhikkhū uyyojetvā attano pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0404a0:552_8: tasmiṃ janapade taṃ nagaraṃ patvā vihāraṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:552_12: mā no kassaci ārocesī”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā vasiṃsu.

atk-s0404a0:552_24: Te khippaṃ sannipatitvā sappiphāṇitādīni ceva cīvaradussāni ca saṃhariṃsu.

atk-s0404a0:553_5: Kokāliko “kathañhi nāma sayaṃ aggaṇhantā mayhampi adāpetvā pakkamissantī”ti āghātaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0404a0:553_6: Tepi bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā puna attano parisaṃ ādāya janapadacārikaṃ carantā
atk-s0404a0:553_7: anupubbena tasmiṃ raṭṭhe tameva nagaraṃ paccāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:553_8: Nāgarā there sañjānitvā saha parikkhārehi dānaṃ sajjetvā nagaramajjhe maṇḍapaṃ katvā dānaṃ adaṃsu,
atk-s0404a0:553_16: idāni pana pāpabhikkhū jātatthā”ti vatvā “mūlaṭṭhāneyeva nesaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ bhindissāmī”ti taramānarūpo nikkhamitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.

atk-s0404a0:554_4: ekaṃsena pana padumaniraye nibbattissatī”ti disvā “sāriputtamoggallānepi nāma garahantaṃ sutvā na nisedhetī”ti
atk-s0404a0:554_5: vādamocanatthaṃ ariyūpavādassa ca mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ mā hevanti tikkhattuṃ paṭisedhesi.
atk-s0404a0:554_6: Tattha mā hevanti mā evaṃ abhaṇi.
atk-s0404a0:555_3: Sabbo kāyo phuṭo ahosīti kesaggamattampi okāsaṃ avajjetvā sakalasarīraṃ aṭṭhīni bhinditvā uggatāhi pīḷakāhi ajjhotthaṭaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0404a0:555_4: Yasmā pana buddhānubhāvena tathārūpaṃ kammaṃ buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve vipākaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0404a0:555_10: Tāsu bhinnāsu sakalasarīraṃ panasapakkaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0404a0:555_11: So pakkena gattena jetavanadvārakoṭṭhake visagilito maccho viya kadalipattesu nipajji.

atk-s0404a0:557_1: gilitaviso viya na kassaci vacanaṃ na karissatī”ti ñatvā purisassa hītiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:557_6: Taṃ vā nindati yo pasaṃsiyoti yo vā pasaṃsitabbo khīṇāsavo,
atk-s0404a0:557_8: Vicināti mukhena so kalinti so taṃ aparādhaṃ mukhena vicināti nāma.
atk-s0404a0:557_9: Kalinā tenāti tena aparādhena sukhaṃ na vindati.
atk-s0404a0:557_10: Nindiyapasaṃsāya hi pasaṃsiyanindāya ca samakova vipāko.

atk-s0404a0:653_12: Sā tassā sarīraṃ āhacca tālapaṇṇaṃ viya vaṭṭamānā gatā,
atk-s0404a0:654_0: Tuvaṭaṃ cittaṃ samādhiyatīti mettāvihārino khippameva cittaṃ samādhiyati,
atk-s0404a0:654_2: Mukhavaṇṇo vippasīdatīti bandhanā pavuttatālapakkaṃ viya cassa vippasannavaṇṇaṃ mukhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:654_3: Asammūḷho kālaṃ karotīti mettāvihārino sammohamaraṇaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0404a0:654_4: asammūḷho pana niddaṃ okkamanto viya kālaṃ karoti.
atk-s0404a0:654_5: Uttari appaṭivijjhantoti mettāsamāpattito uttari arahattaṃ adhigantuṃ asakkonto ito cavitvā suttappabuddho viya brahmalokaṃ upapajjatīti.
atk-s0404a0:656_1: Chaṭṭhe dasamoti jātigottavasena ceva sārapattakulagaṇanāya ca dasame ṭhāne gaṇīyati,
atk-s0404a0:657_2: yo so bhagavā samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0404a0:657_3: tena bhagavatā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āsayānusayaṃ jānatā,
atk-s0404a0:657_4: hatthatale ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ viya sabbañeyyadhamme passatā,
atk-s0404a0:657_7: tīhi vā vijjāhi chahi vā pana abhiññāhi jānatā,
atk-s0404a0:657_10: sabbasattānaṃ cakkhuvisayātītāni tirokuṭṭādigatāni cāpi rūpāni ativisuddhena maṃsacakkhunā vā passatā,
atk-s0404a0:657_16: sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhenāti evaṃ catuvesārajjavasena catūhi kāraṇehi thomitena atthi nu kho eko dhammo akkhātoti.
atk-s0404a0:658_2: So tattha ṭhitoti so tasmiṃ samathavipassanādhamme ṭhito.
atk-s0404a0:658_3: Dhammarāgena dhammanandiyāti padadvayenapi samathavipassanāsu chandarāgo vutto.
atk-s0404a0:658_4: Samathavipassanāsu hi sabbena sabbaṃ chandarāgaṃ pariyādiyituṃ sakkonto arahā hoti,
atk-s0404a0:658_6: So samathavipassanāsu chandarāgassa appahīnattā catutthajjhānacetanāya suddhāvāse nibbattati.
atk-s0404a0:659_8: evaṃ sante anāgāmiphalatthikena samathavipassanāsu chandarāgo kattabbo bhavissati,
atk-s0404a0:659_10: mā “suttaṃ me laddha”nti yaṃ vā taṃ vā dīpehi.
atk-s0404a0:659_11: Pañhaṃ kathentena hi ācariyassa santike uggahetvā attharasaṃ paṭivijjhitvā kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0404a0:659_13: kusalena ca apāye paṭisandhi nāma natthi.
atk-s0404a0:660_6: yā vā panaññāpi kāci sugatiyo. Atha kho,
atk-s0404a0:661_4: “gaccha pātova vihāraṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ pivā”ti uyyojetabbo.
atk-s0404a0:662_1: ekadhammo akkhātoti ekaṃ dhammaṃ pucchitena “ayampi ekadhammo akkhāto,
atk-s0404a0:662_2: ayampi ekadhammo akkhāto”ti evaṃ pucchāvasena kathitattā ekādasapi dhammā ekadhammo nāma kato.
atk-s0404a0:662_3: Amatuppattiatthena vā sabbepi ekadhammoti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0404a0:663_2: Kathaṃ pana ekappayogeneva ekādasannaṃ nidhīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti?
atk-s0404a0:663_9: So taṃ pavaṭṭetvā uparūpariṭṭhitā vā kucchiyā kucchiṃ āhacca ṭhitā vā ekādasa kumbhiyo passati.
atk-s0404a0:664_0: Ācariyadhanaṃ pariyesissantīti aññatitthiyā hi yassa santike sippaṃ uggaṇhanti,
atk-s0404a0:664_1: tassa sippuggahaṇato pure vā pacchā vā antarantarā vā gehato nīharitvā dhanaṃ denti.
atk-s0404a0:665_0: Kiṃ panāhanti bāhirakā tāva aniyyānikepi sāsane sippamattadāyakassa dhanaṃ pariyesanti,
atk-s0404a0:665_1: ahaṃ pana evaṃvidhe niyyānikasāsane ekādasavidhaṃ amatuppattipaṭipadaṃ desentassa ācariyassa pūjaṃ kiṃ na karissāmi,
atk-s0404a0:665_3: Paccekaṃ dussayugena acchādesīti ekamekassa bhikkhuno ekekaṃ dussayugaṃ adāsīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:665_6: Pañcasataṃ vihāranti pañcasatagghanikaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ kāresīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:667_1: Sattame tisso kathā ekanāḷikā caturassā nisinnavattikāti.
atk-s0404a0:667_2: Tattha pāḷiṃ vatvā ekekassa padassa atthakathanaṃ ekanāḷikā nāma.
atk-s0404a0:667_6: paṇḍitabhikkhuṃ dassetvāti catukkaṃ bandhitvā kathanaṃ caturassā nāma.
atk-s0404a0:667_10: paṇḍitabhikkhuṃ dassetvā pariyosānagamananti ayaṃ nisinnavattikā nāma.
atk-s0404a0:668_7: Na rūpaññū hotīti gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā rūpaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:668_8: Gaṇanato na jānāti nāma attano gunnaṃ sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vāti saṅkhyaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0404a0:668_9: so gāvīsu haṭāsu vā palātāsu vā gogaṇaṃ gaṇetvā “ajja ettakā na dissantī”ti dve tīṇi gāmantarāni vā aṭaviṃ vā vicaranto na pariyesati.
atk-s0404a0:668_10: Aññesaṃ gāvīsu attano gogaṇaṃ paviṭṭhāsupi gogaṇaṃ gaṇetvā “imā ettikā gāvo na amhāka”nti yaṭṭhiyā pothetvā na nīharati.
atk-s0404a0:668_13: Gosāmikā disvā “ayaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ amhākaṃ dhenū duhī”ti tajjetvā attano gāviyo gahetvā gacchanti.
atk-s0404a0:668_16: Vaṇṇato na jānāti nāma “ettikā gāvī setā,
atk-s0404a0:668_22: So gāvīsu haṭāsu vā palātāsu vā…pe…
atk-s0404a0:669_0: Na lakkhaṇakusaloti gāvīnaṃ sarīre kataṃ dhanusattisūlādibhedaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:669_1: So gāvīsu haṭāsu vā palātāsu vā “ajja asukalakkhaṇā asukalakkhaṇā ca gāvo na dissantī”ti…pe…
atk-s0404a0:670_0: Na āsāṭikaṃ hāretāti gunnaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi pahaṭaṭṭhānesu vaṇo hoti.
atk-s0404a0:670_3: Tāni daṇḍakena apanetvā bhesajjaṃ dātabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0404a0:670_10: gāvo gelaññābhibhūtā neva yāvadatthaṃ tiṇaṃ khādituṃ na pānīyaṃ pātuṃ sakkonti.
atk-s0404a0:671_0: Na vaṇaṃ paṭicchādetā hotīti gunnaṃ vuttanayeneva sañjāto vaṇo bhesajjaṃ datvā vākena vā cīrakena vā bandhitvā paṭicchādetabbo hoti.
atk-s0404a0:671_5: Evaṃ gāvo gelaññābhibhūtā neva yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ…pe…
atk-s0404a0:672_0: Na dhūmaṃ kattā hotīti antovasse ḍaṃsamakasādīnaṃ ussannakāle gogaṇe vajaṃ paviṭṭhe tattha tattha dhūmo kātabbo hoti.
atk-s0404a0:672_2: gogaṇo sabbarattiṃ ḍaṃsādīhi upadduto niddaṃ alabhitvā punadivase araññe tattha tattha rukkhamūlādīsu nipajjitvā niddāyati.
atk-s0404a0:673_0: Na titthaṃ jānātīti titthampi samanti vā visamanti vā sagāhanti vā niggāhanti vā na jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:673_2: Tāsaṃ visamatitthe pāsāṇādīni akkamantīnaṃ pādā bhijjanti.
atk-s0404a0:673_3: Sagāhaṃ gambhīraṃ titthaṃ otiṇṇe kumbhīlādayo gāvo gaṇhanti,
atk-s0404a0:674_0: Na pītaṃ jānātīti pītampi apītampi na jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:674_4: imāya na laddho”ti evaṃ pītāpītaṃ jānitabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:674_5: Ayaṃ pana divasabhāge araññe gogaṇaṃ rakkhitvā “pānīyaṃ pāyessāmī”ti nadiṃ vā taḷākaṃ vā ogāhetvā gacchati.
atk-s0404a0:674_6: Tattha mahāusabhā ca anusabhā ca balavagāviyo ca dubbalāni ceva mahallakāni ca gorūpāni siṅgehi vā phāsukāhi
atk-s0404a0:674_7: vā paharitvā attano okāsaṃ katvā ūruppamāṇaṃ udakaṃ pavisitvā yathākāmaṃ pivanti.
atk-s0404a0:674_8: Avasesā okāsaṃ alabhamānā tīre ṭhatvā kalalamissakaṃ udakaṃ pivanti vā apītā eva vā honti.
atk-s0404a0:674_9: Atha so gopālako piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā puna araññaṃ paveseti.
atk-s0404a0:674_10: Tattha apītā gāviyo pipāsāya sussamānā yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0404a0:675_0: Na vīthiṃ jānātīti “ayaṃ maggo samo khemo,
atk-s0404a0:675_1: ayaṃ visamo sāsaṅko sappaṭibhayo”ti na jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:675_2: So samaṃ khemaṃ maggaṃ vajjetvā gogaṇaṃ itaramaggaṃ paṭipādeti.
atk-s0404a0:675_3: Tattha gāvo sīhabyagghādīnaṃ gandhena coraparissayena ca abhibhūtā bhantamigasappaṭibhāgā gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0404a0:676_0: Na gocarakusalo hotīti gopālakena hi gocarakusalena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:676_2: Ekadisāya gogaṇaṃ cāretvā punadivase tattha na cāretabbo.
atk-s0404a0:676_3: Mahatā hi gogaṇena ciṇṇaṭṭhānaṃ bheritalaṃ viya suddhaṃ hoti nittiṇaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:676_5: Tasmā pañcame vā sattame vā divase puna tattha cāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0404a0:676_8: ayaṃ pana imaṃ pañcāhikacāraṃ vā sattāhikacāraṃ vā na jānāti,
atk-s0404a0:677_0: Anavasesadohī ca hotīti paṇḍitagopālakena hi yāva vacchakassa maṃsalohitaṃ saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0404a0:677_1: tāva ekaṃ dve thane ṭhapetvā sāvasesadohinā bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:677_4: saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto kampamāno mātu purato patitvā kālaṃ karonti.
atk-s0404a0:677_6: “mayhaṃ puttako attano mātukhīraṃ pātuṃ na labhatī”ti puttasokena neva yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ na pānīyaṃ pātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0404a0:678_1: Gāvo pariṇāyanti yathāruciṃ gahetvā gacchantīti gopariṇāyakā.
atk-s0404a0:678_2: Te na atirekapūjāyāti paṇḍito hi gopālako evarūpe usabhe atirekapūjāya pūjeti,
atk-s0404a0:678_7: rattiṃ dīpaṃ jāletvā celavitānassa heṭṭhā sayāpeti.
atk-s0404a0:678_8: Ayaṃ pana tato ekasakkārampi na karoti.
atk-s0404a0:678_9: Usabhā atirekapūjaṃ alabhamānā gogaṇaṃ na rakkhanti,
atk-s0404a0:679_1: Na rūpaññū hotīti “cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ rūpaṃ dvīhākārehi na jānāti gaṇanato vā samuṭṭhānato vā.
atk-s0404a0:679_4: itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ kāyaviññatti vacīviññatti ākāsadhātu āpodhātu rūpassa lahutā, mudutā,
atk-s0404a0:679_7: kabaḷīkāro āhāro”ti evaṃ pāḷiyā āgatā pañcavīsati rūpakoṭṭhāsāti na jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:679_8: Seyyathāpi so gopālako gaṇanato gunnaṃ rūpaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0404a0:679_10: So gaṇanato rūpaṃ ajānanto rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ vavatthapetvā rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā paccayaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0404a0:679_11: lakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0404a0:679_12: So yathā tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0404a0:679_13: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane sīlasamādhivipassanāmaggaphalanibbānehi na vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0404a0:679_14: Yathā ca so gopālako pañcahi gorasehi paribāhiro hoti,
atk-s0404a0:679_15: evamevāyaṃ asekhena sīlakkhandhena asekhena samādhipaññāvimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhenāti pañcahi dhammakkhandhehi paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0404a0:680_6: Seyyathāpi so gopālako vaṇṇato gunnaṃ rūpaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0404a0:680_8: So samuṭṭhānato rūpaṃ ajānanto rūpaṃ pariggahetvā…pe…
atk-s0404a0:681_1: kammalakkhaṇo paṇḍito”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ kusalākusalakammaṃ paṇḍitabālalakkhaṇanti na jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:681_2: So evaṃ ajānanto bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite na sevati.
atk-s0404a0:681_3: Bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite asevanto kappiyākappiyaṃ kusalākusalaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ garukalahukaṃ satekicchātekicchaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:681_4: Taṃ ajānanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0404a0:681_5: So yathā tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0404a0:681_6: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane yathāvuttehi sīlādīhi na vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0404a0:681_7: So gopālako viya ca pañcahi gorasehi,
atk-s0404a0:682_0: Na āsāṭikaṃ hāretā hotīti “uppannaṃ kāmavitakka”nti evaṃ vutte kāmavitakkādayo na vinodeti.
atk-s0404a0:682_1: So imaṃ akusalavitakkaṃ āsāṭikaṃ ahāretvā vitakkavasiko hutvā vicaranto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0404a0:683_0: Na vaṇaṃ paṭicchādetā hotīti “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hotī”tiādinā nayena sabbārammaṇesu nimittaṃ
atk-s0404a0:683_1: gaṇhanto yathā so gopālako vaṇaṃ na paṭicchādeti,
atk-s0404a0:683_3: So vivaṭadvāro vicaranto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0404a0:684_0: Na dhūmaṃ kattā hotīti so gopālako dhūmaṃ viya dhammadesanādhūmaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0404a0:684_1: dhammakathaṃ vā sarabhaññaṃ vā upanisinnakakathaṃ vā anumodanaṃ vā na karoti,
atk-s0404a0:684_2: tato naṃ manussā “bahussuto guṇavā”ti na jānanti.
atk-s0404a0:684_3: Te guṇāguṇaṃ ajānanto catūhi paccayehi saṅgahaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0404a0:684_4: So paccayehi kilamamāno buddhavacanaṃ sajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ pūretuṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0404a0:685_0: Na titthaṃ jānātīti titthabhūte bahussutabhikkhū na upasaṅkamati.
atk-s0404a0:685_5: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne attho kiṃ dīpetī”ti evaṃ na paripucchati na paripañhati,
atk-s0404a0:685_7: Tassa te evaṃ aparipucchitā avivaṭañceva na vivaranti,
atk-s0404a0:685_11: Anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesūti anekavidhāsu kaṅkhāsu ekakaṅkhampi na paṭivinodenti.
atk-s0404a0:685_13: Tattha ekaṃ kaṅkhampi na nīharantīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:685_14: So evaṃ bahussutatitthaṃ anupasaṅkamitvā sakaṅkho kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0404a0:685_15: Yathā vā so gopālako titthaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0404a0:685_16: evaṃ ayampi bhikkhu dhammatitthaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:685_20: Te avisaye puṭṭhā kathetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0404a0:685_21: So attanā sakaṅkho kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0404a0:686_0: Na pītaṃ jānātīti yathā so gopālako pītāpītaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0404a0:686_1: evaṃ dhammūpasañhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ na jānāti na labhati.
atk-s0404a0:686_2: Savanamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthuṃ nissāya ānisaṃsaṃ na vindati,
atk-s0404a0:686_7: So sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ assuṇanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0404a0:687_0: Na vīthiṃ jānātīti so gopālako maggāmaggaṃ viya “ayaṃ lokiyo,
atk-s0404a0:687_1: ayaṃ lokuttaro”ti ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
atk-s0404a0:687_2: Ajānanto lokiyamagge abhinivisitvā lokuttaraṃ nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0404a0:688_0: Na gocarakusalo hotīti so gopālako pañcāhikasattāhikacāre viya cattāro satipaṭṭhāne “ime lokiyā,
atk-s0404a0:688_2: Ajānanto sukhumaṭṭhānesu attano ñāṇaṃ carāpetvā lokiyasatipaṭṭhāne abhinivisitvā lokuttaraṃ nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0404a0:689_0: Anavasesadohī hotīti paṭiggahaṇe mattaṃ ajānanto anavasesaṃ duhati.
atk-s0404a0:689_1: Niddesavāre panassa abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavārentīti abhiharitvā pavārenti.
atk-s0404a0:689_4: Vācābhihāro nāma manussā bhikkhussa santikaṃ gantvā “vadeyyātha, bhante,
atk-s0404a0:689_6: Paccayābhihāro nāma vatthādīni vā sappinavanītaphāṇitādīni vā gahetvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ gantvā “gaṇhatha, bhante,
atk-s0404a0:689_8: Tatra bhikkhu mattaṃ na jānātīti bhikkhu tesu paccayesu pamāṇaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:689_11: attano thāmo veditabbo”ti iminā nayena pamāṇayuttakaṃ aggahetvā yaṃ āharanti,
atk-s0404a0:689_13: Manussā vippaṭisārino na puna abhiharitvā pavārenti.
atk-s0404a0:689_14: So paccayehi kilamanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0404a0:690_0: Te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hotīti so gopālako mahāusabhe viya there bhikkhū imāya āvi ceva raho ca mettākāyakammādikāya atirekapūjāya na pūjeti.
atk-s0404a0:690_1: Tato therā “ime amhesu garucittīkāraṃ na karontī”ti navake bhikkhū dvīhi saṅgahehi na saṅgaṇhanti,
atk-s0404a0:690_4: cīvarena vā pattena vā pattapariyāpannena vā vasanaṭṭhānena vā kilamantepi nappaṭijagganti,
atk-s0404a0:690_5: pāḷiṃ vā aṭṭhakathaṃ vā dhammakathābandhaṃ vā guḷhaganthaṃ vā na sikkhāpenti.
atk-s0404a0:690_6: Navakā therānaṃ santikā sabbaso ime dve saṅgahe alabhamānā imasmiṃ sāsane patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0404a0:690_7: Yathā tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0404a0:690_9: Yathā ca so gopālako pañcahi gorasehi,
atk-s0404a0:699_0: Pākaṃ gate viya dume valañjamānamhi saddhamme.
atk-s0404a0:704_0: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā;
atk-s0404a0:715_0: Yaṃ puññamupacitaṃ tena hotu loko sadā sukhitoti.
atk-s0404a0:716_1: paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatena tipiṭakapariyattippabhede sāṭṭhakathe satthu sāsane appaṭihatañāṇappabhāvena
atk-s0404a0:716_4: suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ therānaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena suvipulavisuddhabuddhinā
atk-s0404a0:716_5: buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā ayaṃ manorathapūraṇī nāma aṅguttaranikāyaṭṭhakathā –
